name: The Hungry Hound
description: Hidden away in the warm airs of Ul'dah sits The Hungry Hound, a smaller eatery that exudes a warmth in not only the atmosphere, but in each dish served. With a bubbly curator prepared to serve up smiles, hot meals and laughs be prepared to have not only your belly but your heart filled with joy.

name: Ruin's Respite
description: Ruin's Respite is a bar and host lounge club providing some comfort from the cold and some companionship for the lonely. With a variety of services for any guest and a menu catered towards the taste of the Garlean co-owners, most anyone may find something they might like.

name: Purrfection
description: Welcome to Purrfection! We're a sexy catgirl themed nightclub for all the late night degens. We offer something for everyone, whether you're looking for some affection, a spicy finish for your evening, or just a place to dance the night away with friends. Purrfection is the purrfect get away.

name: RE:GROW
description: RE:GROW is a small industrial underground venue, old style basement mosh pit and bar. Good music, loud and brash is our passion, get that blood pumping. We're no frills, no charge, no services other than an RP Bar and a macro dancer. We bring in Dj's from NA to EU as well as have 3 resident DJ's. Our music genre fits the theme; Metal, Industrial, EBM, Goth, Dark, Ska, Punk, Darkwave/Tech and Rock.

name: Scarlet Manor
description: Scarlet Manor is an upmarket bar & lounge experience, where dazzling dancers and enthralling escorts wait to meet your needs. Grab a drink, and come relax in our pleasant, friendly atmosphere, and make new connections in luxurious surroundings.

name: Whisky A GOGO
description: FFXIV Whisky A GOGO, operating in honor of the real rock 'n' roll, hall of fame bar located on the LA Sunset Strip where Motley Crue, Guns n Roses, The Doors, The WHO, LA Guns, KISS, and many other great bands where born.
We are an FC of metal heads, dedicated to the conservation of the music culture of ROCK 'N' ROLL and METAL for all younger generations of gamers.

We love to share talk and have everyone participate in raffles, giveaways, drinking games, and death rolls. We love for people to come in and ask for their favorite song for Rock or Metal or whatever we playing that night, talk about music share normal metal head stuff, and please feel free to moshpit the fuck out of the place.

The outside operation we always going to have an open door to everyone to either join our FC or our discord where our goal is to unite and connect all metal bars under one banner the family we are, no matter where in the world you are we love music
WE ARE BROTHERS, SISTERS, WARRIORS OF METAL, WE ARE THE HAMMER OF THE GODS THUNDER WIND AND RAIN.  ImL

name: The Great Below
description: Siyra Phemduk has been a resident of the Lavender Beds since 2016 with her husband Ser Phemduk. Shes always been a huge housing fan and enthusiast, helping others decorate, and manage her free company home's décor as well. It wasn't until recently she started to venture out to actual venues around Primal.

Siyra decided to turn her humble abode into a relaxing venue for adventurers looking for a place to rest, take a dip in a hot tub after a long day, or grab something to eat and drink. She was inspired to do so by other relaxing venues like The Nomnomazu, and the Senpan Tea House.

The Great Below serves six different menus (please note all times are listed in Pacific time): breakfast (available 5:00AM to 11:00AM), lunch (available 11:00AM to 6:00PM), dinner (available 6:00PM to 10:00PM), Waffle House Hours (available 11:00PM to 5:00AM), dessert (available at all hours), and a variety of beverages (available at all hours). If your host does not tell you what menu is currently being served, please don't hesitate to ask!

name: Azure
description: We are an elegant underwater/amaurot themed night club. We have a full RP service bar, courts and giveaways every night!

name: The Ninth Twilight Fine Dining Restaurant
description: Join us this evening at The Ninth Twilight Fine Dining Restaurant for a night of elegance and wonder. An unique fine dining experience unparalleled to all other. From top tier service to a cuisine of artisan mastery for a night to remember. Serving brunch, high tea, dinner and dessert. Dine with us under the twilit sky.
✧Reservations are available. Inquire with Discord Twine Twilight#0684

name: Club Bizar
description: Club Bizar is the place where the crazy people meet, at the place where we can be free. Come and find out why it's called the BASSment as our staff and Dj's set the vibes to MASSIVE! Bring your friends and make new ones, as most of the conversations are done in /say.
We open every other Saturday. Please check out our Carrd or Discord for when we open next and find out if the theme of the night fits to your liking!

name: Sweet Puffs
description: Sweet Puffs is an NPC run, Thavnairian inspired Hookah Lounge and Dessert Bar specializing in Shisha and Hannish inspired faire. Designed to be a relaxed and chill social venue located in Ishgard. Sit back, relax, and enjoy your time in the warm atmosphere. Order a Hookah with your selection of Shisha. Enjoy the clouds with a cold drink, hot meal, or sweet treat.

name: The Temple of Menphina
description: The Temple of Menphina offers an immersive, heavy RP experience, in which visitors are welcome to partake in the worship of Menphina. We offer sermons that teach on topics related to love, generosity, and ingenuity. Our clergy are available for spiritual guidance, healing services, and a variety of blessings in the Goddesses name.
All are welcome, whether you are a devout follower of Menphina or merely a weary soul seeking a moments respite.

name: Golden Night Casino
description: The Golden Night Casino is the first casino to allow our guests to gamble gil while offline! A fun, formal place where gambling-addicts and esteemed gentlemen and gentleladies alike can gather around for a good time.

name: Cuffed
description: Cuffed is a BDSM focused venue, with high protocol and one of a kind design. We feature talented DJS from all over Eorzea and host weekly themed events.

name: Club Extasy
description: Club Extasy is a place where people come to have fun, whether it's dancing to our famous Clarity Pinkinishy Djing for the people they love, relaxing in the unique designer hot tub to give you the ultimate roleplaying immersion, or just talking to friends surrounded by the most critically acclaimed decor. Everyone who sets foot in the club wants to come back again and again, so don't wait for another opportunity to unleash the beast in you for a night or two, because at Club Extasy everyone is welcome and loved for who they are.

Also the Club is looking for new staff, will you be the next to come and work and earn lots of gils while having fun? we are looking for; Bartender, Greeter, Promoters for weekdays between 8pm and 12pm East. Join our discord to find out more about the positions offered and the more than competitive pay associated with Extasy as a place of Luxury.

name: The Carmine Coeurl Host and Hostess Club
description: The Carmine Coeurl Host and Hostess Club offers a genuine, immersive roleplaying experience that's entirely SFW. Enjoy the premium bottle service and the company of our wonderful hosts and hostesses as one might wind down for the evening, with the luxury of being attended to at a high-end Host Club. Everything from delicacies from almost every region of Etheryis, and liquors that one might find to be the First of their kind.

name: Club Meowijuana
description: Club Meowijuana is a high class nightclub on Diabolos, offering a safe, friendly and welcoming atmosphere both in our venue but also in our discord community. We strive to make the gap between clubs and the bard/RP scene a little smaller by offering events for both and welcome everyone. Whether you would like to attend a DJ event or a Open Mic Night, we got you covered!

name: Blind☆Namazu
description: The Blind☆Namazu speakeasy is an LGBTQ-affirming environment that caters to adults 18+. This venue has a stage, open bar, locker room, hot tub, dance poles, and snuggly nooks for your enjoyment. Enjoy a refreshing drink, catch up with friends, and most of all have fun. Please enjoy our cozy chaotic vibes.

name: Sleepy Cat Cafe
description: The cafe is to be a safe space for people to come relax and enjoy a warm drink and a sweet treat before heading off on their next big adventure. We wish to make everyone feel welcome while being respectful to other patrons who might be visiting.

name: The HIVE
description: Welcome the HIVE, Honeybees! ♥️ We're one of Aether's oldest and most treasured 18+ nightclubs.

Tonight, enter into the honeycombe and get lost in the sweet aroma of a first class, night time experience complete with a fully stocked bar of honey delights, sweet dancers, lustful courtesans, and a casino almost as addictive as treats from the host, Honey Bee, herself.

name: The Cuddle Den
description: The Cuddle Den is the coziest place on Eorzea, or your money back! We're a cozy cafe that offers one on one cuddle sessions with our lovely staff. Book one, just enjoy a treat, or even just come by to relax, all is welcomed!

name: Bar Downbeat
description: [18+] Bar Downbeat is a space for WLW to relax, chat about life, and flirt.
We aim to bring the feeling of a safe, cozy, intimate jazz bar where ladies and femmebys can truly be themselves.

name: Sweet Dream Cafe
description: Between life and death, sleep and wake, there is a thin veil we call a dream. Here, weary adventurers may cross that veil into our humble establishment, where  you may enter a dream and relax. Allow our staff to care for you, and help yourself to whatever you may need. We offer food/drinks, RP experience, and Gposing. Enjoy!

name: The Scions Rest Adventurers Guild
description: Need an adventurer or a place where you can listen to others stories?
Are you maybe in search of the next big adventure quest?
Even if you just want a place to spend the night at or refill your stock of supplies for the next undertaking, feel free to visit us.

name: Urban
description: Urban is a 3 floor modern-style 18+ nighclub where our only wish is for everyone just to have fun and relax.

This Friday we welcome you to our Easter Party @Urban! We are celebrating the joy and renewal of the Easter holiday with a night of music, dancing, and fun. Whether you are here to let loose with friends or meet new people, we have something for everyone. We will start outdoors with a easter egg hunt and we'll open doors right after that. Our DJs will be spinning the hottest tracks and we have plenty of drinks to keep you refreshed as you groove the night away. So put on your best Easter attire and get ready to party like never before.

name: The Glam Closet
description: The Glam Closet - Crystal’s Premier Glam Atelier and Boutique!

Looking for a new outfit for the upcoming season ahead? Need a look for your days off of adventuring? Looking for the right dress to wear to that Eternal Bonding Ceremony? Need something specially made? We have it here at The Glam Closet.

name: Rivendell Tavern
description: Rivendell Tavern is a medieval themed venue with an immersive medieval experience.

name: Geminus Massage & Spa
description: LGBTQ+ friendly! GM&S is a cozy and intimate massage parlor that offers SFW and NSFW massages for 500k gil/hour. Come by to get pampered or pleasured for an hour or two! We currently have 2 locations that each have 2 massage tables and 2 hot tubs, but are looking to expand as soon as the lottery system allows!
We also offer "after hours" appointments scheduled through our Discord server, as well as a VIP service for getting a free massage every month~
Please be aware that we do not hire or serve Lalafell or similarly-proportioned characters.

name: Pages Pastries and Petals
description: Pages Pastries and Petals is a cozy Café and Bookstore where you can have a nice cup of tea, a cooling sandwich, pick up a new book to read, or just chat with staff and other patrons!

name: Lulu's Hideaway
description: Come relax in a little slice of the Shroud. Take a relaxing bath or have a seat with some snacks and music with the Pomya's

name: OJ Lily Pad
description: Pleasant and Inviting Atmosphere
With an open stage for any aspiring bards
Relaxing baths on our 2nd floor
We serve hot and cold revitalizing non-alcoholic drinks.
A place to go just to get away, to be alone, or to hang out with friends.

name: The Ascension Nightclub
description: Let yourself drift with the music of our DJs on the dance floor, get a cool drink at the bar, enjoy the thrill of a win at our gambling table, treat ourself to the comforts of our VIP area or have fun and relax in one of our private rooms with our dancers. Our DJs play a wide range of music styles for you so everyone can find something they enjoy. We also host a variety of themed events almost every week! So don't hesitate and come ascend with us every Thursday evening!

name: Meow Mix
description: We offer drinks, food, and company with our lovely staff. Come kick back and relax with friends or make new ones here with us!

name: The Growling Yurt - CaveSpa
description: To all those weary of travel and long days of work, The Growling Yurt has opened it's Doors for the Public!

For those in need of a well deserved Rest, a natural Cave-Bathhouse, a well stocked Bar with Drinks and Food of the Steppe and the Shroud, [SFW] - Massages administered by a well trained Staff and even shamanistic Practices like casting Runes, Dream Reading and more will await you!
Organized and maintained by the Claws and Horns Company, this Oasis of mostly untouched Nature is here to please and enjoy!
LOCATED IN GOBLET, WARD 25, PLOT 34!

name: Safe Shallows Bed & Breakfast
description: Safe Shallows is a bed and breakfast with a focus on being a getaway and family style venue. We offer a variety of rooms, sitting room, and an eatery.

name: Starbuns
description: Starbuns serves the best corporate tasting coffee in all of Eorzea! Offering quality services like live bard music, art sketches and free WiFi !!

name: Dark Desires Club
description: The Dark Desires Community is born for people willing to find more friends into the kinky world and lovers of latex clothing, respecting every member peculiarities, highlighting the differences because they are the most beautiful part of us! the venue itself has been funded by the members of the group, our events aim to create that cozy warm ambient where you feel welcomed in, come to visit us, even once, maybe u'll find your new group of friends!

name: The Graveyard
description: A goth nightclub with an immersive experience and dark music.

name: The Black Python
description: We offer a Fully stocked Bar, dancing, and Blackjack

name: on the echoing green
description: come abouts "on the echoing green" -  an rp-focused cafe & pub for adventurers, wandering souls, & those seeking comfort in good company and good food! unwind at the end of your week (or the middle of it!) with a cup of tea, coffee, whisky, or any of our simple but savoury fare - let the wears of your days fade away behind the sound of laughter and good cheer "on the echoing green"!

name: High Haus
description: European ale house meets modern aesthetics at this club deep in the heart of Ishgard. Offering a full bar, live music, and only the finest entertainers. RP is encouraged but not required!

name: Archer's Den
description: If you haven't been to Archer's Den before, we are a lively bard concert establishment that encourages cheering, dancing, and a lil goofing around, although one is more than welcome to just have a seat and chill during the show! We also have multiple big prize giveaways every show!

name: Starlite Noodles
description: We are a Japanese style Noodle Shop & Inn. You are welcome to Dine in or Order out. Have a meal and some drinks afterwards you can go have a massage

name: Majo No Reibu
description: We are an 18+ modern pink-burlesque cyber witchcore fusion nightclub. Reminiscent of the masquerade and cyberpunk with a gothic twist, a duality you won't want to miss. LGBTQIA+ friendly, empathetic, and driven queer ownership. Our venue welcomes RP, ERPs, ravers and all to our sanctuary. Visit for wild raves, fashion contests, giveaways, themed nights, and so much more. Owned by DJ/Producer/VTuber RemmyDaWitch, Rem Samejima, and the Shark Lady, Mizuki Samejima, we aim to please. For those willing to risk it all partying with otherworldly sweeties, the Majo No Reibu is the place for mew ♥.

name: Bassment Beats
description: Bassment Beats was founded on the principle of bringing the community together it is a safe haven for all. Bassment Beats is themed after those parties we would all go to or throw when our parents would leave for the weekend, and we would have those amazing ragers. Most of the time depending on where you lived, it was most likely in the basement. All you would hear is "Don't break my parents stuff please" in the beginning but then you would get so plastered that when you woke up the next morning in the front yard, you would turn to see all of the red solo cups everywhere, furniture destroyed, and your Mom/Dads favorite object in the whole world shattered on the floor. But hey it was one hell of a night, that you would never ever regret having. But hey, if you wake up in our front lawn with us, we will make sure to give you breakfast and water.
Bassment Beats Opens on Tuesdays from 11pm to 1am EST, and on Sunday nights from 10pm till 2am EST.  Our Grand Opening is set for Jan 3rd, 2023

name: Black Rose Lounge
description: A place of refuge where you can relax and have a nice drink to drown away your sorrows.
For the more adventurous traveler, there is an adult playroom and a mini spa, with an area to relax.. after ^^

name: Wayfinder Tavern
description: We are a small medieval tavern ready to welcome all travelers and offer you a comfortable warm and cozy atmosphere!
We offer food drinks and an open stage for all!
We also have an active quest board where you can earn a small bag of coins for your reward!

name: Cactuar Cantina
description: Cactuar Cantina is a laid-back happy hour spot for Thanalan's commonfolk to drop in for a drink, grab some local gossip and a bite of regional fare. You'll find Lichyard Libations brand Nopales Moonshine produced in the ground floor distillery, and featured in specialty house cocktails downstairs. We also host a pop-up tattoo parlour, '1001 Needles'. Our barkeeps are a pair of chatty Lalafellin pals, bringing you "The friendliest saloon this side of the dunes!"

name: The Stardust Lounge
description: The Stardust Lounge is a dimly lit, Celestial experience that evokes cozy vibes where people can come and enjoy a perpetual starry night!

name: Nethergate
description: As fragmented, imperfect beings, yours is a never-ending quest. A quest to find your purpose, knowing your end is assured. To find the strength to continue, when all strength has left you. To find joy, even as darkness descends. And amidst deepest despair, light everlast 🌸

name: Hallowed Grounds
description: Hallowed Grounds is an ishgardian coffee house with relaxing atmosphere and music. It features ground floor cosy seating and a beautiful underground garden cafe.
You are welcome to come for a cup of coffee or hot chocolate and stay for as long as you like, with friends or on your own. Relax with us, read a book while sipping your favourite comfort drink.

name: Crystal Crossroads
description: Crystal Crossroads Premier Gambling & Auction House!

You have found yourself at Crystal Crossroads! Whether it be for the purpose of business or pleasure, we pride ourselves in being able to strike any deal you may desire. Come test your luck! You may make the deal of your life…or perhaps lose your soul! Get ready to strike a deal and possibly walk away richer than you started at Crystal Crossroads! We got Unique Gambling Games, Public Auctions, Eloquent Drinks, and a RP Environment you can’t find anywhere else!

name: Lune's Fae Cafe
description: Lune's Fae Cafe is a little cozy spot that gives a little bit of Gridania and Il Mheg a home right here in Ishgard. We wanted a place where adventurers could warm themselves and enjoy something sweet and comfortable while they may be away from home. One can expect a warm welcome, variety in drink and foods, music some nights, and just an overall relaxing vibe to the place.

name: Mizumi Restaurant & Club
description: Looking for something cozy and relaxing? Are you tired of hunting primals all day, and just want to let out some steam and maybe enjoy some nice meal made by a professional sushi chef for dinner? Then MIZUMI is the right place for you!We provide the most delicious food in a relaxing far eastern atmosphere , where you can enjoy the company of our professional entertainers and waiters. Let yourself be served at the table, all you need to do, is lay back in comfort, and snap your finger to call one of our waiters to you, they will try their utmost best to make you forget about everything that happened during the day. If you fancy one of them, they can be even your extra dessert, or your company at the table.
We provide special services in the vip lounge, where you get extra entertainment and massages by our wonderful dancers, to not only please your stomach but also your body.

name: Rain NightClub
description: A very high-energy nightclub that does everything possible to make every minute you spend here as fun as possible!
Services include Bar / Private Rooms / RP Companions / Live DJs / Giveaways / And tons of Fun Contests we think up all the time to set us apart from others!

notices.message: This venue is currently opening once every 2 weeks, check the discord to see if it's open!

name: Leading Nowhere
description: Leading Nowhere is an immersive roleplay venue with a huge focus on providing a comfy space for all patrons. If you are looking for a place to bring your date, then sit by the booth and enjoy our wide variety of cuisines! For the brave ones, sit by the bar and undertake one of our many menu challenges! We also always have host or hostesses always on the lookout for patrons to RP with and involve in environment.

name: Paradise Nightclub
description: Paradise Nightclub is your number one stop for a great time and Jäger! With over 1 year of experience in the FFXIV clubbing scene we pride ourselves on our commitment to provide our guests with the best possible experience by providing various services and non stop jams every week. Each week we provide you with two openings on Wednesday and Saturday to give everyone the opportunity to come by and have a great time with us alongside some of the greatest DJ’s around.

All of us at Paradise hope that you can enjoy yourselves with us and brighten the week or send it out with a bang, you can find us at our large venue in the glorious Lavender Beds, we can’t wait to meet you!

name: Dollhouse
description: Dollhouse is a Pink and Sparkly 2 year old venue located on Primal DC. We are a SFW venue, offering a full sweets bar, talented DJS and fun events.

name: Orchid Lounge
description: A verdant bar & bathhouse with made-to-order drinks and food, hookah, and hot baths.

name: Hallowed Hearth Inn
description: A laid back, heavy RP tavern set in the Goblet, Hallowed Hearth Inn is just one aspect of the Hallowed Hearth, an Eorzean aid organization. The inn is always open but is staffed on Monday nights. No gil is required, so come RP with us!

name: Nightclub Unrighteous
description: Nightclub Unrighteous is a fresh 18+ venue with live music, bar, exotic dancers and gambling to enjoy throughout the night. Come and hit our dancefloor and enjoy cozy corners with good company! We are ready to deliver you the Friday feeling you really need.

name: The Cabaret Grand
description: Welcome, honored guests!
The Cabaret Grand is the plush pinnacle of style and roleplay, and our staff can't wait to delight you!

Kick back and relax with one of our drinks, or hit the dance floor with company.  If you're in the mood for companionship, we have an assortment of intriguing hosts and enthralling escorts to sweep you off your feet and give you the night of your dreams.
We are devoted to interaction, inclusivity, and riveting roleplay.  Come join us for a fabulous time!
Cheers, to the time of your night!

name: The Liminal Rust Tea House
description: A SFW RP tea house, with eerie vibes, which will provide you an unique experience. Get to know the teatender and his secrets behind the tea, and remember...
This is a Tea House, after all 🙂

name: The Playgirl Palace
description: 18+ Exotic Midnight club and Erotic Magazine serving you with tasty drinks of all kinds and live 𝓜usic.

The best roleplaying companions and luxurious party palace in Lavender beds. Here to give you thotcore at the trendiest of times.“Rpers” of all skill levels recommended to stop by and share a taste of our yummiest playgirls in the house or just party with the playmates~

name: Patch-Up Pastries
description: Hungry? Craving that morning coffee? Needing something with medical properties, but tastes good? Stop by Patch-Up Pastries! The small bakery offers a wide assortment of baked goods, both classical and medicinal. We specialize in medicinal pastries that taste good, called medicakes.

name: The Cafe Fortemps - Siren
description: The Cafe Fortemps is a causal in-character focused Roleplay Cafe. We welcome all role players of all experience levels to come in and join us for a cup of Ishgardian Tea (Or Whiskey) and chat with your friends or our hosts. Looking for a great place for a first date? Got you! Want to meet up with friends before or after a static raid? We got plenty of space for all your crew. Looking to make plans for economic domination of the marketplace or the salvation of the void? We’re here to help fuel those ideas. Join us at The Cafe Fortemps and make roleplay stories happen.

name: Nightbloom
description: Nightbloom is a long forgotten shrine to the lunar goddess Tsukuyomi. The radiance of her celestial majesty shines down upon these halls, bathing those who follow her will in a blessed light. Yet her whims are fickle, her divine radiance knows both pleasure and torment. Those who dare to deny her brilliance will find their world eclipsed in a torrent of carnal bloodlust, doomed to experience the agony of her loving embrace.

name: Cafe Nakama
description: A relaxing cafe with chill vibes and friendly staff. We sell food, drinks, and snacks for anyone to enjoy while they take a break from their adventures. Open weekly on Tuesdays, 7-9pm EST.

name: PYRAMIDE
description: PYRAMIDE is a cozy 18+ Nightclub with a grotto-vibe.
We compensate for the small space with a family atmosphere and good moods where you can just let yourself go for a while.
Enjoy your time with dancing, drinking delicious cocktails or just feeling the music with eyes closed.

name: The Black Lotus
description: The Black Lotus is an immersive RP teahouse and eatery located off the beaten path in Ishgard. Owned and operated by the Elezen known as Salea, the environment is meant to encourage social interaction in the downstairs area, while offering a light and homey reading area upstairs all while enjoying tea and hearty food sourced from all over the Star. Stop on by, you never know who you're going to meet while delighting in a refreshing cup of tea after all~

name: The Menagerie
description: The Menagerie is a dessert café and cocktail bar located in Empyreum. Our main floor offers a more traditional café experience perfectly suited for date night, while our cocktail lounge downstairs hosts a large dance floor and bard stage suitable for ensembles, perfect for those wanting a more social experience.

name: Enigma
description: Enigma is a (18+) Venue offering a beautiful sceneic and interactive experience. We offer open longue seating, a full photo booth, in-house Blackjack and a full dance floor with a bar for all your sweet indulgences. Come get weird. Welcome to Enigma.

name: Momo's Maid Cafe
description: Welcome to Momo's Maid Cafe! We're a cute maid cafe by day, and a funky dance floor by the end of the night! Treat yourself to some warm pastries and delicious drinks while you dance along!~

name: Nova
description: NOVA is your premier destination that delivers service and quality in everything we do. Live music with Eorzea's top DJs, masterfully crafted cocktails and a lavish dance floor await you. Come for a nightlife experience out of this world.  Nova opens biweekly on Sundays from 6pm - 10pm ST

name: Phoenix Nights X
description: Experience the unparalleled rush of Phoenix Nights. One of the oldest casino nightclubs on FFXIV, we are dedicated to delivering a fast-paced, high-octane, and flawless gambling experience you won't find anywhere else. As featured in PC Gamer UK, welcomed personalities such as Preach & Zepla. Taste the new era of Gambling that has transformed the EU Gambling Scene, now in NA!

name: Temple of Zodiark
description: A little temple/sanctum dedicated to Zodiark (and Hydaelyn) and honoring those who's lives were lost to fulfill a greater good for the life of our star! We hold weddings, small pop up parties, and more!

name: Luxuria
description: Nestled by the trunk and under the boughs of Senna's Pride in Lavender Beds, the Luxuria provides a high class experience for its discerning guests and clientele.  Live music and DJs play within their halls to entertain their guests while their bar serves all manners of drinks from every corner of the twelve.  Hidden away from the eyes of the guard, its escorts provide warm companionship and warmer intimacy to their clients, taking them on wild adventures greater than anything Eorzea has to offer.  Won't you come and find your happiness within?

name: Midnight Mirage
description: Midnight Mirage is a 18+ LGBTQ+ venue looking to provide an immersive rp experience and supportive queer community to those who join us! Community rp events, immersive story, and over all fun rp experience for those interested in both nsfw and sfw side of writing. We offer courts, tarot readers, a fully stocked bar, as well as giveaways, raffles, and holiday events!

name: The Cat's Meow
description: RP Jazz Bar and Lounge!

name: The Bees Knees Speakeasy
description: The Bees Knees Speakeasy is a RP venue designed as a Cigar/Hookah lounge with a staircase hidden behind the bookshelf. Come by and have a drink or sit down at a table/booth and enjoy some food. All drinks and food are crafted from scratch using the freshest ingredients that we gather ourselves! Try your luck at our gambling tables as well! We have a live bard performance every week as well.

name: Introvert Lounge
description: Wednesday Afternoon:
Open Stage
Starlight photo booth
Hours:
AFK Lounge opens at: 2:00pm EST
RP Lounge starts at: 11:00pm - 2:30am

Introvert Lounge welcomes all types of adventurers to relax at our small corner of Eorzea. From very sociable, timid, reserved, raiders, crafters, sprouts, anxious, and the lot of the different mix of adventurers!!! Bards and Tarot readers are welcome as well

name: Poison Blue
description: Poison Blue: an LGBT+, 18+ nightclub for all the partying your heart desires. Sweet party tunes, talented dancers, and a bespoke cocktail menu keep the party going all night long. With glam contests and themed events every other week, why not hop across the pond and join us for a night like no other?

name: Freya's Tavern
description: A cozy tavern tucked away in the Black Shroud welcoming adventurers of all types. There you will find SFW RP in an immersive, but still relaxed atmosphere, good company, and an owner who would be honored with your presence!

name: Ventuno Cafe
description: Ventuno Cafe is now OPEN, join us for a coffe or a glass of wine, Light - Lich - Goblet W24 - P10 - ventunocafe.carrd.co/

name: Bunboy Hooters
description: ♥ Bunboy Hooters is a venue employed entirely by male vieras, ready to serve you! ♥ We are RP and AFK friendly, so feel free to stop by if you wanna chat or just vibe to music.
♥ When we're open we'll almost always have food, drinks, bards, courtesans, and gambling.

name: The Cosmic Star
description: The Cosmic Star, looking to serve everyone from all walks of life. Come relax in the upstairs lounge or go downstairs and listen to some music while you sit down at the bar and have your favorite drink and food. Here at the Cosmic Star we hope you'll find what you need to turn around a bad day or end a good day with an even better note.

name: Dragonfyre
description: Dragonfyre is an immersive upscale lounge offering a variety of drinks and food prepared fresh daily. In the basement is a different story. Under the posh furnishings of the upstairs lounge lies the Dragonfyre Arena, home of the Ultimate Dragon Fighting League. Every second and fourth wednesday's are fight nights where members of the UDFL fight it out for prize money while the patrons can bet on individual fights on the card. On non fight nights the downstairs will be treated like a club for patrons to dance and have fun.

name: SketchBooks: Art Cafe
description: SketchBooks: Art Cafe is an in game art cafe where you can meet fellow artists and keep each other company while you work. Discuss techniques, share your artwork, make friends! You don't have to be an artist to come chill; as the goal is to offer a comfy place for people to interact with similar interests. Whether a beginner artist, professional artist, artist that is in-between, or someone who just likes to admire artwork; you are most welcome to stop on by!

name: Emissary
description: A monthly pop-up venue, Emissary holds a focus on promoting music and DJs, and letting party goers enjoy the night under echoes of fallen stars.

name: PHO KING
description: Pho king is a RP friendly night club from the Marlboro shard. We host fun events such as Giveaways, Dancing, Fortune Telling, also games and prizes! We love to party it up and have a good time we want people to have fun while enjoying that atmosphere of the club.

name: 226 Club
description: Based on a Chicago club in the 1920s, it was shut down due to it's shady Mafia background and rebranded. And since blood is a big expense, Hype Squad Mafia is here to bring it back! Come to Al Capone's favorite club and the hottest speakeasy on Primal - whether your with friends, the family, or by yourself looking for somebody. We would love to make you an offer you can't refuse! <a:wine:881435440933138444>

name: Anthea's Oracle Café
description: The Oracle Café is a small home away from home. Please come in and enjoy a warm drink, something fresh out of the oven, and even an oracle reading if you are willing to peek at your fortune.

name: Myths & Legends Tavern
description: Before you stands a door seeming to appear out of nowhere yet looks and feels like it has always been there. Was it just looked over? It slowly opens and chatter can be heard and rich scents of a well cared for Tavern comes wafting out. As one steps through the door a feeling passing a powerful thrush hold passes through. The Barkeep waves with a ready smile and says to sit anywhere.

Come and enjoy our weekly mini events or themed nights. Live Bard music and if you want to take the stage just ask any of the staff. A rich lore setting. Are you new to RP no worries we welcome players of all levels. Just want a beautiful place to relax well check out the bathhouse.

name: Lunaria
description: Lunaria is designed to be a higher-class and relaxing Bar & Lounge venue for all to enjoy. Want a place to chill with a group of friends, or relax after a long day?
Whatever your need is for coming here, we will, and have tried our best to make sure Lunaria is a good fit.

name: Devil's Ambrosia
description: Are you ready to enter a place that will excite every one of your senses to the fullest?

Devil's Ambrosia is unlike anything you've ever seen. A place completely focused on BDSM where desires come true and inhibitions magically disappear... or with the right glass of drink to offer you a unique experience. Be warned that these  drinks that can have a strong effect on you if you don't choose carefully so always ask our bartenders what they can cause before taking a sip. We also offer Gamba, Escorts and Dancers that are very well trained in the art of BDSM, and even an area where you can be  more.. at ease..
Keep in mind that Devil's Ambrosia is a +18 venue, and that you immediately agree to be beyond that age range when walking into our sinful territory.

name: The Sapphic Scale
description: We're a sapphic roleplay lounge working to build a little community of female identifying peoples to make a space where you can roleplay, relax, and unwind. Have a few drinks, sink into the hot tub, or flirt with that cute girl on the couch!
We're a SFW venue during open hours! After we close however, we have After Hours and allow NSFW. Announcement will be made to alert visitors.
The Sapphic Scale is for those who identify or present as female! We allow non-binary characters as well. We request no male characters join the venue, thank you!

name: The Last Light
description: Making your way through the dingy back-alley you hear the steady thump of bass disturbing the cobblestones beneath your feet... As you approach a doorway to your right, you spy a steaming cup of coffee seemingly left behind by a wizened security guard. With no one watching the door, a smile lights your face as you descend the steps into the darkness of a starlit club...

name: Rock N' Raven
description: 50's Old Time Soda Fountain / Hard Rock Cafe

name: Ruby Red Flower Shop
description: Shop for the perfect flower for a new budding romance, a memorable anniversary gift, or a simple but yet significant "I love you" gesture! I will help you choose the perfect flower for your special occasion!

name: Meili's Repose
description: A cozy little cottage tucked away somewhere in the Black Shroud, Meili's Repose offers a relaxed restaurant/bar atmosphere for travelers who need to put up their feet after a long day on the road.

name: Comfy Cozy Cafe
description: Welcome to the Comfy Cozy Cafe! We're a group of friends with a passion for having fun and goofing around. The owner wanted to make a place where all her friends can come to chill, relax, and have fun at a cozy cafe - where they can explore, roleplay, relax or AFK. Everyone is welcome at the CCC, please enjoy your stayd

name: Fenrir's Fang
description: Fenrir's Fang is a edgy/emo themed venue! The staff are very chill, we enjoy hosting giveaways, interacting with clients, and holding all kinds of events. We play a variety of music, ranging from emo/rock/metal to edm! We sell private dances from our lovely set of dancers (can be kept SFW or NSFW if dancer gives consent), we have a bar with a great selection of drinks- including a alcoholic and non alcoholic Baja Blast, and we have gambling!

name: Noise Complaint
description: Noise Complaint is a rock venue that strives to provide a virtual experience mimicking that of a real life rock show. Billed bands are encouraged to interact with the audience, joke around, tell stories, or entertain in any way they see fit.
All drinks from the bar and merch from the booth are free. There's nothing more punk rock than free beer.
[*Noise Complaint is fully insured. Moshing, stage diving, and lighting guitars on fire are not just allowed, but encouraged!*]

name: The Traders' Respite
description: An immersive RP cafe for all with an open stage and an Ul'dahn theme. Come relax and have a coffee or hot chocolate with us!
Open every other Wednesday 7-10 pm CST

name: The Firehouse
description: The weekend may be coming to a close, but the party doesn't have to stop! Light a fire on our dance floor, warm yourself up by our bar, or stoke your coffers at our tables. We're sending the weekend out in a blaze of glory!

name: The Fae Wilds Tea Grotto
description: The Fae Wilds Tea Grotto is a curious tea café and cozy respite. Upstairs you can order a drink of your choice and sit by the fire in our charming tea room. Downstairs you'll find more seating, as well as our comfy loft and faerie nook.
SFW RP only. RP is not required 🙂

name: Wafflegoth
description: Join us for some laughs as we celebrate spooky season year round.

name: The Wallflower
description: A beautiful SFW café.

name: Usaginosokutsu
description: The Rabbits' Den is an 18+ only night-club. We open from 8-11PM EST with some after hours. Luxuriant gothic Hingan-themed dance club and lounge. Usaginosokutsu began in a small Shirogane apartment space before moving to our new location in Empyreum, where we offer music, drinks, dance, a casino, and various other pleasantries that come with the night life! We're also roleplay friendly, and most of us spend our time in-character regarding the staff!

We rotate live DJ's and on nights we can't, we have a house DJ who offers plenty of playlist selections. So, even if we don't feature anything specific, we have something for everyone. We also hold plenty of events like cosplay contest, auctions, barding events and more.
You can find our twitch channel here: https://www.twitch.tv/usaginosokutsu

name: Third Eye Sushi
description: It’s that time of the week! NightRaid’s partnered establishment will be open for Happy Hour! Bring your friends, lovers, or colleagues to enjoy a night of doman cuisine! All drinks during HAPPY HOUR are discounted. Go through our specials and various types of sushi and doman dishes on the menu! 🍶 Special guest performances usually the second half of Happy Hour!

notices.message: This venue is usually open at the below times at the discretion of the owner, it is not a fixed schedule. Please check the discord's announcements channel before visiting. 😉

name: The Chrysalis
description: Open the LAST MONDAY OF EVERY MONTH ONLY, The Chrysalis, a fully sfw Ascian themed night club and host club, is located in the stunning Shirogane housing district.  The club boasts a full bar and "Trial Arena" dancefloor in its basement, as well as a smaller lounge and a private room available for rent for parties.

name: The Gilded Knob
description: Eorzea's Premier RP Entertainment Venue. Come relax with our professional dancers, a team of talented bar staff ready to cater to your every thirst, and our top-rate atmosphere and hospitality. Spend your evening in the loving embrace of our staff, enjoy our new drink menu, play a few games at our Gilded Casino, and explore our beautiful venue! [The Gilded Knob] Where all your dreams are Golden!

name: Amazone's Club
description: At the Amazone's club, we offert you an exotic night in our jungle cavern theme club.
Our Dj will make you shake your booty on our dancefloor and we will serve you some exotics Cocktails made by our amazing amazones in our bar, while our photographer immortalize you night with us.
We are open every Saturdays from 19ST to 24ST.

name: Prominence
description: Prominence is a paradise for those looking to more deeply explore the world of electronic music within a stunning and bold new club design concept. A lush, warm, and welcoming atmosphere sets the mood while our carefully selected DJ talent provides the soundtrack to keep you groovin’ all night long.
PLEASE NOTE:  Open every other week. Check website / discord for specific opening dates.

notices.message: This venue is open every over week, please check the venue's discord to confirm if the venue is currently open!

name: The Foxden
description: The Foxden is a Modern Nightclub situated in The Lavender Beds that Specialises in EDM and DnB music with a Fox Theme within the venue~
We offer Foxy Thursdays and Theme'd Saturdays, changing our Saturday Theme every week to give you all something different~
So why not come on down and join us, maybe youu can even find all the cute little Foxes we have hidden around~

name: Crystal NPC Cafe
description: A sfw rp venue/cafe where the staff are your favorite NPCs from FFXIV! a fun, friendly location to make new friends and chat with the characters you have grown so close to in your time playing

name: Tree House
description: Tree House is a SFW, RP, tavern, cafe, and bath house featuring live music and friendly staff.

name: Blue Hour
description: Blue Hour is an 18+ underground lounge that was inspired by Persona 4's Velvet Room and the Cyberpunk Bartender Action VA - 11 Hall - A, welcoming any and every player, ranging from non - roleplayers to roleplayers, and even welcoming AFKers! Blue Hour's main goal  is to provide a safe, chill spot for those to wind down in, whether it be from running content, clubbing too much, or just looking for someone to talk with. Right here, you can take a dive into the mellow atmosphere.

name: The Bunker
description: Welcome to The Bunker also know as Rusted Bunker we run a Nier factory themed venue with mostly rock/metal music but will change it up from time to time, we welcome new and experienced rp players or anyone who just wants to chill  ,we hope you have a great time while in the bunker, we also offer a range of drinks with bartenders offering there own one of a kind drink as well with a place to relax dance meet new friends and catch up with old ones, we are open every Friday 7:00pm st - till late
Location
Light DC | Shiva |  Empyreum | Ward 24 / Plot 52

name: The Fire Pit
description: Located in the basement of the Hearth, home of Torchlight Ventures, The Fire Pit is a family friendly tavern that's known for its Eorzean soul food, welcoming IC staff, and a stage to promote performers in the RP community! Its casual setting is welcoming to all and we hope to see you soon!

name: Konno Twice
description: The Konno Twice is a Nightclub on Light - Alpha. We stand for a relaxed and family atmosphere, while the club itself is built in a black and modern style. The Owners are the resident DJ's of the club and want their guests to enjoy the evening and also themselves as soon as they enter through the main door. The Staff of the Club is always there for you and your needs.

name: Dragonfire Pub
description: A lovely pub with friendly staff. Come and eat, drink and make friends.

name: The Great Work Shop
description: The Great Work Shop is a all-in-one stop shop for all your needs for your adventuring life. Are you need of supplies for your next raid? We got you! We still carry every dye in every color of the rainbow! Is there a housing project you are working on and need supplies or crystals for? We’re here to help.

name: Sassy Nightclub
description: Have you ever felt sassy sometimes? Yes, de feel like that all the time, and we are also here to represent ourselves as Royal Family, in service to you our Royal Guests. Do not worry because we are not scary folk, just a bunch of people who want to have a good time and provide some for others so we all can enjoy our nights together with fancy music and a little bit of Role-Play activity. So why don't you come over and experience all we have to offer to you? What are you waiting for? Become a part of our Sassy Royal Family and let's have fun together.

name: Inari Nightclub
description: Inari Nightclub was born from a love of Eastern culture and the goal of bringing a similar feeling to Eorzea. Everything including our club design, menu, ambiance, and DJ choices will keep this core concept in mind. We hope you enjoy your time spent with us.
Location: Primal - Behemoth - Lavender Beds Ward 18 Plot 6
Venue Hours: 10:00 PM - 2:00 AM EST

name: The Mile High Lounge & Casino
description: Whether you're looking for a luxurious place to relax after a day of adventuring, a dance floor to vibe to some of the best DJs in Eorzea, want a professional GPose taken, or simply want to turn your pocket change into a fortune at our Casino, the Mile High Lounge & Casino strives to bring you an experience that soars above the rest.

name: Café Vesi
description: Café Vesi is a cozy cafe at the heart of the Shroud! We aim to offer a relaxed, cozy and chill atmosphere with simple foods, snacks and drinks with occasional tunes from our in-house bard. Come have a look at our small indoor garden, enjoy a nap in our pink plushy corner, or have a quiet moment with books & a cuppa by the fireplace.

name: Darlings
description: We are a larger club that's here for a good time, and to make friendships along the way.

name: Kitsune's Maid Cafe
description: Sore & Tired from a long day? Or do you just need to relax? Well come on down to the Kitsune's Maid Cafe and have our cute & fun staff take away your worries! We are the Perfect SFW date spot also! Our Newly build Aquarium (With a secret gift  shop!) Also provides a great place for pictures.

name: Sultana's Moon
description: Chill and cozy environment inspired in fantasy inns/taverns. A place to relax, soft-rp, chat or just afk. Open stage available, unless a band was hired.

name: AFK Lounge
description: AFK (Away From Kontent) is a premiere Auction Venue and hangout made for casual players, role-players and toxic quadruple legends alike.

After many of our members visited the bustling Primal nightlife scene, we felt inspired to throw our own hat into the ring and created a lounge space where we can meet the movers and shakers on our data center and get social. Since then, we have thrown massive parties and collaborated with numerous auction venues throughout Primal, establishing ourselves amongst our peers.
We are known to get rowdy and degenerate, so 18+ is strictly enforced.

name: Forgold Casino
description: 10k - 1mil bets! Seven unique games! High payouts! (1.5x - 20x and more!). Special free-to-play 'Battle Royale' mini games take place at the top of each hour with a completely house funded grand prize based on the number of players. Play for fun and play FORGOLD! ★ Goblin ★ Lav Beds ★ W4 ★ P9 ★ forgoldcasino.carrd.co
I realize random openings is not ideal, and I apologize for that!  I just really do not want this to feel like a job to me.  FUN is the name of the game. 🙂

name: On The Rocks
description: Overlooking Mist and the sea beyond, On The Rocks is a warm getaway for every weary adventurer. Stop in and warm up by the fire, grab one of our signature drinks, unwind with friends while listening to our bards, or jump up on stage and play us some songs yourself!

name: War Wiggies
description: War Wiggies is a cute little cafe with a bath house and open stage!

name: The Shelter
description: The Shelter is a 18+ Club operating on Light, Lich server at Empyreum Ward 7 - Plot 60. We offer many RP (& ERP) and practical services.
At The Shelter we care about bringing you the best experience possible, whether you're seeking some RP adventures, bringing up your party mood, gambling or just enjoying some awesome DJ sets!

name: StarMist Bathhouse and Lounge
description: 18+ Indoor/Outdoor Bathhouse and Lounge. Open 24/7 Staffed/Unstaffed. Come hang out and chat/AFK/RP. Anything goes, just mind the rules!

name: Jinxed Moxxie
description: In need of an early morning pick me up? Good food, sweet tunes, and a drink to wet your whistle? Come on over to the Jinxed Moxxie. We're a casual RP venue located in the Goblet.

name: The Gilded Lily
description: A cozy resort style Venue in the cold environs of Ishgard that provides succulent food, expertly crafted drinks, fabulous company, and a space for relaxation and titillation. Tips welcome. (No OOC gil required for food or drinks.)

name: Housecat's Den
description: Attention cat lovers! Imagine - a relaxing drink with a furry companion and a beach a step away! At the Housecats Den we are the destination for cat café enthusiasts and beach lovers. Come and enjoy our delicious menu of everything from snacks to full course meals! Our cats are waiting for pats, laps and meow chats!

name: Tabby's
description: Aether’s premiere pirate themed venue located inside an actual void pirate ship! Grog, gambling, live music and a plank to walk for more immersive deathroll tournaments!

name: Eien Nights
description: "Eien" means "eternal"

True to our name, the excitement never stops. Conceptualized around the tenants of opulent, classic design and modern allagan technology, Eien Nights is like nothing you've ever experienced before. Enjoy a passionate night with our famed dancefloor, card table, world class entertainment, and unforgettable VIP services.

name: Kolat's Rising Phoenix
description: Kolat's Rising Phoenix is an immersive Eorzean tavern built from the ground up to support and encourage the burgeoning RP community on Aether.

name: The Song Family Nightclub (TSFNC)
description: Welcome to TSFNC! THANK YOU FOR COMING! YOU ALL LOOK LOVELY ASF! MAKE SOME NOISE AND CHECK OUT OUR DOPE DJ!

name: Ashu Talif
description: Ashu Talif is a Thavnarian Meyhane serving traditional food, drinks, and entertainment. We are a heavy RP venue that caters to mature RP scenarios with no ERP. We host an in-house bard and have a few dancers. The Decor reflects the spirit of Thavnair and Radz-at-Han - The main floor is an 'open air' terrace overlooking the ocean, and our upstairs hosts our Hotsprings that you may soak your troubles away in a lush jungle atmosphere. While our physical address may be Ishgard, Once you are inside you are taken away to Radz-at-Han.

name: Seagreen Atelier
description: Immersive DIY-centered venue providing crafting discussion, help, and snacks.

name: Kindlewood Lodge
description: Tavern/Bar Lounge

name: The Boar's Head
description: The first ever plub open every other saturday

name: Hyper!
description: Hyper is a RP nightclub known for it's close-knit staff and immersive experiences. With themes changing regularly, including full rebuilds of the venue, every experience with Hyper will be unique and fun! Dance on our dancefloor to live DJ's or sit and drink at the main bar or in VIP, have fun with our nightly minion giveaways and special raffles, there is always something to do at Hyper.

name: The Azure Lance
description: Open every other Sunday from 8-11pm EST, dates listed on the carrd!

The Azure Lance is a safe haven for misfits, petty crooks, vigilantes, mercenaries, and more! Looking for a strong drink or a game of cards to take your mind off that next job? Maybe you're looking for work, or resources to aid you on your journey? We've got liquor, smokes, skills, and even some -questionable- paraphernalia for those who are in-the-know...
Stop by and see what all the rumors are about!

name: Ruby Hearts
description: Ruby Hearts is a club for the Adult, for those who are looking for a little love, a little company, a little companionship.

name: Dryad
description: The Druids have beckoned you to wander into our forest.
The forest is filled with free spirits that all like to be themselves.
Will you be enchanted by one of our Fae?, get a drink from our Fountain of Youth?
Or get your fortune told by our Oracle? We'd love to have you.

name: Dazzling Lightz Disco
description: An LGTBQ+ space for everyone to get down and dance at! We offer companionship services with a casual environment welcoming new and experienced roleplayers!

name: The Brewing Sands
description: Pray return and welcome to the Brewing Sands, my small indie gallery cafe themed after our beloved Scions of the Seventh Dawn. Here I serve a fine variety of beverages from different parts of the world, provide good company and hospitality, warm fireplace and soothing music. Oh, and Triple Triad, too.
Hope you enjoy your stay!

name: Sappuccino
description: A relaxing café in the Lavender Beds housing district. Cozy atmosphere with great food and drinks.  Open stage for bards.  AFK friendly.  Come visit our new location! ❤️

name: Al'mirza Hammam
description: A traditional Gyr Abanian hammam, with its own tea house.

name: The Galbadia Bar & Lounge
description: The Galbadia offers a high-class, relaxing atmosphere for everyone to enjoy! We want everyone to be able to relax and have fun during their time here, be it social gathering, a business dealing, or a date night. We want you all to have fun! We have a sizable menu, with foods, drinks, and desserts, and the staff is more than happy to serve you!

We have a discord that anyone can join. It is where the majority of business and announcements for The Galbadia will be held.There's also meeting rooms for discussing collabs. We do not offer 18+ services, we are a PG16+ venue, and we serve all-comers.

name: The D3N
description: The place you goto when you want to drink dance and have fun. We may be small but we know how to fun!

name: Meadow's Keep Crystal
description: RP and AFK-friendly café with an open Stage for wandering bards. This café specializes in cozy cottage-core vibes with a minimalist menu and laid back staff. This is one of two Meadow's Keep locations.

name: The Morning After
description: The Morning After is Eorzea's first live-streamed variety show with a live studio audience, featuring Swage, Djay Yams and Salty Biskit! Immediately after the show, head downstairs to Plan B night club, where we let the Moon Pie Promotions DJs run wild, bringing you an eclectic mix of incredible music each and every week!

name: The Harlequin
description: The stage is set...We are proud to present the new and reformed The Harlequin. A Cabaret turned Gentleman's Fighting Club. You'd best watch your footing as who knows what sort of trouble you can find yourself in. Various forms of entertainment, good-looking drinks and even better looking staff, this place has a variety options you can choose from. Fancy yourself to be one with the chaos? You can find the thrill of throwing someone full body down to the floor within the ring.

name: The Stray Cat
description: We are a vintage inspired jazz lounge featuring live music, specialty drinks, and classic plates. With a neighborly feel and two levels of seating, guests will be sure to have a good time.

name: Ansoku
description: Whether you're looking to relax in our indoor onsen, a soothing spot to AFK, Drink a hot cup of tea, or enjoy a heavenly bite to eat Ansoku is the place to be!. "I hope you enjoy your stay here at Ansoku!"

name: Synner's Tavern
description: Welcome to Synner's Tavern, a safe haven for degenerates! We are here to gorge ourselves in alcohol and have ourselves a good ol' time!

name: Moon Club
description: 🌙 The Moon Club 🌙 has the pleasure to invite you at its great Disney party !
Multiple prices with a glam parade contest ! <:cashmoney:617374449427152906>
1st winner: 1 000 000 gils
2sd winner: 500 000 gils
3st winner: 250 000 gils
And random gils rolls during the party! <:cat_money:860356349526540310>
Wear your best Disney Glam and come enjoy the party with DJ Swopa ! <a:lalajam:1002335137016578099>
⭐  Location: sagittarius/Mist 7-15  ⭐
🌕 Time: 22h ST 🌙
https://discord.gg/VXQumuZH

name: Kupopo Café
description: A tiny apartment café themed around the Final Fantasy mascot creatures. Stop by for tasty treats and a cute place to relax! SFW RP welcome but not required. AFK-friendly. LGBTQ+ safe space. Currently temporarily closed due to IRL stuff.

name: Gravity
description: Gamble amongst the stars, hang in our cozy bar, or soak in a hot tub surrounded by nature while our live twitch DJs put on a show! Open Wednesdays 7 - 11cst.

name: The Executive Lounge
description: **Open every second Thursday. Join our Discord for our schedule.**

An entirely immersive lounge experience featuring dozens of beautiful and handsome hosts to keep you company through the night. Maybe you'd like to be able to relax and indulge in a drink or two beneath the moonlight or perhaps you're looking for something a bit more exciting in one of our private rooms? The Executive Lounge is your ticket to a high class roleplay experience.

name: Time to Dye
description: We sell a variety of your favorite dyes at competitive prices!

name: The Dynasty
description: The Dynasty is here to fulfill all of your courtesan and gambling needs.  Whether you're one of our Dynasty Gems, Gold or Platinum VIP or a Dynasty Diamond, we are here to make you shine bright!  Join our discord for current events and we look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Starlight Lounge
description: Welcome, to all be they weary wanderer, battle hardened warrior, or a lost soul simply seeking comfort. Join us for a night under the stars with drinks a plenty and our lovely Hosts and Hostesses happy to provide company should you wish it. From little more of an ear to listen or mayhap a companion for the evening to share in joys and sorrows. Or perhaps find a little trouble with.
All are welcome beneath the Stars! Come and dance in the moonlight with us!

name: The Break Room at Noble FC
description: Welcome to The Break Room @ Noble FC! It’s a 18+ venue where you can chat, make jokes, and chill with friends. All communication will be in ingame chat. If you have time, come by and relax! Bring a swimsuit.
Location at Gilgamesh, Shirogane, Ward 6, Plot 37, Room 4

name: Chrysalis Harbor Safehouse
description: Chrysalis Harbor has opened its doors at last! An organization dedicated to helping adventurers and others with an extreme lifestyles to heal and be their best for whatever life continues to throw at them, Chrysalis Harbor aims to help soothe not only physical wounds, but emotional ones as well. Our amenities included a series of rotating classes, support groups for various topics, an infirmary and more!
Our biweekly Open House Night is an invitation to the community to come enjoy a free meal and tour the facility. Our staff will be available to help and answer any questions you have!

On the weeks that  we do NOT have Open House Night, we will have a class at the same time! Please join our discord to find out what sort of life skill, academics, or hobbies are being taught that night!
Our Facility is located at Dynamis | Seraph | Mists | Ward 3 | Plot 27
Carrd: https://chrysalisharbor.carrd.co/

name: one Swanky bar
description: Come one! Come all! Come on in to one swanky bar for a night you'll never forget! We are an open and relaxing place with a lot of lovely spirited people and amazing food,drinks and our unforgettable alcohol! You may find friends or perhaps a good conversation!  And our bar sells art commissions  Come join us @ sarg/LB/W8/P2! Were open tonight from 9pm est til 1am est
https://discord.gg/aGAEst2jKZ

name: The Crimson Casino
description: Join us at our new location!

The Crimson Casino offers games of chance for players looking to challenge Fate and perhaps make a fortune! Open most Sundays & Wednesdays in the late afternoon/early evening, the Crimson Casino is open to all, and does its best to make the experience as entertaining as possible. Bet as little as 10k, or as much as 1 million, and sometimes even more!
As always, please gamble responsibly!

name: Toriff's Tavern
description: A tavern located in the basement of Toriff, the home of the Mercenaries of Honor. Originally just a place of respite for the free company, but now open to the weary adventurers or travelers, serving food, drink, and music.

name: Club Addiction
description: Club Addiction Is a night club with open dance stages for guests to use, Our house DJ brings high energy music to keep our guests in a high energy state until the end of the night.

name: Duckbill Bar&Grill
description: We are a group of people looking to make Eorzea a brighter place to be in! Come by and enjoy our Duck Cuisines, or satiate yourself with one of our frozen  beverages! Everyone is welcome at the Duckbill.

name: Skywhale Sushi
description: Delicious Sushi & Atmosphere: With connections to the far east, we bring to you culinary wonder. Curry, Sushi, Nigiri, and unique dishes with a hint of spice from Othard can be found on our menu!

name: The Dancing Dhalmel
description: Your destination for more than just the Bee's Knees!  The Dancing Dhalmel is Aether's top spot for trivia and conversation!

name: Fangtasia
description: Fangtasia Is a Darker Themed Vampire owned Strip Club (inspired by the bar in True Blood), We strive to bring you the darker dirty feeling of a Strip Club and all the blood, gore and feedings you desire. Here at Fangtasia, Life begins at night.

name: Paradise Mansion
description: House Parties galore! Come chill at my home from time to time, see you there!

name: Chic Lover's Den
description: A small modern gay bar and lounge for all to enjoy, with ever-changing opening hours. With an open stage to either dance or play your music to your heart's content and a spot in the back to enjoy a more private netflix & chill with your partner or a whole group. We encourage others to mingle and flirt till the sun goes up, but do keep the very kinky conversation to tells lest a poor lala comes in and faint from shock.

name: Club Dote
description: New Venue On Dynamis!

name: Love-Craft Lounge
description: The Love-Craft Lounge is a goth themed bar that love-crafts specialty cocktails and spirits just for you. Grab a Franken-stein or a Te-Kill-A-Sunrise while you relax in the hot tub or dance the night away. We hope our services and Boo-ze will have you howling with delight as we strive to give you one Hell of a night.

name: The Wishing Star
description: The Wishing Star is a small auction house that's just starting on Dynamis! We offer Courts, Food/Drink, Raffles, and of course, Auctions!

name: The Inkwell
description: The Inkwell is an open RP venue designed to help bring people together, while providing them a place to relax and enjoy a nice, warm meal.  Ran and staffed by an ever-expanding crew of artists, rogues, sweethearts, and otherwise generally 'silly' people, we aim to keep you entertained during your visit. We often have live music, fortune telling, and very... interesting bartenders.

name: Star Callers Cafe
description: Welcome to Star Callers Cafe, where you can look to the stars and find your fate... or a warm cup of tea. Your choice! Our Venue is LGBTQA+ owned and operated. Here at Star Callers, we take pride in providing a safe and comfortable SFW RP venue. We provide refreshments, atmosphere, and live tarot readings! Come down to see us and see what the stars have in store for you!

name: Fox Hole
description: Station WSLY First Saturdays on FFXIV are live DJ sets for Station WSLY City Pop Radio! Groovin you through the 70's and 80's of Japan! Every month we have special events online and everyone is invited!

name: The Fallen Angel
description: A dark themed nightclub with a fully stocked bar. Come on by and enjoy a drink or snack from our unique menu and relax. Enjoy the live music and let the atmosphere take you!

name: Lost Dragon Tavern
description: A small and relaxing tavern hidden amongst the trees in the Lavender Beds. We offer food, drinks and games to weary travelers as well as an open stage to all performers.

name: Meowran Host Club
description: Cozy, overgrown lounge/hangout. Bar included, limited food and drinks available, specializing in SFW Host services.

name: Mono's Delivery Service
description: Want food delivered but too busy adventuring? Need supplies to run your venue but delivery fee's too expensive? No fear, Mono is here!With her magic broom and abilities, she can deliver what you need fast and fresh that you don't need to worry about it.Ranging from food delivery, supply runs, even help move from one venue to another; Mono has it all to help provide your needs.----Mono's Delivery Service is a roleplaying delivery service venture run by Mono'sono Glu'tame on Brynhildr. This delivery service is open to any and all venues in the Crystal server.

name: Nightweather Bathhouse
description: Welcome to Nightweather, a luxurious bathhouse for our guest to relax, have fun, find love, and companionship.

name: Dulce Catfé
description: Tired from grinding?…don’t worry!
Stop in and order some of our most relaxing treats. Yummy Hot Cocoa outta do the trick!
Check out the Dulce Catfé!

name: Sapphire Reliquary
description: A dance club front to a criminal neutral ground, we operate both as an interactive dance venue and a place for criminally-minded individuals to seek connections and peddle their wares. Founded with the intention to promote RP connections within the community, we offer both a Heavy RP focus as well as a busy club vibe for those who just want to enjoy the nightclub scene. We do not offer any private services and no real gil changes hands. However, our staff is always seeking out patrons to RP at and involve in the environment.

name: Silver Garden
description: The Silver Garden is an open social space for small or large events, or for simply hanging out. RP is welcome, but not required. Feel free to come and chat, or just mingle.

name: Red Moon
description: Red Moon is an LGBTQ+ 18+ RP venue that focuses on an immersive, welcoming environment for all to come and enjoy themselves. We've been operating since July 25th, 2020. Our mission at Red Moon is to provide a service to the community - whether it's the Red Moon community itself or the venue-going community as a whole. We want to provide a place for people to come to where they'll feel welcomed, noticed and loved.

name: The Helix Nebula
description: We are an LGBTQIA+ venue and our purpose is to promote love, inclusion and good vibes of positive energy. We're open every other Tuesday to grant a safe place to come vibe, dance and chill. That is all. So come be yourself, come with friends, or meet new friends and clear your mind of the worries today, and have some fun. Join our discord to keep up with our schedule, plus any special events we announce.

name: The Locker Room
description: A public changing room with a bar and courtroom.
A venue where you can get changed, relax, and put on trial.

name: The King of Cups
description: A pop-up tea & tarot cafe offering a custom menu and in character tarot readings.

name: Eden Hall Hostess Club
description: Modeled after a traditional hostess clubs, Eden Hall Hostess Club provides a relaxing yet entertaining atmosphere. Enjoy our bartenders at the bar, relax in the lounge with our SFW Hostesses, participate in our competitive Aether Chocobo Racing League with sports betting, or on Sundays enjoy our LIVE musician or let our resident gambler entertain you at her gambling table. (Open since December 2020)

name: Faerie Social Events
description: Welcome to the FSE!
TLDR: We are a group of nerds who host events.

Faerie Social Events was created to host events for all to join regardless of FC. We are excited to host a variety of events both in game and off, spanning a bunch of topics like Scribbl.io, Drinking Nights, DnD, and some old fashioned fun like Golf with Your Friends.

Our In Game Events are often surrounding holidays, and take the form of Celebrations of such. The events comprise of things like Hide and Seek, Trivia, Costume Contests, Musical Chairs and our most popular event type, Art Parties.
We run events at 8:30pm on some Saturdays and some Thursdays. Please take a look at our discord or website to find when we are open!

name: Vibe House - Fight Club
description: Eorzea's largest RP fight arena & community located on Adamantoise, featuring large fights on the hour, chaotic ambiance, bar, betting, raffles, & giveaways.

Our main feature is our signature fights on the hour, allowing any and all visitors a chance to fight in our arena each round on top of the opportunity for patrons to make profit as victors or through bidding & raffles.
We host nightly giveaways in our discord each night we are open, along with 70/30 raffles each night of operation, the pot growing between both venues. This venue does not offer NSFW services.

name: Otter by the Water
description: Otter by the Water is a café on Jenova... or, as we like to call it, a cAFKé! Whether you're looking to kill time in a queue, want a SFW place to roleplay, trying to take some cute /gposes in a cozy setting, or just need a place to chill, we've got you covered. We're located in the Mist housing district at Ward 7, Plot 4, close to the docks and Mist South aetheryte. Look for the odder otters decorating the exterior—you can't miss it!

name: Stardust
description: Fun star themed night club with gambling, drinks and awesome music.

name: SONG Lounge
description: Welcome to SONG Lounge! We have live DJs, colorful cocktails, immersive hosts, top-tier gambling, and relaxing tubs! Jump in the elevator to be brought into our one-of-a-kind lounge.

name: Amaurot's Utopia
description: Welcome to the golden days of Amaurot. Never was a casino more magnificent. From the humble slots, to the heighted blackjack, she fairly gleems.
Take a break from peace and contentment, let your soul live for the moment.
Give into want, and let our creation magics provide you with an entertainment gaming experience like no other.
So pray not to primals, but to lady luck, as we weave reality to provide you a premium entertainment gaming experience, like no other.
So come enjoy life as an Ancient, and "remember" the pleasures of Amaurot's Utopia.

name: SHIFT
description: A posh underground bar and lounge. With a fully stocked bar and staffed with lovely companions to make your night as enjoyable as it can be

name: The Tranquil Tempest
description: The Tranquil Tempest is open every Wednesday for restaurant-themed, casual RP. Located near the Northeast Aethershard on a large plot in Shirogane, The Tranquil Tempest offers oceanic dining in a variety of settings. Join us downstairs for our upscale, aquatic restaurant or on the main floor at Koi Pond: our bar and grille. We also offer an outdoor cafe space for brunches. A full-service bar and a well-stocked kitchen are what we promise. We enjoy making peoples' nights! All food and drink prices are in gil, and you will receive an in-game item when you order. Tips are appreciated, but not required or expected. Come enjoy our atmosphere and make some new friends!

name: Paradox | Club & Casino
description: Premium gambling & nightlife experience. Come enjoy drinks at our expansive bar, dance the night away with our DJs, and try your luck in the casino! Casino games include: Black Jack, 3-Card Poker, Darts, Roulette, Slots, and casual Gamba Drinks.

name: The Devil's Den
description: *Everyone has his own hidden desires...wishes...dreams...* There is a place, that all those call a home, who decided to live with their desires. Join us and become one of many who have their deepest wishes being fulfilled by the White Devil and his subjects. *Hold on to your soul carefully...while entering the Devils Den.*

name: The Floating Otter
description: We are a wholesome RP inn and bathhouse for everyone, no matter if you are an experienced RPer or new and curious about the scene. We offer our guests a comfy dining and bar area with a variety of dishes, dessert and drinks that are all free of charge. Our main attraction however is what we call the „bathing cove“ where people can float in the bathtubs and spend a chill and relaxing evening in company of other guests and our staff members. We also offer two rooms for rent, if guests desire a more private environment and want to relax away from the open areas of the inn. For our premium services we are offering a paid GPose service to our guests so everyone can take a nice picture of them and their friends home with them. Besides that we have a bard playing for some hours each night who also takes requests from a wide range of different songs. If we made you curious feel free to contact us ingame, on Discord or visit our homepage under https://thefloatingotter.carrd.co/#

name: Taya's Tea Cozy
description: Currently under hiatus, and changing locations.

name: Millennia
description: Millennia is a heavily Sailor Moon inspired club located on Balmung in the Crystal Datacenter. The club's unique interior and top notch DJ's will leave you wanting to return for more fun. The sole purpose and point for the venue is happiness and being at your highest point to find your high for the weekend to come.

name: The Warded Ring
description: A Doman fighting venue with an Eastern fusion menu, signature drinks, and a ward system designed to keep you from missing work the next day.

Nestled in the high reaches of a quiet Shirogane ward is a Traditional Doman estate belonging to Nightingale Company, a group of adventurers and mercenaries who have developed a ward system specifically for testing and honing one's fighting skills, no matter the persuasion. With sparring rings and fighters alike warded, all are invited to go all out without fear of sustaining lasting, serious injury. So come on by to eat up, beat down, and drink it all in!

name: FALL Nightclub
description: Fallen angels - Demons and all you other dark creatures! Unleash your demonic side and come to us...
FALL Nightclub is a dark fantasy inspired nightclub, known for its hard vibes - Hardstyle and from time to time EDM & Metal are on the agenda!
Let's create unforgettable moments together and party all night!

name: Rhotano Vale
description: A colorful cafe at the edge of a chilly Ishgard, Rhotano Vale is meant to create warm memories and comfortable vibes. ...With a side-helping of antics, of course.

name: The Golden Leaf
description: The Golden Leaf is Miss Kayla Angel's Goldsmithing atelier. From here, she crafts beautiful jewelry pieces, and other shiny baubles and trinkets, commissioned by some of Hydaelyn's pickiest clientele.

Thanks to an expansion in land and business, her boutique and atelier also feature a small café and bath house in the cellarage, where she appreciates the company of her friends and the public alike, and enjoys tasty treats cooked by her shy but talented retainer, Lumine Igri.

[The Golden Leaf is a relaxed, welcoming, and Immersive Roleplaying venue for roleplayers new and old, experienced and inexperienced alike. /say RP is heavily encouraged, and help and advice are always happily given! We welcome you to take a seat, enjoy a hot bath, snack on some treasts, and chat to staff and patrons, making new friends and getting involved in weird happenings along the way!]

name: Vicarious
description: 🌺 ***V***icarious🌺 is more than just a place to come /beesknees and forget. We want to provide a social experience through interaction. Be it at the bar or the dance floor, we want to give you something extra. Come live vicariously through us.

name: Den of Sin
description: The Den of Sin is an adult entertainment venue catering to members of the LGBT community. We have a stage for our dancers with a lounge to enjoy the view. For the right price, many of our dancers are available to take home for the night.

name: The Kat's Meow
description: The Kat's Meow is now open, and ready to offer our services to people looking for... something more in life. Guidance, long lost information, or maybe even a helping hand in finding your path, we will do our best to help you find what you need, like:
- Our library of books and tomes features tons of information, stories, legends, and countless other things that will be sure to satisfy your needs.
- Our divination services will help you find answers and advice to all your biggest wonders and worries.
- Our potions and tinctures will help you achieve whatever it is you will, and provide the right tincture for the right ailment or need.
- Our trinkets, lockets, sigils, and spell jars can be made for any need, unless morally objectionable.
- Our homemade teas and treats are a wonderful way to treat your self after a long day of adventuring.
