(Disclaimer: All items are RP only, we don't actually trade items or accept actual gil, except for tips if you enjoy our services.)

name: Cho's Cafe
description: Thank you for taking your coffee break with Cho's Cafe! And for supporting an independently-owned and managed company. Cho's Cafe was founded in 2022 with the dream of serving great tasting specialty coffee, tea and snacks to everyone in a welcoming environment. Since the beginning days of working behind the bar at our first location in Goblet to present day. Cho's Cafe have always been hands-on and devoted to making this company the best it can be. Cho's Cafe has a goal which is to share coffee, tea and snacks with as many people as possible and make sure that if you come in grumpy, you leave happy!

name: The Lucky Lizard Adventurer's Guild
description: The Lucky Lizard Adventurer's Guild invites all adventurers, freelance or otherwise, to our tavern!  Whether it's work or relaxation you seek, we aim to facilitate and provide those things respectively.  Our establishment offers a multitude of thirst quenchers for you to sip on while you check our bounty board for work opportunities or if your prefer, check our roster of lovely companions to spend the night off with.

name: Caffe Al Banco
description: Newly renovated public hot springs and teahouse for casual(SFW) RP, relax/chill, or AFK. The baths are self-service, but complimentary towels are available with purchase of beverage(no gil required).

Please do not bring your own food downstairs; boiling eggs or noodles in the baths is not permissible as this will disrupt the natural mineral profile and potentially damage our the whirlycog system in which we pump our water.  Please be courteous to other patrons and enjoy your stay!

name: Solaris Lounge
description: Solaris Lounge is an immersive roleplay lounge wherein your entertainment and pleasure are prioritized.
Please note that we are not a bar nor do we offer alcoholic drinks.
Open Wed. & Sat. 8 PM - 12 AM EST.
Located at Balmung, Empyreum, Ward 17 Plot 39.

Our goal is to provide company to those who wish to visit us, whether that be in an open casual conversation or an erotic* private session. We have a strict discrimination-free policy and strive to provide a safe space for different walks to enjoy their time.

For those unable to visit us when we're open, we understand and offer appointment-only staff who are willing to fulfill your needs when you need. You can learn more and find their prices over on our carrd.
Come visit us if we've piqued your interest! ♥️
*We don't offer ERP services to Lalas.

name: The Red Dragon
description: Low lightning and with a secluded feel, The Red Dragon is a small hole in the wall blackjack den and comfy lounge seating on the first floor. Downstairs guests will find a fully stocked bar, stylishly designed walls and decoration as well as a dance floor and stage for our performers. A VIP table is behind a private chamber for invite only games where prizes are the Dragon's Hoard itself.

name: Kurahashi Kitchen
description: Eastern-themed SFW cafe venue where you can enjoy a delicious meal in a calming and hospitable environment. At Kurahashi Cafe, we want you to feel like you're being welcomed into an Eastern home's kitchen and enjoy meals with your friends and loved ones.

name: The Green Gaelicat
description: Well met and well come, traveler! The Green Gaelicat is a family-owned bakery and tavern. We are a relaxed RP venue with an underground tavern vibe. We love telling stories and are excited to hear yours! Come inside, take a load off your feet! RP is welcome, but not required.

name: Repose
description: A cozy little cafe in the hearts of the Lavender Beds.
Come in and enjoy warm snacks and hot drinks.

name: The Otherworld Apothecary & Divination
description: While first and foremost The Otherworld Apothecary is an apothecary serving up various potions, spell books, and ingredients, the other half is a real Divination Parlor offering real runic divinations on a first come, first serve basis as well as the ability to set up appointments.  Questions can be based on personal or RP inquiries and treated with much deserved respect.  Care to know what the Fates have in store for you? Drop us a line and let's set something up!

name: the Escort lounge
description: A classy, yet comfy lounge with a full bar, Dancers, and plenty of space to relax and meet people.

name: Wonderland
description: We are a blend between hype and RP. A place that everyone is welcome and we strive to for those who do come to feel as a part of our family.

name: Seventh Heaven
description: Seventh Heaven is a peaceful, elegant and private establishment nestled in the heart of Empyreum. We also offer conversation and companionship services from our maids, who are storied and experienced heroes from all corners of our blessed star. We delight in hearing tales both short and tall and getting to know our patrons! Our maids are well-heeled, well dressed and serve both looks and tea - we look forward to serving you and meeting your every need! ♡

name: The Sleepy Nomad: Secret Slipped Pop-Up
description: [Last Thursdays of the month, 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. Eastern; Pop-Up theme cycles monthly]
"Come in and stay awhile."

Drop by the Sleepy Nomad to indulge in a selection of secret delights, and wind down with friends featuring chill music and a relaxing atmosphere. Benefit more with a discount upon the inclusion of a specialty drink. Gil's IC only.

name: Demon Queen's Emporium
description: Curios, potions, item enchanting and curse consultations, this store provides adventurers with all they need for dealing with the arcane. Stop by to get a quote on powering up your weapons and armor, or to simply restock on essential reagents. Have an issue with a voidsent or other paranormal entity? Drop off a mission request, and we may be able to find you some workers willing to deal with it for you. Cursed? Ask our mages for help!

name: Dilemma Night Club
description: Welcome To Dilemma Maduin's Newest Night Club. We are just starting out. We have a resident DJ,  DJ Yuyu much love to him. We have a fully stocked bar with the cutest Miqo that runs it ( She knows who she is ). We do giveaways and will have gamba soon. So if you have nothing to do on Friday nights or want to party more come check us out!

name: Sunrise Springs
description: Welcome to Sunrise Springs; A 21+ Hwavy rp venue.

Looking for a fun night out, or maybe need to relax after a hard earned victory then look no further! Our Springs situated outside has an onsen with built in adjacent bath-houses, outdoor brick oven with a grill master ready to make food to order, and a much smaller bath-house by our buildings entrance designed for a more personal soaking.

Inside is our Café/Bar Room area boasting a broad hand crafted menu with tastes from around the world! Our drink list is also rather diverse ranging from strong saki and weak ale to a calming tea or coffee, we also offer juices that can also be served fizzy or slushified. Feeling brave? Step up for the Pheonix Fire challenge; drink the world's strongest shot to get your name on the wall!
The upstairs loft lounge is reserved for smoking *anything* and table games, as well as a stage for performers!
Beyond the bar is reserved for employees as the door leads to the owners office where more delicate business may be handled.
Through the use of NPC's  the springs are open 24/7 and we aim to have player ran events.
If you'd like to join the Sunrise Family as staff you can apply within or contact the owner!
((PLEASE NOTE SUNRISE SPRINGS IS NOT A VENUE FOR ERP))
<https://sunrise-springs.carrd.co/>
<https://discord.gg/pB4XsxHHjq>

name: Club Gemini
description: Contemporary high-class dance / nightclub with live Twitch DJ's each opening featuring many different types and genres of music! Relaxed nightclub with great ambient mood light for just coming in a vibing out to great music and company. Resident DJ's each day of the week featuring:
The A'leycatte
GloBug

name: Moonlit Kiss
description: Moonlit Kiss is an 18+ high energy Night Club that does tons of fun theme nights, cosplay contests, giveaways and promotes a high energy party hall type of environment with lovely dancers, hype squad, and bartenders.

name: Avarice Abyss Casino
description: The Abyss appears like a mirage and dissipates like the passing of time. Greed loves the sound of coin purses and even more so the attention from those wanting to spend their coin. Avarice Abyss Casino is a full selective gambling experience with some minor RP. Guests can ask for a drink or engage with the other guests and staff regarding stories and lore based around RP characters while spending their hard earned money. Yes, money because not all coin is Gil in RP!

notices.message: This venue is usually open at the discretion of the owner. Please check the discord's announcements channel before visiting. 😉

name: Paradise Restaurant
description: Come to Dynamis own Paradise Restaurant now at a new location. Fine dine and enjoy amazing music with a date or on your own your sure to be pleased at Paradise…

name: Ara Au'ra
description: A quaint little friendly bar for all to come relax, have a drink and mingle with all.

name: ♥ PiNK PANTHER LOUNGE ♥
description: Eorzea's finest hideout! No, wait- it's NOT a hideout! It's a lounge. Yeah, Eorzea's finest lounge and totally NOT a hideout.

Come relax to a great ocean sunset and enjoy the finer vices of life! Full bar, full menu, full frontal- we look the other way so you don't have to. Enjoy the entertainment, or be the entertainment. Just remember, there's riches to be found, and Tons of friends to light your way.
...but there's no one hiding here. Cross my heart.

name: Hotel Obsidian
description: The doors of Hotel Obsidian are opening for you!

Whatever your desires are, these or others much more obscure, the Obsidian Hotel is ready to welcome you. In this place, the rules and the judgement of society are suspended and our Staff is eager to satisfy your requests and will guarantee an unforgettable stay!

name: Whitewillow Café
description: Whitewillow is a cozy basement cafe hidden away underneath a small tavern.

Enjoy a hot drink while you read in our private library, or turn your attention to the open stage as you feast on a good meal. We're open late nights for those of you seeking a place to wind down after a hard day's work, and middays for those of you wanting a quick refresher in between quests.

name: The Poison Grotto
description: Run by an inherent night owl, The Poison Grotto features a downstairs bar & lounge where guests can let loose and unwind after a long day and or week.Dancing? Drinks? Food? Drinks?! We have it. Getting overwhelmed and need a more peaceful type of relaxation? Lucky for you, The Poison Grotto operates on duality. Take some time and relax in the peaceful atmosphere of the ground floor.If you're looking for an interesting experience, why not give our drink roulette a spin?

name: Blue Miqo'te
description: One of Eorzea's finest musical and roleplay venues located on Goblin, Blue Miqo'te is an upscale, musical and performance hall establishment with an atmosphere one can relax in after a long and busy grind.
Sporting two levels, a large bar, novel stage design, and performance focused seating.
Open Mic Nights are every Tuesday unless a special event or guest is planned.
The last Tuesday of the month is "DJ Night" where we bring in a Twitch DJ that's already part of the Blue Miqo'te team.

name: Riptide: Siege of Seas
description: Do you have what it takes to conquer the seas? Test yer wits in this strategy board game. Out maneuver your enemy or beat them down into the abyss. Fight to claim the oceans bounties for yer own.

name: Ohana lil'café
description: A cozy and modern café in CHAOS - OMEGA  => MIST [ W16 - P7 ]. With surprising floor for ephemeral and/or mature events.

name: Cloak N Smoke
description: Cloak N Smoke was originally opened as a lounge with an open bard stage in Lockstep Ailoss' apartment. Cloak N Smoke was named this way because it was a hole in the wall venue that was cloaked behind other venues. Smoking is akin to relaxing/stress relieving and Lockstep wanted this lounge to be a place where people could come relax, be stress free and enjoy a good time.

name: The Golden Ring
description: Primals Premier Nightclub & Auction House. Featuring lovely ladies, high class auctions and a unique club experience. Come make your night one to remember.

name: Ace High
description: Ace High is a modern, elegant feeling Casino & Club that has the primary purpose of putting the Patrons first.

name: Club Aethereal
description: Dance the night away at the Aetherial Sea's premier 18+ dance club. Drinks, gambling, and a variety of adult services all brought to you in a sleek Crystal/WoL-themed venue! We aim to appeal to both casual rp and the more hardcore rper by providing an immersive bar/club experience.

name: Shiva’s Embrace
description: Shiva’s Embrace
(Light - Twintania - Empyreum - Ward 3/Plot 56)
Date & Time:
Every Friday from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM ST
Roleplay Type:
Immersive RP/Casual RP
Event Description:
Shiva's Embrace is a SFW tavern inspired by the masonwork of House Dzemael, combined with the flair of the Skysteel Manufactory.

We welcome you to come in from the cold of Isghard and warm yourself in our halls with a warm beverage while enjoying our live bard performances. Don’t forget, our staff love a good story, and we eagerly await the tales of your adventures.
We are open every Friday from 7 PM to 9 PM ST.
Carrd:  https://shivasembrace.carrd.co/
Discord:  https://discord.gg/FNzSW2PKtq

name: Seventh Circle
description: Welcome to hell! Seventh Circle is a Metal/Industrial-focused nightclub themed around the 9 circles of Hell from Dante's "Inferno". Our aim is to provide you with not only great music and a hell of a party, but also an RP experience that's as casual or as immersive as you want it to be.

name: Sureli Sisters Cafe
description: A cafe that endevours to ensure a cozy and calm atmosphere.

name: Wet Wonderland
description: get wet and dance! or chill.

name: Roommates
description: Immersive roleplaying LGBT+ venue, by and for sapphic characters of all kinds. While others are welcome to come, the venue's primary audience remains characters who identify as feminine in some capacity - enough that it is meaningful to them.

name: Angels Club
description: Angels Club makes its return to Eorzea! Come in and spend the night unwinding in a chill atmosphere, a monotone black and white club that will make you feel welcome no matter how grumpy you are! We have a casino, rp bar, and usually live music! come say hi 🙂

name: L'Atelier at Heavenside Manor
description: Exquisite Dining and Fine Wines curated by our professional Sommelier
Reserve your seats in advance at our website

name: White Jaguar House
description: A hookah and tattoo parlour.

name: Timber Tarot Lodge
description: "When your life is off-kilter, tarot readings can help. Get the insight you're looking for."

I operate a venue for tarot reading. These cards serve as a deep spiritual source to help aid us in every aspect of our life. When we're questioning a situation, curious about our future, nervous about a relationship, or feeling lost, we can rely on the insight from Tarot readings to push us in the right direction or shift a perspective just enough to understand better. My goal is to provide this type of insight to others who may be feeling similar and offer an ear to those who are curious, or even unsure of the process. This venue is very newbie friendly. ♥

name: Tranquility Spa
description: Tranquility Spa is a bath house aswell as a massage parlor that houses a soothing scent of lavender, and the sound of water. We seek to be a respite for weary travelers. We are RP friendly aswell and minion friendly so long as they sit on your shoulder. Now even if not staffed, or operating for massages our doors are never locked. We trust our guests to be well mannered and strongly encourage being a place anyone can go to relax no matter the time of day.

name: Cafe Musashi
description: Named after our adorable mameshiba, Musashi, Café Musashi is run by a lovely couple. Located on a beach front, we provide a relaxing environment for our patrons and serve freshly made food! Our café is inspired from the show, Restaurant to Another World. Please do feel free to visit! We would love to have you.

name: Reign Club
description: We're a team of portuguese and english speakers with the goal of reuniting the brazilian roleplay community and get people together to party! Focusing on creating a fun place where players can interact, have fun and get to know everyone!
Somos um grupo de amigos com o objetivo de reunir a comunidade brasileira e aproximar pessoas com interesses em comum.
Focamos em criar um ambiente onde todos os jogadores possam interagir e criar laços.
Desejamos um ambiente alegre, de amizade, diversão!

name: The Huckleberry
description: The Huckleberry Saloon is open on Tuesdays from 930pm - 1230am EST. Listen to the bards, have a drink or two served up by a beautiful barmaid, get into a bar fight, test your luck at our gambling table, or just hang out and enjoy your evening! There's tarot readings too. Make some new friends or hang out with old ones. We're super casual around here...you can have your weapon out. We're a saloon, after all.

name: Astora no Izakaya
description: Small apartment bar, open late for relaxation after a long day.

name: The Solstice Equinox
description: We are a 18+ Seasonal Nightclub that changes with the seasons! Friendly Staff, Courtesans, Dancers, Gambling, Fully Stocked Bar with Bartenders all awaiting to serve your needs. Good Company, Good Times, Good Vibes await you at the Solstice! Come on down and enjoy our seasonal atmosphere, Live Music, Gambling tables and more! We hope to see you and show us that You've got Sol!

name: The Sirensong Saloon
description: The Sirensong Saloon is a brothel-themed club, opening every sunday night at 7PM ST. We offer fun parties, a staffed bar and a lovely team of courtesans.

name: The Mewing Maid Cat'fe
description: A SFW RP lite, chill, and relax spot for those to come unwind and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere. Also includes personal maid service where maids, when available, will sit with mew, talk, cuddle, and a little more depending on mew 😉 (NO ERP). Maids RP from the view mew have always been their Master and this is their chance to show how much they care for mew welcoming mew's return and try to convince mew to stay by showing mew how much they love and care for mew.

name: The Chateau
description: The Chateau is a Gothic themed bar & bath house centered around creating a relaxing atmosphere for people to unwind, and make memories! We have a beautiful courtyard, steamy tubs, live entertainment, and most importantly...drinks! Hope to see you soon!

name: Puku Pizza Delivery
description: Founded in Limsa Lominsa over several years ago, Puku Pizza Delivery has been providing the people of Eorzea and beyond with quality pizza through our excellent take-out and delivery services, ensuring that no matter where you are, delicious food will be sent to you—all in 30 mins. or less!

name: Calm Water Retreat
description: A open clean bathhouse to relax alone, making friends, or whatever you see fit.

name: The Elysian Cafe (M.O.E)
description: The Elysian Café is a hingan (japanese) styled café. We offer to our visitors a luxurious place to "dine" at while enjoying an inclusive yet relaxing social interaction experience, at our estate's interior. Offering visitors to purchase any of our signature cuisine from our handcrafted café menu.
The exterior of our estate provides free scenic seating & an outdoor onsen.
Our estate interior also has a particular spot for any artists, dancers, bard's or dj's to come setup at.
The interior of our estate also houses 3 Private Chambers, as additional services.

The 1st, is a free Lalafell Daycare Room that can be accessed at anytime, it is a place for the "smol folk" of the FFXIV player base to gather and enjoy, hopefully making them feel warmly welcomed & included at our café.

The 2nd is a VIP Dining Room. Customers can schedule a date & time for the VIP Dining Room to be unlocked for 24 hours, for a fee of 80k Gil. Where they may indulge in an exclusive private dining experience with friends, associates or that special someone. Overseen by atleast 1 of our staff members within a reasonable time-frame.

And the 3rd is a ERP Room. Customers can schedule a date & time for the exclusive ERP Room to be unlocked for 24 hours, for a fee of 80k Gil. Where they will have a whole deluxe suite to privately enjoy "quality time" with that special someone in their life.
And lastly, the owner of the café & Free Company, personally offers Venue Information Broker services.

name: The Dragon's Rest
description: At the Dragon's Rest we offer you the highest quality opium pipes in a relaxing hingan environment, gambling, escorts and private baths

name: Silver Under Hills
description: What if you could sample just a taste of the magical world of the Fae, all within a (relatively) controlled environment? Better yet, what if you were surrounded by attractive, coquettish strangers?
Welcome to Silver Under Hills - the (18+) fae-inhabited lounge where you can get your fae fix and more!
We offer an immersive RP environment with SFW RP (general area) and NSFW RP (private rooms only).

name: Erebus
description: Welcome to Erebus! Our little slice of hell! Casual grunge/alternative/goth club where you can chill out and dance the night away.

name: The Coerthas Cantina
description: ***__Eorzea's Finest Eatery!__***
~*The Coerthas Cantina is an 18+ character driven rp speakeasy.*
~*We focus on personal character lore, relationships, and canon storytelling.*
~*Our food and drink is none the better, but stay for the bands, and performances!*
~*Look out for our special period appropriate themed nights, special in character events!*

name: Ad Astra
description: Eorzea's coziest cocktail bar! Ad Astra is dedicated to hand crafted drinks and being a laid back environment to hang out an chat with your fellow adventurers. Take to the stars and visit today!

name: The Umami Tsunami
description: The Umami Tsunami is a cozy ramen shop and bar hole-in-the-wall located in the Empyreum District. We hope to provide you with both the warmth of a hot bowl of ramen in this cold atmosphere, as well as the warmth of conversation as you wind down after a busy day.
Here you will find an amicable atmosphere to socialize and hang out with your friends, make some new ones, or as a place to afk while you take care of other things.
Please come and enjoy your stay!

name: Devil's Lair
description: Rising from the hell to Earth, Devil's Lair brings new entertainments for the rich people while keeps providing the usual ones: gamble, dances, djs, bar, and giveaways. The vips will enjoy it even more! Do you dare to experience atleast once?

name: Crimson Lotus
description: Among The Whisperings And The Champagne And The Stars

The Bennett's Estate is an upscale Speakeasy with a classic feel, serving craft liquors and cocktails plus curated bites. Our expertly crafted cocktails create a relaxing and welcoming vibe. Our decor is modern and chic social media-ready, so come see us on your next night out. We promise an intimate and relaxed social bar experience that offers something different to local patrons and ensures you enjoy a memorable speakeasy experience every time. Join today for exclusive membership BENEFITS and Wine delivery service available upon request.

name: Anachronism
description: Bounties, booze, brawls, and bullshit! Come hang out at the Anachronism for a little of each, every other Saturday evening! We are the data center's first Solarpunk themed venue + fight club! We offer an immersive, slightly chaotic, and a little bit cursed atmosphere, sure to leave you wondering "what the fuck did I walk into?"

name: 🦊 I-C Fox Club
description: ou wander on an empty Road in Ishgard as a little piece of Paper flies straight at your Chest. You try to grab it but the blow of Wind that gifted you the contact, just stole it with another. You turn around and get curious ... after a little Sprint you hold it in your Hand. Another Invitation to a Club - oh boy ... so Special! But ... what is that? Full ... Immersive ... Roleplay?!
Every week on Wednesday 17 ST - 21 ST you can come over to visit us @ Sagittarius, Empyreum - Ward 16, Plot 7.
We offer the following:
❄ Our Staff will introduce and Immersive you in the Roleplay
❄ The Bar with special Drinks and Snacks
❄ An amazing Chill Out Area close to everyone
❄ Every hour the Playlist switches with an best of FFXIV!
Our Staff for the Night will always use the "LFM" yellow Mark next to their name. No worries - there is no Premium Service or such things. We all just want to have fun!......

name: The Grandeur
description: What is greater than great, The Grandeur of course. A posh bar with live DJs where we give our patrons a taste of exquisite drinks, intoxicating dances and gripping conversations.
Come and vibe with us, enjoy yourself and meet new people.

name: The Miqo'tea Room
description: Our tea room is great for those who enjoy socialising and roleplaying with our main focus in creating a calm atmosphere. We offer a unique environment fit for those of us who enjoy a little bit of peace, a place to make friends, and somewhere to just...be.

name: McDalamud's
description: Do you want some fast food but don't know where to go? Sick of paying people to spit on you? Then pay us to spit in your food! We got you covered! McDalamud's is here serving week old food from the garbage, stale, stagnant drinks from our broken drink machine and maybe our ice cream machine will work this month. Let us entertain you with our own McClown Mascot, Dess and our McManager, Splenda selling her famous NotBoyScoutCookies to you! Made from free-ranged Lalafells.  Chaos, fun, and insanity are always on the menu here at McDalamud's!

name: Club Ashes
description: Welcome to club Ashes, a relaxing club where we party to music all night or hang out with one of our lovely courtesans, anyone is welcome to come and hang out

name: Star Compass Café and Bar
description: A small lil café/bar nestled in Empyreum for all sorts of wandering souls to come and go as they please. If you're wanting chill vibes, a few laughs and to meet new people, then this might be the spot for you!

We have drinks on standby, our stalwart chefs in the kitchen eager to cook and our hosts ready to assist as best they can. Should the mood be right, there might even be a few drinking games on the table for the guests and staff alike.

name: Catalyst Bar and Lounge
description: Catalyst Bar and Lounge is a SFW RP-focused venue with a focus on great drinks and even better interactions.

name: Stargazer's Lounge
description: A cozy, starlit tavern styled in a Hingan theme. We offer a hand selected menu of dishes and drinks sourced from Hingashi, Gyr Abania, and La Noscea. For entertainment, we have an in-house bard or open stage when our bard is unavailable. We also have an in-house Tarot card reader for those curious of what the stars hold for them. There's plenty of seating and room on the dance floor to help you relax after those stressful days!

name: The Twisted Lotus Dungeon Club
description: The Twisted Lotus is a unique BDSM-oriented immersive venue for mature RP with players ages 21+. Our goal is to emulate a real-life dungeon experience, but with a few fantasy twists! Come to socialise with like-minded kinkster friends, play with your own partners, or sit back and let our consorts entertain you. Whether you're here to watch, play, or just hang out, we aim to educate as well as entertain.

name: MAINFRAME
description: We are a Goth / BDSM / Metal club and auction house where you can come and dance the night away, gamble to your hearts content, kick the shit out of your friends on fight night, spend a steamy night with our staff and enjoy the company of like minded individuals. E/RP LGBTQ+ friendly.

name: Blood and Velvet
description: We are a Goth / BDSM / Metal club and auction house where you can come and dance the night away, gamble to your hearts content, kick the shit out of your friends on fight night, spend a steamy night with our staff and enjoy the company of like minded individuals. E/RP LGBTQ+ friendly.

name: The Black Cat
description: The Black Cat is a new, up-and-coming club/café style venue. We have a bartender awaiting all of your requests!
In addition, we have several poles for you to use to your heart's content as well as a stage for all you bards out there!

name: Dark Rabbit Lounge
description: Welcome to Dark Rabbit Lounge, a solo ran establishment where we emphasize fun, relaxation, good food and drink, with music sprinkled in and friendly faces all around!

name: Midnight Diner
description: Inspired by the J-Drama series of the same name. Midnight Diner is an Izakaya Bar that is open late at night within the backstreets of Kugane. Where the "Master or Taisho" opens his diner to work late within the night cooking for everyone who wishes to relax in a venue that is inclusive to the LGBT+ Community and RP-experience or skill level. "Order anything you'd like as long as I have the ingredients"

name: The Shore
description: Friendly welcoming venue to party and dance or chill and relax in the bathhouse. Playing the best of the 80s/90s/00s, pop, dance club hits and party anthems. Open every other Saturday with theme nights once a month. Chat and flirt with the friendly bar staff or get up and dance in the suspended celling cage. Drink specials each theme night, and specially decorated to fit each theme.

name: E.D.E.N Gentlemen's Club & Casino
description: Exquisite establishment servicing both our high roller gamblers upstairs and our naughtiest of clients down in the dungeons 😉

name: Spearsong Whisky Distillery and Lounge
description: An LGBT+ Friendly 18+ whisky bar and lounge. Come try aetherically altered drinks, monster food, and relax with friends.

name: Morbol Flowers Inc.
description: Morbol Flowers Inc. – the newest and hottest dispensary in Eorzea!

Join us on Thursdays and Sundays from 9-11pm EST, at our location in Aether - Sargatanas - Mist - Ward 12- Plot 31, as we showcase our collection of the freshest cannabis products available in the market.

Our team of experienced budtenders will be on hand to guide you through our impressive selection and answer any questions you may have. From premium bud to top-quality concentrates and edibles, we've got it all!
So, come and join us for a night of fun, laughter, and good vibes. Experience the best that herbal medicine has to offer at Morbol Flowers Inc.
We look forward to seeing you there!

name: Club Passion
description: The Club Passion is a fun and LGBTQ+ friendly environment that welcomes RPers of all skill levels! Offering Courtesans', dancer's, drinks, and games. located on CRYSTAL, ZALERA, Mist, Ward 12, Plot 32

name: The Jade Window
description: A Far Eastern Luxury Bar and Lounge located in the Black Shroud. Run solely by proprietress Rihua Hong, it is dedicated to being a safehaven for players to slow down and unwind, whether they choose to roleplay or not. *Strictly a SFW space.*

name: Verdant Cove
description: A small lounge area located in the Mist. Green as the Shroud itself, a little closer to nature.

name: The Cupboard: Tea Room & Parlor
description: Offering comforting refreshments with cozy surrounds for conversation aplenty - our menu changes for each week's open hours, so be sure to see if your favorites are featured this time around.
With periodic events, weekly open hours, and rental and hosting services available, we hope you find whatever it is you're looking for in a corner of The Cupboard.

name: The Gingerbread Inn
description: Welcome to "The Gingerbread Inn" We hope you enjoy your stay! ^^

name: Amielux
description: Amielux luxury strip club with a full bar 18+ no minors.
Energy: Relaxed, sexy, fun, expensive.
Services: Lap dance, escort, voyeur, and cuddle services. (All services are NSFW. No NSFW services for Lalafell.)
Environment: A high-end strip club that is RP friendly. I want to provide a setting where it feels like a real-world experience in FFXIV.
This is not a dance club or a hype club.
The Bar: Me and a my roommate bartend with our fairies, Eos and Selene. This experience is RP heavy, since you will be communicating with our fairies.
No trolls, please dress edgy, sexy, or classy to keep the vibe. (No masks, animal costumes, etc.)
Managers:
@vanillakahlua

name: Bliss
description: Bliss is an eastern inspired nightclub with a simple goal in mind. FUN! Plain and simple in it's purest terms. A place for you and all of your friends to come by and chill, listen to music, drink all night long. With fun as our core value, we aim to provide the best experience possible. Located in the heart of the Lavender Beds, surrounded by lush green grass, and sights one can only dream of.

name: Toe Beans Café
description: Super sweet and friendly cat cafe

name: Siren's Song
description: Siren's Song is Nightclub Venue on Coeurl! We enjoy rocking our boat, until the ship sinks to the bottom of the sea, or the Grotto crumbles!!!
Open every Saturday from 8pm to 12am EST

name: Blessed Heaven
description: Blessed Heaven is an 18+ softcore RP venue, that will offer a variety of services! we have lovely and welcoming staff ready to give you an unforgettable time. So, please come and enjoy your stay provided courtesy by the Bless Brother's. \o/

name: Steamy Ventures
description: Steamy Ventures is a complimentary Onsen Spa located inside The Forum Shopping Center. We're a RP friendly, SFW environment, with a focus on relaxation. Swim Attire is requested. Limited attire available for purchase if you don't have your own. Patrons are welcome to tip the attending staff at their own discretion.

name: Star HQ
description: Star HQ is a high-quality lounge and casino. Come dressed in your best formal attire and get ready to enter high-stakes games.

name: The Break Of Dawn
description: A nice little corner in the night at the mists, A lovely little spot to take a few friends to hang at and enjoy the ambience and the music! There could be things for just about anyone here. All you have to do friend is just come on down to find out if its right for you.

name: Manoir du Graal Adult Host Club
description: Once an exclusive house of pleasures to Ishgard's elite, the high class Manoir du Graal is now opening its doors to the public! The antiquated design of the Ishgardian Manorhouse hosts a wide variety of services. Whether you want to simply relax and enjoy the ambience, or enjoy a glass of our finest house wines and cocktails our skilled staff work hard to ensure your happiness is guaranteed.

If you wish for a more personal touch, our staff can provide you with a variety of different services ranging from simply keeping you company or providing information, to massages or for the most indulgent of clientele we do offer more intimate services with our hosts!
We open weekly at 5pm EST at Ward 8 Plot 60 in the Empryeum on Balmung, we hope to see you there!

name: The Dawn Tavern
description: I am a tavern in a small house that is AFK friendly, LGBTQ+ friendly and I try to go for a cozy environment.

name: The Honest Gillionaire
description: You already know you're better than everyone else. Why not treat yourself like it? The Honest Gillionaire is the ULTIMATE VIP experience on Crystal. Come pamper yourself like the Royalty you are. You know you deserve it.
Be it from our beautiful lounge accompanied by gorgeous bard music to our casino. When you step through the door, our hosts and hostesses treat you like royalty and cater to your every whim.
Our bar and casino staff are some of the best found on Hydaelyn and are there just to serve you.

name: CatGroove
description: 4 Different 18+ venues under the same umbrella rotating on Saturdays to bring a lot of variation and themed nights. dancer services, gamba and so on ❤️ **Check the website, PF or our discord for the correct address of the week!**

name: The Pond
description: Welcome to The Pond: A place where you can take off your heavy armour and put down your sword while enjoying a nice cold beer and local music! Whether you're looking for some new adventures, a place to relax or wanting to gamble your gil we are the place for you!

name: Hell's Sanctuary
description: "Take a step into a sanctuary in the depths of Hell. A lush, and lavish den of sin where the denizens of hell dance the night away, and temptations abound. Complete with a bath area, a wide variety of seating, and a full stocked bar, come enjoy our rock/metal DJs and the tempting delights of Hell's Sanctuary."

name: Sirensong
description: Sirensong is an elegant RP focused okiya and lounge with a Ruby Sea theme. Come join us Thursdays from 9PM to 12AM EST!

name: The Tea Shop Boutique
description: The Tea Shop Boutique was first opened up as a respite from all the craziness of other venues. A cute and cozy atmosphere and a good cup of tea is what we offer! Anyone who is looking for a place to relax or enjoy a cup of tea is welcome! Afker's and tea enthusiasts alike.

name: Sakura's Smol Cafe
description: Its a smol cafe ^^  We offer Food, Drinks. Rp, and a open bard stage! It is down stairs while a casino will be upstairs! Please feel free to visit both and test your hand at gamba!

name: Cau rabuncle
description: Housing of buncle offers you a special Halloween event. Come over for the spooky times.

An open, free to use and to enjoy, carbuncle house. The garden being a cute little spot to rest at with your Carby pet. On the bottom floor is a lovely bathouse. On the ground floor, a lounge area, on the top floor a cute little carbuncle café. And more room to come. Feel free to come over and relax as much as you want.

name: End of the Line
description: End of the line is a Futuristic Nightclub! Come dance the night away and fulfill your desires with our amazing staff! Featuring talented live DJs, 90/10 Auctions, Giveaways, Raffles, Gambling, Photography and more!

name: Heaven 27
description: Heaven 27 is a Nightclub type venue open in the afternoons! We are RP friendly aswell as open to people who just want to come have a chat and enjoy the company! Our regular times is at Sunday's at 4pm EST. At H27 we can promise you everytime we open our door we have have -- Live Music -Hosted Trivia's, Giveaways, Casino Games, aswell as a Bar (https://heavensbar.carrd.co/). When we are open we have a Photographer on the spot to take professional pictures, so make sure you smile a bit extra ;)!  We Occasionally host special events, from themed, Outdoor and Holiday celebrations!

name: Azem's Crossroad
description: Azem's Crossroad is a meeting place for all adventurers to come and go on quests, raise in the ranks, and enjoy some D
&D style RP fun. Whether you are in the mood for nourishment, relaxation, or adventure, you have come to the right place.

name: Club Mafioso
description: A mafia themed bar, where all the wrongdoers, lawbreakers and other delinquents can call home.

name: Shadowsong
description: [RP/NSFW-18+] Club with Gamba, Drinks, & DJ!
Grab a drink, sit back and relax or show off your moves on the dance floor!

name: The Oubliette
description: The Oubliette is a BDSM Dungeon Themed Night Club with a Kitty Themed Bar. Offering a safe place for people to express their secret desires free of judgment and within the walls of a dungeon with like-minded people. The cozy, mysterious aesthetic will surely have you purring with joy in one way or another. Multiple services being offered such as VIP, time with our fellow staff members, and venue renting. *Now come and let your desires roam free.*

name: Eluded Ecstasy
description: Heaven or Hell--In which realm of reality does your soul reside? Were you a saint, to be rewarded with the Light bathing you in its warm and boundless protection? Or were you a sinner, fated to have the Dark burn away at your soul for all Eternity?

Eluded Ecstasy is a place for community, love, and experiences that you won't soon forget! We provide just the right touch of chaos to transport you out of the doldrums of life and into the ecstasy of the afterlife. Join us Saturdays and Mondays for exciting themed events, along with our resident DJs including DJ Potate, DJ Swage, DJ Rof, DJ Kaen and our very own DJ Aemilia!
We offer a dual-themed venue, VIP programs, and have amazing staff that will make sure your visit to the life hereafter falls nothing short of perfection!

name: ALTITUDE
description: Welcome to Eorzea's only block party club!
We have VIP, GAMBA, DR STREET BATTLES, and LIVE DJs every night!

We are dedicated to the community DJs, so we want to provide a fun and positive space for them to do what they love, which means we never know what vibes they are going to bring us and therein lies the fun!
We are about positivity, love, respect, and inclusion. We want Altitude to be a place where you make and share good memories!

name: The Rainforest Cafe
description: Welcome to The Rainforest Cafe! We are a SFW cafe/restaurant based off of the real-life Rainforest Cafe's. We serve a variety of foods, drinks, and sweets as well as having our own little gift shop! The owner also offers free character sketches for those who are interested.

name: Fiddlesticks' Funny Flat
description: The Funny Flat is my humble Eorzean comedy club crashpad, where I occasionally host a refreshing smoothie bowl service featuring flavors in customized combinations! Adventurers can wander in freely expecting a bountiful blend of lively banter peppered with puns and punchlines, along with other light-hearted, fruit-filled fare. Spoony bards, poets and aspiring stand-up comedians are welcome to hone their craft in my colorful sitting room, and all are invited to drop in for a giggle.

name: The Wolfs Respite
description: We at the wolfs respite to give you a nice late night place to kick off your shoes relax and unwind from your crazy adventures saving the world as as know.

We also have an extensive an library; you are free to grab a book do some research or just read a steamy romance. If we do not happen to have a book you want please feel free to let us know and we will do our best to have it for you on your next visit.

name: The Kitty Kashpot
description: Welcome to the Kitty Kashpot, a wonderful new home for all of your gambling needs. Built by friends, for friends, we pride ourselves on being the fairest gambling attraction on Aether! Come test your luck, bring your lapcats or your Lucky bunn and have a night you're sure not to forget!

name: The Blue Moon Bistro
description: A café in The Lavender Beds, with a staff dedicated to quality and a calming atmosphere.

name: The Tom Cat
description: The Tom Cat is proud to serve as the best little gay club in all Eorzea. We are LGBTIA+ friendly and offer a range of services including themed refreshments, raffles and giveaways, live Bard and DJ entertainment and Court companionship.

name: The Boiler Room
description: The Boiler Room, which used to be a small speakeasy nightclub hidden below a tavern, has now upgraded to a larger venue. The 2.0 version is a sleek, modern nightclub with a large dance floor and plenty of lounging space to relax with friends. The venue offers gambling, hostess service to have some pleasant company for the night as well as a live DJ. On most nights, you can tune in to DJ Paullyrot, a very talented DJ with over 30 years of experience behind the turntables. The Boiler Room is the perfect destination for late night entertainment and will host a party you won't forget.

name: Love by Snu Snu
description: Love by Snu Snu Spa and Motel is a romantic and fairy themed bath house with curated private rooms available to rent. Hot tubs, showerbeds, love couches and feet soaking physical/metal therapy chairs are arranged for destressing and relaxing. Public bathroom with powder and make-up kits available for free use.
Love by Snu Snu also has a separate small venue within it:
The Rubdown (Room 5 of venue): Nature themed massage parlor with 3 different services available from our massage therapist; Clothed Massage, Naked Massage and Table Shower. (open during venue hours)

name: Lunalis
description: We are a Japanese-Inspired Nightclub and Bar Venue. We draw heavy inspiration from the moon and modern japanese interior design. You can see our inspiration in areas like our stage, the stars we have scattered around, our main color scheme, and more.

We are a semi-new venue. We were previously known as Eastern Paradise but, that doesn't have much of a ring to it, does it? We all made the decision to rebrand into Lunalis, along with completely stripping and redecorating the venue 3 times! And spending lots of money on new furnishing.
We hope our efforts are visible to you, and that our little venue is a wonderful experience!
So, come visit Lunalis, and bathe under the Moonlight with us!

name: Eorzean Trade Depot
description: The Eorzean Trade Depot is a shop where crafters, gatherers, and customers can meet to purchase and sell goods through RP and tax-free commerce on Tuesday Evening during Weekly Reset rushes begins. Low-level crafters and gatherers are welcome and are in fact encouraged to drop by and sell their wares! Even if it’s not on our market lists, we are open to taking items that you may need to offload. While the premise of the venue is commerce, it is a community oriented space that aims to foster camaraderie between disciples of the land and hand.

name: The Bazaar
description: The Bazaar is a hannish themed shopping center.The venue provides a variety of entertainment, retail shopping, leisure and social role-play opportunities:
Glamour Apparel Shop
Toy Store
Dye store
Crystal Shop
Tarot Reader
Fine Dining Restaurant
Onsen
Movie Theater
Raid Food/Pots Store
Hookah lounge
Furniture Store
....and more to come!

name: The Clumsy Karakul
description: → Steppe Restaurant & hunting guild|  "Come get these eats, come get these MEATS!"
We open Bi-Weekly on Friday's and Sundays!

name: The Wallflower Bar
description: The Wallflower is a small dance club and bar. We offer Drinks, Dancers Music and occasional raffles and cosplay contests. A chill hole in the wall atmosphere to meet new people or hang out with your friends.

name: The Aurora
description: Small venue giving people a chance to create their own. Blank venue pick your own theme.
We host bachelor/bachelorette parties, birthday parties, and wedding receptions. Speak with Bo Stash!

name: The Ivory Inn
description: We are a laid-back, light RP venue for every adventurer out there. Come join us for drinks, good company, games or just a nice nap!

name: The A'leycat
description: Brought to you by A'ley Bristanne herself, The A'leycat is Crystal's original rusty rave hall and the home of the Vibe//Tribe! Open late night every Saturday with resident DJAY YAMS!

name: Bae domain
description: A new and chill atmosphere Cactuar, run mainly by bunny girl!

A lot of bunny girls and bunny boys like to hang out at the venue, but everyone is welcome! We also have NSFW and SFW dancers if someone needs companionship. Our specialty drink is bunny milk, and we have egg nog and Hot chocolate made from bunny milk.
If you want to feel extra special become a Bae VIP, offering you use of our VIP booth, 50 minutes of dancing per week, use of our bathhouse and free bunny milk!

name: Steak N' Greet
description: Build with a cozy, warm, and causal friendly in mind. Steak N' Greet welcomes you to come to experience a relaxing dining experience. Whether is dine alone, with friends, or with families, everyone is welcome to enjoy a  good time. We provide the fresher and finest ingredients to all dishes that are up to your standard taste. If you are not too hungry and just want some good drinks to go around, we also had a variety of beverages to choose from. Everyone is welcome!

name: Wondrous Tales
description: Wondrous Tales is a live storytelling event where the audience's ideas shape the story. The author writes a tale on the spot, weaving the audience's suggestions into a spontaneous, engaging, and often bizarre story. This venue offers a unique and relaxing atmosphere for a calming evening. Check our site / discord for our weekly (alternating) schedule.

name: Terminal 6
description: Originally Demon Dice, Terminal 6 is one of the longest running clubs on Primal. Resident DJ's/Owners are Jojo Ohemgee, Booty Wigglin, and Baby Marshmallow. T6 is primarily focused on music! Other services are random depending on staff that are passionate about running them including, Auctions, Bar, Giveaways, etc.

name: AE Café
description: A subsidiary of The Aether Entertainer, hoping to provide a comfortable place to read, relax, or chat with the press staff. The cafe' was created with the intent of promoting The Aether Entertainer press and the featured venues or individuals each publication. During opening events, we hand out the latest newspaper early and serve warm beverages and baked goods. Since the topics we cover are ever-changing, so too will be the themed events we host here!

notices.message: This venue is open the last week of the month on the listed night.

name: The Sticky Whisker
description: The Sticky Whisker Cafe an all inclusive RP venue. Beginner RPing is okay! We are here for everyone ❤️

name: Club Moon
description: Welcome to club moon where you can come dance under the moon and stars while listening to great music.

name: Sleepy Dragon
description: Sometimes life can be a little hard.Empires to fight, monsters to defeat, mischievous Moogles ...Sleepy Dragon is a cafe focused on mental health that offers a place to relax your running mind, and maybe help you getting a little bit of sleep.

name: Crystal Café
description: The Crystal Café is a nice cozy spot to come relax in while sipping on a nice hot beverage or enjoy a scrumptious snack. We welcome all to come by and visit, whether you come by yourself or with friends.

name: Third Tarot
description: Salutations! My name is Alex Alkett and I’m an apprentice tarot reader guiding others in a spiritual journey to elucidate any situational matter. My garden is an open and highly confidential space providing the utmost respectful experience. Offering premier tarot reading services, including three card spreads of multiple varieties and the Celtic Cross spread.

name: Club Vice
description: ♥Welcome to Club Vice ♥
Club Vice is a 18+  venue with a dance area, lounges, private rooms, a bar and a VIP area.
We have several Twitch DJ's to bring you the tunes to dance onto or for relaxation.
Our music is mostly EDM/Dance and the harder sounds like Hardstyle and Hardcore.
RP Is highly encouraged! Come and experience!

name: City Pop Night Club
description: Your one stop location for good vibes and beach parties. We specialize in providing a comfy night club experience that features a live dj with every session. Immerse yourself in the sick underground beats or find solace in the cool oasis of the beach with your friends and loved ones!

name: Casa Del Soul
description: Casa Del Soul is a hip new place to vibe and have fun! Music! Casino! Theme Nights!
'Guest' Services! Dancing and the best staff in Eorzea! Come by for a drink, a friend, or a place to have a blast!

name: The Juice Bar
description: The sauciest speakeasy in Eorzea, catering to jazz vibes, elegant cocktails, delectable meals, live entertainment, dancers, live entertainment, and commissioned photography to commemorate the night at our lounge.

name: Kiki's Bath House
description: Come relax at Kiki's Bath House after a long night out... We have drinks, refreshments, lovely ladies, and of course, baths.

name: VII-X Bowling Alley
description: Yes... Bowling. (Formerly Jones Lanes)

name: Sweet Obsession Bakery
description: Located in the beautiful Lavender Bed, resides a secluded bakery known as Sweet Obsession. Freshly baked goods and drinks are provided with warm and safe environment while accompanying an open stage to bards. Open every Sunday.

name: Club Lunar
description: A high energy dance club experience.

name: Orchid Lounge
description: a verdant bar & bathhouse featuring barstools, hookah, and scented bath soaks

name: The Menagerie
description: *Requires pre-booked appointment via our Discord.* 🎎
If you follow the sounds of a trickling stream, nestled and hidden within the bright lights of Thanalan, you will find The Menagerie – a uniquely immersive RP venue.

Fresh lacquer, the sweet scent of newly woven tatami mats, and the warmth of a smile welcomes those that choose to step through the door. For those who are seeking something special, you'll find a haven of beauty and exquisite skill.

It’s where an exclusive, hand selected few have been trained as Geisha and Oiran for the pleasures of our esteemed guests. Tea Ceremonies, Fan Dances, Horoscopes and more...let our special jewels give you an intimate experience you won’t soon forget.

name: Déjà Brew Café
description: Come join us at Déjà Brew Café for a cozy wonderful evening of robust RP, good food and drinks (both coffee & cocktails!), and a wonderfully unique Astrologian themed venue! Find a place to sit, chat with your fellow Eorzeans, and enjoy a warm cup of tea while you share stories of adventuring or get a tarot reading from the owner, Vrin! Whatever you're looking for, there's a little bit of something for everyone.

name: Maple Bear Tavern
description: The Maple Bear Tavern is a Medieval tavern-style RP venue ran by the esteemed Sunbear. It is an establishment proudly offering camaraderie, fine fare, music, and never-ending ale!

name: The Silver Duck
description: An immersive RP venue located next to the beach in beautiful Shirogane - The Silver Duck offers entertainment and fellowship to Eorzea's adventurers.
With live bard music, excellent drinks and a warm, intimate atmosphere we promise you a night to remember!
__Highlights:__
- Live bard music and captivating performances.
- Photostudio for all your GPose needs, free to use! Ask the staff for available props.
- Fully equipped bar with alcohol-free options hosted by one of Eorzea's finest bartenders.
- Beautiful VIP-area.
- Enthusiastic staff that loves to engage with the guests; feel free to use the floor and ask your server for a dance if the music makes you want to do a little jig!
- A menu that is constantly updated to keep your tastebuds fresh.
... and more!

The lounge will continue to expand and evolve as new ideas and features are added - but our primary goal is to make everyone feel welcome, have a fun time roleplaying and leave our venue with happiness in their heart.
Open every other Friday, with our Grand Opening happening on March 17th!

name: Demimonde Apothecary
description: Apothecary, Soothsaying and Dabbler in the Dark Arts
Bespoke solutions for all of your adventures into the Neverwhere and beyond.

name: The Afterlife
description: The Afterlife is a bar venue, made and inspired by the same bar from Cyberpunk 2077. The bar has a Cyberpunk theme, with many references and slang thrown around from that universe. A great place for those who want to incorporate a Cyberpunk RP into their life, or enjoy all things Cyberpunk. A great venue to relax on a Friday night with friends.

name: The Iron Rose
description: The Iron Rose is a kink / BDSM centric venue which seeks to provide a fun experience that both educates and elevates, straddling the line of different worlds drawn from the collective knowledge of our staff. Come on by and have a drink, or an entire encounter, so long as you remember consent reigns...
Needless to say, visiting us is an 18+ affair.

name: The Last Request
description: Cozy and classy, with just the right bit of morbid humor mixed into it, The Last Request is a place you would want to go before you start a new chapter in your story. Whether it is a farewell dinner with a good friend, a late-night dinner before you pass out for the night, or your last meal before you set off to fight a minotaur…The Last Request is here to fulfil your ermm…last requests.

name: Desert's Refuge
description: Desert's Refuge is a SFW, lore-heavy RP tavern located in Ul'dah where adventurers and other characters that find themselves in the desert city can visit to escape the unforgiving environment and meet other characters.

You find an unassuming poster advertising Desert's refuge amidst countless advertisements in Ul'dah promoting the most lavish of inn rooms for millions, cures for incurable diseases, and taverns with fees to even enter.
Thirsty? We have drinks.
Hungry? We have food.
Just want some shade from the sun? Sure. Come on in.
No Brass Blades!

name: Carby Cafe
description: Welcome to Carby's a nice relaxing chill Carbuncle themed Cafe where you can have fun and meet new friends

name: Under the Moonlight
description: Under the Moonlight is an RP heavy social lounge venue that hosts a variety of services; a fully stocked bar, nightly RP-based entertainment, general SFW, and NSFW RP, to name a few. We have monthly reoccurring events as well as extras dabbled in where we can. All of them are centered around RP and feature our engaging and delightful staff. Things can get a bit chaotic sometimes, but we work very hard to be open and welcoming to all walks of life and RP experience levels. We would love to see you grow with us!

name: Down Under Cozy Lounge and Bar!
description: The Down Under Cozy Pop-Up Venue is a chill place for adventurers and bar-hoppers alike. With a small, but friendly and accepting staff, we are open and welcoming to people from all walks of life.

name: The Revenant
description: A small, cozy and immersive café that offers a place to hang out or afk. Downstairs, you can find the adventurers lounge where you can hire them to do your bidding! or perhaps someone to join you on adventures?. We offer a friendly environment for all.

name: The Booty Room
description: Dive bar with an upstairs DJ, hot tub, and two tier dancing poles, lala-friendly furniture and fixtures.

name: Club ROSAS
description: A venue located in Primal Behemoth. Featuring music genres of bass house, trance and techno. Other genres are including during event nights.
Club Rosas was newly opened late August 2022.
We are looking to create a place for DJ's to get their mixes and music heard aswell as players to spend their quality time with friends or dancers.
We are looking to affiliate and open to new upcoming DJs aswell as new to RP players.
New staff are always welcome.
Base rate for dancers starts at 2mil/hour.

name: Maid Service Cafe
description: Maid Service Cafe is a maid café made with love for you. Please, make yourself comfortable and enjoy your time in our cozy atmosphere.
♡ What to expect from the cutest maids in Eorzea:
• Tasty Food → Maids and butlers will bless your food using magic.
• Cute pictures → We are always taking screenshots of our visitors.
• Music → Our stage is always open for the most amazing bards.
• Party Service → You can hire our staff members to work in your own private party.
• Seasonal Events → We are always preparing something new for you.
• Art → The maid café owner offers art commissions. She also gifts the masters who are active on the discord server with emotes.
More than a maid café, a home. Come stay comfy with us, Master. ♡

name: Berry's
description: Berry is that natural entertainer in your friend group - where no day is the same when you’re around them. Berry now brings you Berry’s - a venue you can only explain through having experienced it, and no week is the same.
It’s very much the same eclectic, random, creative, and humorous personality you’ve come to know from the owner.
So, come and relax on a Friday night with Berry, in a premium burger bar environment, with our trivia and glam contests (and ofcourse live music and an open stage on the side)!

name: Coeurl Licked Salon
description: Thanalans hottest one stop spot for the trendiest coiffure, glamour , and relaxation. Whether it's a simple trimup or total glowup. Fava Bean's chair is open for Eorzea!

name: Skywhale Pizza
description: Sky Whale Pizza! We deliver anywhere in Eorzea across the data center! Visit us directly for pick up! If we aren't at the shop please throw us a message! We'll come back as swift as we deliver." - Team SkyWhale

name: Wishbone Race Cafe
description: Wishbone Race Cafe is a SFW Racing themed venue were visitors can either bet on races or race themselves to win prizes. However if racing isn't  your thing you could always relax in the bath or enjoy the fine food served by our lovely chocobolic hostess.

name: The Fallen
description: The Fallen, a Rock / Metal themed club for every fallen soul that seeks a place to party through the night with some good music, lovely dancers and a well stocked bar.

name: The Spoony Bard & Grill
description: Lively bar that hosts Bard Concerts and serves up great food and drinks

name: The Vale
description: Relaxed nightclub atmosphere, live DJ, substantial VIP packages, inclusive and heavy roleplay compatible environment! Everything a patron could desire and more with our competent and friendly staff you're sure to get the individual attention you deserve. Come visit us at The Vale on Sundays 9pm-12am EST.

name: The Tengille Tavern
description: Located at Empyreum's Ingleside tower, we are an SFW establishment on Jenova offering our patrons both immersive and casual RP. Tucked away inside this cozy nook, you'll find good food and drink, good conversation, and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere. In addition to our tavern services, we also offer an open stage and an in-house portrait artist (when advertised). Thanks for giving us a look, and we hope to see you soon!

name: Vier'amour Host Club
description: The Vier'amour Host Club, located in the magnificent city of Ishgard, is a relaxing refuge where tired travelers may unwind, sip Ishgardian Tea, and socialize with their favorite Hosts/Hostesses. Purchase a booth and get endless free treats and beverages, buy a sketch from one of our respected hosts, or just have some enjoyable conversation.

name: Tales of Our Star Library & Café
description: A place to relax,
A place to unwind,
Away from the bustle,
Leaving it all behind.

Tales of Our Star is a newly-opened library & café with a cozy and warm atmosphere, suitable after a long day of adventuring. Come enjoy a book, a snack, or just relax! We have an open stage for music, theater, and storytelling. Our Staff would love to recommend and share short readings for your enjoyment.

name: Pinna Tour Guides
description: I take people on extensive journeys through Eorzea. We visit locations, talk about history, encounter fauna and flora.
﻿There is a lot to be seen and I would love to travel with you :3

name: Hotbody Haven
description: Hottest New Club on Crystal! Open Select Saturdays!
Come hang out at Hotbody Haven for some Hot Vibes and Hotter Folks!
We offer a Full Bar with Food / Drinks, Dancers, Giveaways, and DJs!

name: Envious
description: Envious is a 18+ Adult Maid Theme Brothel & Cafe. We host monthly Public RP/ERP events and weekly special theme openings based on popular Kinks.

name: Seventh Heaven
description: An after-work hangout for for everyone. Cocktails and cooking are big hits among the locals.

name: The Sharlayan Collective
description: Calling all Sharlayan citizens, ex-pats, or interested parties! The Sharlayan Collective is a group of Sharlayan citizens dedicated to furthering their pursuit of knowledge. Join us every other Thursday where we open our doors to new members and meet with each other on a drop-in basis! Are you a researcher with a budding thesis? Perhaps a student trying to get into the Studium? Or maybe a Gleaner hoping to find untapped knowledge? Whatever the case, all interested parties are welcome for an intellectual RP experience! Please check our website for this week's location!

location.override: Location varies. Please check our website for the location for the week!

name: Desert Rose
description: The Desert Rose Club is an exciting venue that runs on Friday nights from 6 PM to 4 AM. The theme of the event is centered around the best music from the 80s, 90s, and 2000s. With great music, fun-loving people, and a relaxed atmosphere, the Desert Rose Club is the perfect destination to unwind, socialize, and dance. The club features experienced DJs who know how to get the party started and keep the crowd dancing all night long. If you're looking for an amazing night out in a fun and welcoming environment, be sure to check out the Desert Rose Club.

name: Lizzur Lounge Café
description: The Lizzur Lounge Café is one part of a double venue dedicated to providing a relaxing and immersive coffee shop experience for our patrons. Light RP is encouraged but not required!

*The barista shuffles off behind the counter again with your order - the clinking of plates barely audible over the jazz musician's lively trill. You take a deep breath and bask in the warm aroma of freshly brewed coffee.*
+ SFW, LGBTQ+ friendly!
+ Food and drinks provided by our lovely barista!
+ Our stage is open to all performers willing to share their talents!
+ Now featuring a live Twitch stream! Tune in during venue hours for some soothing music!

name: Hyakkaou Popoto Academy
description: HPA is a SFW casino themed as a school. Our goal is to provide a comfy atmosphere for those that enjoy gambling. Whether thats partaking in games in our classrooms or hanging out at the cafeteria. We strive to provide a wholesome environment to all of our guests.

name: Five Star's Fortunes
description: The shop opens on a truly random schedule. So, you can leave a message in the guestbook, or send a /t to Prueht Baradho@Mateus for service!

name: The Night Club
description: An exclusive and luxury club experience.The Nightclub is where the stress of daily life will simply melt away with live music, drinks, people, conversations, atmosphere and an array of services. Aside from the main floors, there are five different private venues open for guests to experience be it taking pictures with friends or just finding somewhere to have downtime away from the crowds.

The Nightclub also has two in-house streamers who create a fun mix of music every week for guests to enjoy alongside occasionally offering their artistic services for giveaways and custom art guests can receive of their characters. The Nightclub aims to provide Siren with another fun venue to relax away the long hours of work and stress, so come on down and dance the night away!

name: Vibe House - Nightclub
description: Boiler room-style nightclub & late-night party spot located on Sargatanas, featuring chaotic ambiance, a weekly rotating color scheme, bar, live resident DJs, nightly raffles, & giveaways.

Top-tier live music, great vibes, and a strong sense of community are what sets Vibe House Nightclub apart from the rest of the crowd. We have one purpose: provide great vibes and great tunes with DJs and performers that you know you love.

Our resident DJs include some of Aether's top entertainment: Liluyeet, Swage, DJ Potate, DJ Gremlo, DJ Fluxt, DJ ThisWayUp, DJ Fluxt, and DJ Bunnychan to provide the most bumpin' beats Eorzea has to offer late-night.

name: HELLO Kitty Pop-Up Cafe
description: Our SFW Roleplay Pop-Up Cafe is appearing ALL OVER EORZEA! ..but only for ONE NIGHT! Have a Sweet Day!

location.override: Various locations in Primal; check Discord.

name: Primal Rib Alehouse & Eatery
description: Fed up with silent venues? Hoping to connect with others but scared to try? Missing out on some Chaos in your life? Say no more and queue up at the PRAE! (Primal Rib Alehouse & Eatery) Our eastern inspired eatery & lounge has a little of something for everyone: BBQ service with delicious meats and treats, a myriad of thematic corners to relax and unwind, hot springs to soak in, and a fun friendly staff waiting to serve!

name: Steppe Ramen
description: Steppe Ramen is a ramen shop that provides a casual dining experience on the main floor but also has private tables for dates or large groups. Guests can expect a mix of ramen classics and fusion ramen creations from the lead chef's imagination. The staff strive to provide excellent customer service and a welcoming environment for all roleplayers.

name: The Lunatarium
description: A cosy event venue for special occasions and parties run by the Cursive Scion.

name: Boutique & Bistro "Cats"
description: This Boutique & Bistro lets you browse glams at your own leisure! 🌺 You can buy (nearly) all items right off our mannequins ♥️ We also take commissions and do a Fashion Report Delivery service!

name: Yumineko Teahouse
description: Yumineko Teahouse is a modern Japanese Ryotei-inspired Restaurant in the heart of Shirogane. We offer your delicious three-course Menus and a broad variety of hot, cold, and alcoholic drinks. Your stay will be accompanied by the enchanting melodies of our Bard and light conversations with the Staff present.

name: Club KOD
description: Join us for a musical journey and a wonderul immersive experience where you will be treated like your part of the family! Let us make your night just a little bit better and come party with us! Club KOD loves all of you! ❤️

name: PAINTPOT
description: PAINTPOT is a small RP friendly, passion project Cafe, that is designed to bring people together, through rest and relaxation, be it in the uniquely coloured Cafe upstairs or in the bath house below, complete with soft lighting and a miniature zen garden, theres something for wveryone,
Paintpot has been designed to offer a place of respite for anyone who may stumble upon it, whether its a catch up with friends or some wind down time, Paintpot's doors will always be open to you.

name: Rescue Pet Pals
description: We are just a group of people that wanna have the chance to provide others with the joy of helping those pets without home, giving them a chance for a better life and a new lovely home with you our dearest costumer!

name: Fiesta Latina
description: Latin club con RP en Español! Recomendamos venir en traje de baño! Tenemos un Bar con bebidas latinas y comida también! Nuestro staff habla español y esta listo para hablar contigo y bailar, tal vez algo mas si ustedes lo desean! 😉 También hay eventos calientes donde podrás ganar mucho gil y bebidas gratis! Nuestros DJs tocan temas latinos de pop, reggaetón, urbano, bachatas y mucho mas en español! Noches temáticas y divertidos juegos siempre!

Latin club where the main action is in Spanish! But don't be shy you may meet other English users and feel a true latin experience, we have a English speaking Bartender and also our staff speaks English if needed, however our main objective is for you to try to have fun in Spanish! 😁 💛
Abrimos Todos los segundos y ultimos Martes desde las 9PM EST a 12 AM EST! (Revisar en Discord las fechas exactas")
Open Every second and last Tuesday 9PM EST to 12 AM EST! (Check discord for exact dates!)

name: Eden's Corner
description: Eden's Corner is a Nightclub & Lounge for those adventurers out there who've found themselves weary of some socializing. Our exterior leans heavily to an eastern feel, as it ties back into the Eden's history. Lets not forget our interior, that has a unique vintage theater/cabaret vibe that houses many amenities to explore. Examples being a DJ booth, Fully stocked bar, A tarot booth, a gambling corner, a stage that houses our very own dancers, hot tubs at the bar alongside a hot spring outside & all the seating you could ever ask for. And to top it off, we have our wonderful staff returning to serve all patrons alike.

name: Blasphemy
description: The Newest, Fully Immersive RP Venue.
Catering for, and tailored to those in the BDSM Lifestyle and the LGBTQ+ Community.
NSFW/18+ ONLY
Offering:
Fully Stocked Bar
Live Music /DJ's
Giveaways
Gamba (Of a kind!)
Drinking Games
Dancers NSFW&SFW
Professional Courtesans and Hosts
VIP Loft & Booths
VIP Packages
Photographer
Immersive RP of the Highest Quality
Fully Trained Staff to help with your Every Whim
A Safe Place

name: Galaxy
description: Seek The Star! Come Dance the night away to amazing beats! Relax Under the Stars while you drink at our Hilariously fun bar! Try your luck through them Dice at our Casino! Shine Bright as a Star and Enjoy the company of our lovely entertainers! Seek the Embrace of the Stars, at Galaxy Nightclub!

name: Magicka
description: A tarot reading experience, with seasonal magical items that can be purchased as well. This venue offers the comforts of a green witch's lair, and the mystery of fortune telling.

name: The Bakery
description: Possibly the only bakery that's not actually a bakery, a new club and community fresh out the oven!

name: Cafe de Luna
description: Just a small little cafe for you to spend some time relaxing in after a long day or before a busy evening!

name: Null and Void
description: You’ve heard whispers about this place. You’ve might have seen notes swap hands on the busy streets of Uldah, found a cryptic message on a shipping manifest in Limsa, or a carved symbol on a less traveled grove in Gridania. Standing outside of it now, you are greeted with the same symbol that has haunted your travels leading you here to this place.

It appears so mundane, so normal – that for a moment you truly wonder if the fuss you’ve made to get to this point is all in your head. Perhaps, it has all been errant dreams and this journey has been a misguided fool’s errand. Still, you’ve come this far and while it isn’t too late to turn back the draw of the unknown outweighs your better judgement, and you turn the handle.

(Null and Void is a neutral ground for supernatural creatures to interact with adventurers like yourself. With an emphasis on story and roleplay, N&V is an immersive venue that explores a variety of themes. Our hosts have the primary focus of providing quality, interactive roleplay to further develop your character’s story as well as their own. You will find a variety of different creature types among our hosts, and nothing is quite like what it seems.)

name: Cafe Blackjack
description: Cafe Blackjack is an upscale establishment located on the hills of Mist. We offer our clientele a selection of different tax-free games, such as blackjack and slots. We also have a full service bar and café, featuring a cozy fireplace that we invite you to curl up in front of if you need a break. On our main stage bard performances are provided for your enjoyment by “The Golden Harmonics.'' Listen to their set from one of our dining tables, or watch them from above on our second floor balcony. No matter what type of evening you are looking for, our staff strives to ensure that guests have a memorable and comfortable experience. We look forward to having you with us!

name: The Birdhaus
description: Welcome to The Birdhaus! We are a SFW, immersive roleplay noodle bar and cafe located in Limsa Lominsa's Mist residential district first ward at plot 58!  Join us for welcoming atmosphere, friendly faces, music and amazing Doman and Far East inspired dishes! We also offer raid consumables, master recipes and omnicrafting services if needed.

name: Femboy Hooters
description: Femboy Hooters a fun restaurant venue experience where you can be served food and drink by some of the cutest femboys you can find in Eorzea!

name: Abyssal
description: We're a chill venue for people to come drink out with friends, vibe to some beats, or just party it up on the dance floor. We welcome all members of the community, whether you're casual to hardcore Rper, or just someone who likes the venue scene. So what are you waiting for? Come peek your head inside and seek what awaits. Our friendly staff will be glad to welcome you.

name: Honey Bee Inn
description: Life can be harsh but we can make it oh so sweet!

One of Crystal's largest immersive roleplay venues, we offer RP services and live performances along with special events every month! With over 90 staff members, there is always something for everyone, whether you're looking for casual conversation or more sultry services.  Not only that, but our prices are some of the lowest on Crystal and we cater to players of all skill levels, not just the veterans.

Our staff are made up of seasoned roleplayers and newcomers alike, all of whom are happy to interact with anyone, regardless of your gender, race or sexuality. At HBI, it's not about the bookings but enjoying a night of fun filled roleplay! We feature one of the best VIP programs which includes having a room at the Inn decorated to your specific tastes as well as a drink that you design added to our menu!
Whether you want to write the night away with one of our talented staff or just want to people watch as the yellow and black dances around you, HBI is the place to be!

name: The Violet Paladin
description: The Violet Paladin is a Lesbian/Sapphic and overall queer cafe originally ran out of Ul'dah by Odsar Tuva. We are RP heavy, AFK safe, 18+ SFW RP and always looking to take more people in our staff for any role or position! Check out our site for times, menus and much more! We'd love to see you. WE ARE ONLY OPEN EVERY THIRD SATURDAY PER MONTH. DOUBLE CHECK WHICH SATURDAY BEFORE COMING OVER!

name: Senpan Tea House
description: Senpan Tea House is a tranquil tea house tucked away in a quiet corner of Lavender Beds, allowing warriors and wanderers alike to relax as much as they want, for however long they want, either with their companions or by themselves.
We believe that everyone deserves to have peace, quiet, and a good cup of tea, and so our philosophy is to never bother our guests during their most needed and well-deserved downtime.

name: The Canopy Cafe
description: Coffee cups in the shade of leaves

name: The Happy Rabbit
description: Have you ever wished you could enjoy quality vegan food as well as bunnies in short shorts? Then The Happy Bunny is the restaurant for you. Farm to table, our food is cooked to order so it's always fresh. We have a vegan cafe on the top floor, perfect for a pick me up without compromising your values. The restaurant is downstairs, where you'll be seated by fairy, and are able to watch your food being cooked onsite. There's nothing fresher than The Happy Bunny, we hope to make you hop with happiness!

name: Honour's Rest Tavern
description: A refuge away from the cold, blistering winds of Coerthas. Nestled within the great city of Ishgard, Honour's Rest serves as the home away from home for the weary traveler.

Be you a long-standing warrior, a humble adventurer, or a simple passerby, you are always welcome to rest your weary blade, and enjoy good drink, good food, and good company, at Honour's Rest, where honour never rests.

name: Amaurotine Dreams
description: A tavern and cabaret, we hope to fill your night with only the most exquisite company to share your tales of journeys across Etheirys with! Come one come all to your little hidden unsundered paradise tucked away in the most resort area(s) of Eorzea! ❤️

name: Arbaro
description: light RP bistro
for folks who may be shy, but
never about food
Ask about our specials.

name: Just Chi’s
