description: [Open biweekly]A japanesque lounge that specializes in making cheese! Come relax with some entertainment, soak in our sauna or enjoy some cheesy snacks! (now with drinks!)

name: Autumn's Books & Music
description: Autumn's Books & Music has tunes for every occasion and books for all your learning needs!

name: GR Nightclub
description: GRNC would like to welcome you to a premium casino and club experience! Our casino floor offers dice and blackjack with special betting ranges for those extra high rollers.
We have a beautiful walk up bar that offers its own unique version of dice for those quick betters.
Join us on our lower floor for a night of dancing, drinks and enjoy the music from our live DJ’s
Special Events during closed hours - Join the discord for event information!

name: Electric Six
description: We are a late night LGBT Bar & Lounge located in the Lavender Beds of Sagittarius, owned and operated by DJ Xenophero.
E6 is an RP bar with a focus on m/m, but all are welcome to come hang out!

name: Rozenthorne
description: An 18 plus Brothel/Bar based out of Balmung with a goal of offering a more relaxed experience than all of the usual club scenes. While we may be a bit more risque we try to keep things subdued enough that even if it's not to your taste you could still enjoy the space around us... Though later in the night things may get a bit more open.

name: Paradise: EVE
description: A relaxing fancy place to drink, eat, and unwind after a long day of adventuring.

name: Metropolis
description: Metropolis is a late night heavy metal club, with a well-stocked bar, high volume guitar riffs and heart thumping drums. If heavy music, moshpits and a copious amount of alcohol is what you're looking for, you've found the place.

name: Love-craft
description: Welcome to the Love-Craft where we love-craft spirits just for you. We hope you howl our praises and not Boo our service, as we strive to give you one hell of a night. Have a Franken-stein or a Whiskey Werewolf! We are all dying to see you! Fangs for coming!!!!

name: The Sleepy Rabbit Coffee House
description: The Sleepy Rabbit Coffee House is a small Apartment based coffee shop aiming to simply provide a place for people to sit and relax for a bit before (or after) the club hops.

name: Club Eclipse
description: Night Club hosted by SoS FC! Free drinks, food, and entertainment! Live DJs every event, interactive events, raffles, and giveaways! Club is open every other Friday @9PM CST!

name: Touch of an Angel
description: Tired? Tense? Lonely? Touch of an Angel - Private Massage services can provide you with the relief and release you need to stand a little taller. We specialize in not merely working the knots out of your tired muscles, but the providing the companionship you need to take on your day with greater vigor and courage.

name: Reign Café
description: Somos um grupo de amigos com o objetivo de reunir a comunidade brasileira e aproximar pessoas com interesses em comum.
Focamos em criar um ambiente onde todos os jogadores possam interagir e criar laços.
Desejamos um ambiente alegre, de amizade, diversão :3

[Venue BR] Se você procura diversão, encontrou. Aqui na Reign todos são da realeza. ♔ NightClub & Casino - Mist W29 P2 - Toda sexta às 21hrs ♔ Café & Lounge - Goblet W23 P38 - Todos os dias das 10hrs às 14hrs ♥

name: The Repair Bay
description: An Android Themed bar RP Venue for Androids, Constructs, and other Mechanical Roleplayers! Organics welcome!

name: Cosmos
description: Cosmos is a modern, spacey and fun loving venue. We want to be a place for everyone who seeks some time off by listening to music, socializing or just chill. We have regularly Glam contests and giveaways at our parties.

name: Ten no Ji
description: Ten no Ji is a lounge set into an old Hingan mansion. The sordid history of the estate has proved to draw in spiritual activity and Yokai presence. This lounge looks to boast a flavorful Hingan experience down to the décor, drinks, and food. Our hosts are always looking to stir up conversation and entertain you with story and games. Just beware the spirits which haunt these halls, the darkness of the corners, and the glare of the man who spirits call 'lord'.

name: Witchvalve Manor
description: The Witchvalve Manor is a potion factory selling strange wares with a mystical steampunk and magic aesthetic, which offers in-lore illicit solutions to literally anyone and anything, welcoming the supernatural and weird. If forbidden magic, alchemy and technology sounds like something your character is interested in, the Witchvalve Manor is your new home. Welcome to the gateway of the underground, what's your story?

name: Dark Star Hostelry
description: High Class, High Sass. Chase your dreams, nightmares, ambitions, and fears in luxury, but be careful; beneath the decadent decor might just be more than you asked for.

name: The Dark Office
description: Welcome to the Dark Office !

name: Studio 31
description: Studio 31 brings the drinks.
Our downstairs, the red room, brings the nightlife.
Featuring live music every weekend from our in house DJ, DJ ANONYMOUS.

name: Spotlight
description: A private lounge and club.

name: The Overlook Inn
description: Come by for a relaxing evening! Grab a bite to eat at the cafe, a drink at the bar, or enjoy the wonderful indoor spring, and sauna downstairs! There's also a wonderful seating for the cafe outside, along with its own baths that look out over the waterfall, and lake behind the Overlook Inn! We also have rooms for rent as well with their own private bed and bath!

name: Asahi Supermarket
description: Asahi Supermarket offers an immersive in game shopping RP experience, complete with a department store downstairs and a functioning café. We also have a beautifully crafted motorcycle on display so be sure to take her for a spin!

name: Infinity
description: Welcome to Infinity, a club & casino where you can have fun with your friends playing some blackjack and dice games, gambling at the bar or dancing to our Live Music.
We have millionaire giveaways every night, raffles and prizes!
Visit our discord and join us for an amazing time!
* Website under construction.

name: Mettle & Bite Bounties
description: At some point, an expert Bounty Hunter grows tired of the standard-issue Company-sanctioned marks and seeks out greater challenge, greater danger, and greater thrill. Mettle & Bite opens its doors to you.

This is a welcoming space focused on camaraderie, but due to the nature of the work, dark or mature themes may arise. The tavern is open once a week on Saturday afternoons for immersive, character-driven RP designed to connect hunters with hunters, making new contacts and new relationships.
Once a month, we’ll host a live, lightly-GMed Bounty Hunt.
This is an 18+ venue/server, IC and OOC both.

name: Eben's Toy Kingdom
description: Welcome to Eben's Toy Kingdom!
Looking for stuffed toys?
We got you covered!
We have something for everyone! Wether you want to come hang out at the shop,browse the toys or just come say hi to eben!
Hope to see you there!

name: The Exalted Library
description: An apothecarian library selling auracites, secrets, knowledge, illegal products and more.

name: The Sweet tails cafe
description: A small cozy cafe for those who looks for a sweet treat for their day

name: Club Trance
description: Club Trance is a cyberpunk-themed nightclub located in the heart of the Mists on Sargatanas, Ward 13, Plot 15.  We offer premium curated music via Twitch, a fully-stocked bar and gambling offerings.  Drop in for a unique experience you’re unlikely to find anywhere else!

name: Moist Manor
description: Looking to play out your most realistic RP experiences? Want to just dance? Looking for rentable designer rooms? We've got everything to wet your taste buds~

name: Secret & Sin
description: We are the dark void of Gothic. Feel your body beat with our music stream. Let yourself drawn into a place where you can drop your mask and unleash your true self.

name: NightHaven EU
description: Come to NightHaven and start your weekend! Dance the night away with the best vibes, high quality drinks, sensual dancers and more!

name: Fairytale Hallows
description: Fairytale Hallows puts a new spin on the neighborhood café by offering more than just pastries and tea. Whether you're looking for a place to kick back and relax, a SFW place to RP, take some cute pictures in one of our themed areas, or a Stuffie to cuddle with, we've got you covered.

name: Parallels
description: LGBTQ+, Kink, and BDSM friendly club with drinks and gambling~

name: The Moist Tip
description: This evening, enter our walls and open wide for the ♥️  ❖【The Moist Tip】❖ ♥️ !!

The [18+] HOTTEST PINK and POPPIN' nightclub venue on Gilgamesh that's so moist, it'll leave you DRIPPING in GIL and DANK DRINKS! Slip into our judgment-free, welcoming to all humble abode and treat yourself to a fully loaded bar, gambling, and dancing!

name: Club Radiance
description: Club Radiance is a chill and friendly little place for adventurers to dance and chill and vibe with us! We offer drinks, music, bards, horrible jokes, positive vibes  and occasional events meant for some light-hearted fun! Saturday 12am-4am EST is when we're fully active, but everyone is welcome to vibe with us on other days 10pm-4am EST! Come rest your weary souls with us, travelers. ♥

name: Coyote Coffee
description: Coyote Coffee is an indie spot for coffee, pastries & live music located in the heart of Goblet. The coffeeshop beckons Eorzea’s weary creatives and those afflicted by wanderlust. Coyote Coffee doesn’t try too hard and hopes you won’t feel obligated to either. RPers and Non-RPers welcome. Lots of plants, cozy seating and an open stage await. Come grab your cup of sunshine!

name: Panini Plush Palace
description: The Panini Plush Palace is a toybox themed sandwich shop that's friendly to kids and adults alike! Feel free to let your inner child (or your outer child, if you happen to have one of those) roam free. We also do party games!

name: BlueMoon Nightclub
description: let yourself be guided by the glow of the Bluemoon and dive into the world of BlueMoon Nightclub with a relaxed atmosphere of good music, looking for fun or just to switch off all you should have is fun ♥

name: The Blind Pony
description: A lovely little cozy café located sea side in the Mist. We are RP, SFW and LGBTQ+ friendly. Come and take a break from adventuring or hunting with a nice hot cup of tea or espresso. Feel free to grab a treat while you are here as well. If you need a place just to relax please stop by.

name: Tipsy Teavern
description: Ruby Sea Exports is home to the Tipsy Teavern where you can have a Eastern and tea inspired drinks straight from the Far East. A Bar/Lounge/Restaurant to spend your nights with good company.

name: Nevermore
description: 18+ BAR THAT IS LGBTQ+ inclusive. We have a SFW Hydaelyn dancefloor and an NSFW Zodiark lounge. Live music and nightly giveaways!

name: The Waking Lion Cafe & Bistro
description: The Waking Lion Cafe & Bistro is a new and improved upgrade to the old Waking Lion Cafe. Bigger Venue, more seating, more chances for spooky relaxation! Locating in the Goblet residence of Thanalan, this black lace and low light goth inspired dessert cafe is reopened with a larger assortment of coffee's, cakes, and an expanded comfort food menu including some unique regional dishes rotating every week! Something still yet lurks below in the new venue, just present with the question, ||"What is the music of life?"|| to any staff member to have your access to the basement reserved!

name: Somdaze Rest "Cantina Theme"
description: Just a casual place to unwind after a long day. Have a meal or just a drink. Listen to some great bards playing on our Open Stage. Meet up with old friends or make some new ones.
Looking to learn what tomorrow holds, speak to Isooni, our Tarot Reader.
We strive to provide excellent service, good food, and a relaxed atmosphere.
"No gimmicks, no strings, no pressure".

name: Afterlife
description: Home base of Cross Data center  Goth event Afterlife.  An abandoned Goth club where once in a while its  doors open for a night to  recapture lost memories as well as create new ones. Activities :Fortune Telling , Riddler  game ,  Live Goth/industrial/EBM/Sythpop/Futurepop/ Agrotech  music and Drinks.

name: Club Shodo
description: Welcome to Club Shodo, the peaceful outlet of Shirogane’s most powerful Yakuza Clan - Clan Shodo. Not to worry though, you will be safe here, unless you misbehave, or deal drugs, or smell wrong, or dislike Lalafells. Otherwise you will be perfectly safe and there are absolutely NO illicit activities going on here..

In all seriousness, Club Shodo is Venue by Raiden’s Clan Shodo. A community that want to bring a mixture of Roleplay and Classic Night Club themes to you. What makes us unique? Regular roleplay events as well as supporting up and coming new DJs whenever we can.

name: DEAD RABBITS
description: Nightclub and Casino +18. DJs, dancing, drinks, and dice!

name: DICE
description: DICE is a KPOP performance group that hosts a SFW club, providing a social space and experience found nowhere else in Eorzea. While waiting for performances to begin, guests and fans alike can peruse the house menu from our custom domain with signature refreshments made by all Idols and Staff. Throughout the entirety of the night, the house DJ will be providing an upbeat set of KPOP music to provide just the right ambiance one would expect when walking through the doors of DICE.

All services and refreshments provided by the house are... on the house! Ultimately, your experience matters most to us, so we welcome all guests, fans, and friends alike to enjoy the shows presented by our Idols, the social showmanship of the Support Staff, and the pleasant company of their peers.

name: The Green Ivy
description: The Green Ivy is a Tavern and Bathhouse. We have a bar, 2 tubs to relax in, lofts to hang out on, and an open bard stage!

name: Echo
description: Open space +18 hotel/nightclub venue on ffxiv for events. Place is created in the mind of being an open space for basically anyone to self host their own events for free. If there ever comes a moment "there is no place open right now but our group feels like partying on", Echo is a place where you can take your party group to continue. Entrance floor has lobby bar setup with open stage for bard performers. In the basement there is a small nightclub setup with open stage for DJ performers. Venue will be looking for freelancers to work at the venue for the self host events and the events of the venue itself.

name: Club Kolat
description: If venues had a soundtrack, Kolat's would be a mix of music’s past, present, and future with cuts of different genre's all blending in perfect harmony. Explore the Kolat Nightlife, see a Kolat Show, and dive into Kolat’s diverse entertainment offerings. With music and entertainment around every corner, friends and family can enjoy the sounds that make this club your nighttime destination.

What’s your pleasure? At Kolat, you will find an intoxicating variety games and denominations, friendly dealers and a stylishly exotic – yet always comfortable – atmosphere that will enhance every experience. Fast, hostess service makes it easier to concentrate on your next move. New to gambling? There’s no reason to be intimidated by the action… our gambits are happy to show you how each game works and soon, you’ll be playing like a pro.

Kolat gives way to many quality entertainers in a relaxing and exotic atmosphere that you could almost call home. The Aether LB locale packs the house with the steamiest entertainers in the land. In house is a VIP area, with a view of the large main stage. And let's not forget that the VIP packages offer quality entertainer discounts.

name: The Odder Path
description: The Odder path is a free venue meant to feel like a mid range price restaurant, not apple bees quality, but not fine dining either. Like a place people would have a nice birthday dinner in because it's better than apple bees but it's not so expensive that it would break their bank. Services at the moment include dining in the lower floor, and a small bar near the entrance of the plot, but eventually once I get more funds I eventually plan on getting a bard to play music.

name: The Loveless Bar
description: "Infinite in mystery is the gift of the Goddess. We seek it thus, and take to the sky. Ripples form on the water's surface. The wandering soul knows no rest."
- Loveless ACT II

The Loveless Bar is open on every Tuesday and Thursday 8pm-12pm EST! Enjoying fellow patrons and friendly employees, head downstairs for some unique drinks and dancing with our live music, join our gamble table to test your luck or have fun! Test your luck with our unique trivia night event and win some great prizes starting from 50k gil or join our raffles for great items!

name: Celestial Body
description: Find your home among the stars at Celestial Body, an 18+, LGBTQIA+ friendly nightclub catering to both SFW and NSFW roleplay. Our venue offers a variety of services - courtesans, tarot readings, photography, and gambling, to name a few - but what we truly pride ourselves on is our welcoming, lively atmosphere. Veterans and newcomers alike can find something special under our stars' glittering expanse!

name: The Laundry
description: Eorzea's only Laundromat and bar. It's that weird place where you can wash your trousers, drink poison, nap in a cuddle cage, and bathe with other patrons. Play out the strangest of scenarios and discover the supernatural oddities Laundry hides, or just come and watch the chaos unfold. Sometimes we host secret tub parties where all sorts of things can happen in the late hours of the night!
Clothing is optional ♥

name: ChocoKisses
description: ♡ ♥️ Maid Cafe ♥️ ♡ offering custom polaroid shots with your personal maid's signature on them, lovely performances from or adorable maids, yummy, high-quality foodies to share, and amazing songs from our bard-san.

name: Carina's Heart
description: With a focus on the arts, Carina's Heart is a lounge that serves food and drinks with an emphasis on live music. Every Friday night we will either have the house band or guest performers put on a great show! Come for the drinks and stay for the music!

name: Club Vamp
description: Eorzea's spoopiest LGBTQ+ NSFW dance club. Offering raffles, fully stocked bar, frighteningly fun staff, supernatural RP and a crazy fun dance party with a blood pumping greatest hits playlist curated by DJ Jay Sylverhart.

name: The Burgundy Room
description: The Burgundy Room is a multifaceted performance troupe and venue operating within Final Fantasy XIV. We produce and perform a mix of drag, dance, and theatre.

Since it’s establishment in 2018, The Burgundy Room strives to push the limits of what is possible in the art form of complex in-game performances with synchronized audio. Our troupe members LOVE what they do, and spend hours upon hours honing their craft!
We open on the last Saturday of each month at 7:30pm Eastern.

name: Violet Eclipse
description: Dance listening to some hot tunes from our own DJ Lunabrea, indulge in one of our dancers or courts for some sfw or some nsfw fun. We have a fully stocked bar with signature drinks from our skilled bartenders! We even have an on-staff photographer for your SFW (and not so safe!!!!)

name: Petrichor Coffee-Bar
description: Petrichor Coffee-Bar is an all-inclusive and relaxing space for those looking for a wonderful time. It has a wonderful café aesthetic, and friendly staff that is available for all sorts of chat and aid. Our aim is to provide a pocket of tranquility to all Eorzeans.

name: Rave Rewind
description: Rave Rewind offers an upscale clubbing, and partying experience with live DJs, a busy bar that is always stocked, experienced courtesans for all tastes. We are LGBTQ+ friendly.

name: Itadakimasu Sushi Bar and Bath House
description: *Ohayo~! Welcome to Itadakimasu Sushi Bar and Bath House. Where the asthetic is beach, the music is ambience, and the hostess is southern. It may be weird but the baths are hot, foods pretty decent, and the vibes are good.*

name: The Willow Circle
description: <:paganstar:944589289528889424> We are a witchy and astrology themed adult nightclub and community, with resources for those interested in the craft itself. We have a unique and fun experience awaiting you that you can't find anywhere else! Come join the witches of the coven and get in touch with your wicked side!

name: Seventh Gate
description: Heckin great times to be had. EDM and Metal nights, Gambling, A Fully Stocked Bar, Beautiful Dancers, Live DJs!

name: Lilting Lilium
description: We are a bar and lounge, allowing connections to various vendors in Eorzea supplying various services. Please come by for a drink and to mingle. Should you have any needs, please see our vendor list for possible fulfillment or reach out to the Madame for recommendations. Services: Bar, Duty Roulette, Tarot Readings, Photography, Housing Decoration, Crafting, Gathering, SFW RP and NSFW RP services, Wedding Reception, Arena, Bards for Hire, Artists for Commission.

name: Eben's Toys & Cafe
description: Welcome to Eben's Toys & Cafe!
Like stuffed toys?
Like cafe's?
How about both in one place!
Come on over and hang out with eben!
Hope to see you there ♡

name: Kawaii Weeb Cafe
description: The Kawaii Weeb Cafe is a place to be kawaii. Only kawaii people are permitted to enter the kawaii space. We promise you will snack on kawaii foods, slurp up kawaii drinks, and enjoy kawaii music during your stay. All our staff are super kawaii, if they're not, you will be given all your kawaii money back. We hope you come and be kawaii with us. KAWAII.
Also we have a 2-way petting zoo.

name: Fairylight cafe
description: Welcome to Fairylight! Please feel free to enjoy our cafe where we offer sweet treats and teas from various regions. if your looking for a spot to sit down with a good book or just pass the time, our library is open to all!

name: The Fury's Hallow
description: Open the first and third Friday of every month! ◈ The Fury's Hallow is a heavy, immersive roleplay venue focused on roll-based combat. Established in November 2022, the venue is set in a lore-abiding environment within the High House districts of Ishgard, framed as a repurposed manor where the basement has been transformed into a duel tavern and respite for weary adventurers who seek to test each other in combat. Whether you wish to step into the arena to challenge an opponent, enjoy a selection of Coerthan fare and drink, or explore the rooms of House Luvese, we look forward to crossing paths within these hallowed walls.

name: The Lazy Diamond
description: Hello! Welcome to the Lazy Diamond, a cozy, moody retreat to refresh and relax after a long day of raiding and adventuring!

name: The Hallowed Grounds Cafe
description: The Hallowed Grounds Cafe; faeries evening community hang out where peopole can get away from the hustle and bustle of the every day, with a focus on coziness and relaxtion.  Featuring jump puzzles, an open stage and seasonal events, it's a perfect evening curl up spot. ♥

name: The Opus
description: A speakeasy jazz bar

Come join us upstairs for a classier experience with fine drinking and a bard on stage or join us down below and enjoy some harder drinks open dance floor with dj and our dancers! Or perhaps hang around the main floor surrounded by our lovely collection of novels, simple refreshing drinks.

name: Moonveil
description: A bar and bath house to relax and soak away your troubles in a worry free environment.

name: Club 175
description: Club 175 is Eorzea's premier late-night drum and bass nightclub. Owned by DnB party girl DJ Sef Cat, this cozy hideaway offers an open bar (free of charge), ample seating, and plenty of room to dance.

name: Jenova's Witness
description: Jenova's Witness - An immersive, |SFW| Speakeasy located in The Mists offering a safe environment to discuss businesses of all sorts where ears do not pry and is run by the local Mafia. Drinks, Food, Chatter and multiple facilities offer an immersive experience under this very legitimate estate!

name: Desert Rain
description: (18+RP) A Thavnairian-themed Hookah Lounge, where you can come relax and unwind while enjoying authentic drinks, cuisine, and shisha flavors! Enjoy our fully-stocked bar, gorgeous dancers, lovely courtesans, and our themed photobooths! Come adorn your Inner Senses at Desert Rain!

name: Cosmos
description: We are Cosmos, a partyclub on the Balmung server, dedicated to having fun.

Our doors open every Wednesday night from 9PM-12AM EDT with a live DJ, bartender, dancing and more! Join us for a great time to hype, relax, vibe and chill. We can't wait to meet you, so stop on by and LET'S GOOOO!

name: Scandal
description: https://scandalaether.com/
18+ only
Gambling - Courts - Bar - Live Djs
GIVEAWAYS
8 Hours of Sin To Have Your Very Own Scandal With

name: Oin's Oddities
description: Local bodega, leather shop, comission and RP hub

name: Mogs & Meade
description: Once Upon Time....there was a call out to Adventurers young and old, of all sizes and rank. They came, they saw and now Mogs & Meade is a venue to be in the Lavender Beds! Taking up residence on plot 1, ward 28 in Brynhildr on Crystal, this venue is always learning and growing. Reaching out to make new connections and friendships. After all, once you step through those doors, you're family.

name: Hypnotiq
description: Hypnotiq is the latest venue from Zero Management. We are a high class club providing services likes bar games, casino, dancers, photography. Come check us out!

name: Moonlight Melodies
description: Moonlight Melodies is a nightclub that opens every Friday at 1800ST. Our DJ's mostly play Metal, Metalcore and Screamo.

name: Blue Poring Casino and Bar
description: The Blue Poring Casino offers interactive games of chance using in-game skills and housing sets. RP-friendly, open weekly on Saturdays with live bard ensemble music.

name: The Chambers Of Desires
description: The Chambers of Desires are a private studio, catering to the tastes of those who are interested in kink and BDSM. The in-house dom/mes are carefully selected to ensure that whatever our clients request is fulfilled to the best of their abilities with safe play in mind.

name: Kittenz
description: Welcome to Kittenz Striple Club, den of all things lovely~!
Strip club and card den with a relaxed and fun atmosphere, only the highest quality of courtesans, home of Striple Triad, gambling, and live bard performances every night.
- Monthly Striple Showdowns for large gil prizes!
- Giveaways every 30 mins on Sunday nights!
- Frequent fun events!
- Worthwhile VIP/Royalty packages!
- Naked bartender!
Always in for a good time when the sun goes down and the kittens come out to play!

name: The Lapis Lounge
description: Small RP cafe/lounge with a very relaxed vibe!

name: Dreaming Dodo Maid Cafe
description: The Dreaming Dodo is a SFW, RP friendly maid cafe with a laid back atmosphere. We have a number of maids and butlers, a variety of services, and live music to offer you a relaxing evening.

name: Eternal Euphoria
description: The moon is high in the sky, shafts of moonlight peak through the canopy. Off in the distance the children of the forest play, they laugh they sing the dance the night away. Further and further you walk thine vison clouds as a dense fog hides all. You barely make out an arch of tree roots, seeking shelter you hide in their embrace only to find....Euphoria. A place where the Fae rule all the drinks never end and the Euphoria is Eternal

name: REALM
description: Music. Games. Community. This is what REALM represents. We are located in the heart of Crystal @ Malboro - Shiro - W9 - P16. We offer a luxury environment, unique and original games, weekly events, amazing staff, and some of Eorzeas hottest DJs.

name: The Wanderer's Reprieve
description: Adventurer's hub and pub with a fighting ring - blow off some steam with your fellow adventurers, or grab a drink and enjoy the show!

name: Foxxies’ bar & grill
description: A killer pop/rock cafe with super fun drinks that will send you flying for more! This cafe is great for afk, rping, and just a cool place to meet some new people!

name: Ryu Ye’lan
description: An Asian inspired Cocktail / AFK Lounge with a menu that changed due to the whim of the shapeshifter bartender. Bartender is available to host other events on request

name: Morpho
description: Morpho is a nightclub venue located in the lush woods of Lavender Beds. Expect to be met with high energy, talented DJs and exciting auctions each and every week!

name: The Cadence
description: Welcome to the Cadence: where you can let the sound of the evening wash away your day. We gladly open our door to the drunkards, misfits, rejects, and the broken alike.
Tonight we're all just here to eschew the weight upon our shoulders, if only for as long as the night can be drawn out.
So sit down. Grab a drink. Have a bite to eat. Make some comrades.

name: Cats Meownge
description: For those looking to have fun, gamble, dance, or more.
A modern atmosphere & killer dance floor, we provide an exclusive and unique experience for all Eorzeans looking to spend the night with us.
From the hype of the DJs to our Bottle Service we're sure to provide an experience for any and all who wish to purrr their night away.

name: The Free Rose Tavern
description: Amidst the cold of Ishgard you stumble across a cozy tavern. The scent of roses and hearty meals travels through the air, beckoning you into the warm comforts beholden to The Free Rose Tavern. The Free Rose is a SFW RP and chatting venue. Casual RPers, hardcore, and even people just looking to hang out in a pleasant atmosphere are all welcome. We offer meals, songs, tarot, and more. We would be honored to have you visit us!

name: Fire Phoenix Nightclubs
description: Fire Phoenix Nightclubs is a club with two locations and different offers and stands for varied theme nights, live DJs on site, as well as dancer services and lots of entertainment. Since the venues are newly built and adapted for each event, it's an adventure every time. Here everyone will find what inspires him. Whether it's a cozy get-together with friends, swinging your hips on the dance floor, relaxing in the pool or sampling ice-cold and excellent drinks at the bar. Everything is possible! You want to see for yourself? Then come by!
Dawn of the Phoenix - Light - Shiva - Goblet - Ward 2 Plot 5
Passion of the Phoenix Light - Raiden - Lavender Beds - Ward 8 Plot 28

name: The Plume: Luxury Kitbar & Spa
description: We are an immersive RP venue that welcomes its loungers to enjoy the upscale commodoties of Ul'dah with soothing baths, an exceptional sauna, relaxing music, and Oasis cuisine!
This venue is clothing optional, but nothing sexually intimate is allowed (no ERP); and above all else, absolutely no shoes in the bath space!

name: The Tender Tonberry
description: The Tender Tonberry is a SFW Venue/Lounge dedicated to bringing our patrons an authentic and relaxing roleplay experience.
Casino? Bar? Restaurant? Dance Floor? Stage? We have all the things of a venue but with a twist.
Come find out our dark secrets. Witness what lurks beneath the floorboards.
Pray to the Great Tonberry in the Sky. Accept him into your heart and you shall be blessed. Bask in his glory.

name: The Underbelly
description: Have you ever wanted a place where you and your friends of dubious employment could kick back and be served a nice, hearty meal or a cold, frothy drink by a gruff Roegadyn tavern wench while staring at kitschy pirate crap on the walls? What if told you your dreams could be reality? The Underbelly is an illegal pirate tavern, housed underneath a totally legal bounty office. Check the Discord for this week's open times. Come hungry, thirsty, and if you've got a bone to pick and don't want your hands dirty, ask about posting a bounty!

name: The Eagle
description: [18+] Inspired by the real-life leather bar in NYC, The Eagle is open for fun and pleasure in our very own Eorzea! Enjoy our industrial setting complete with dancers, courtesans, and a fully-stocked bar. Dance the night away with our DJ RoboticDreamer, and when you're done dancing, you can cool off in our public showers. Choose your flag color in our discord server, join our Mare sync-shell, post screenshots of the night, and enjoy a truly authentic night of debauchery with us!

name: La Veela
description: Tucked away on a scenic corner of the Goblet, La Veela lays in wait for you to come greet her! Enjoy a drink at the bar with our charismatic and loveable staff, gamble to your hearts content at the Blackjack table, dance until your feet go numb alongside our bard and dancers, maybe even find your destiny in the cards with our esteemed tarot reader! There is something for everyone here at La Veela and we can't wait to meet you.

name: The Red Lantern Bordello
description: Founded in 2017, the Red Lantern Bordello prides itself on welcoming staff of both the sensual and service variety that will help make your evening - or any time you need us - one to remember fondly! Join us every other Friday for our playful take on the cafe theme with our lingerie cafe 'Coffee & Tease,' and indulge in quality company while enjoying tasty treats on a menu that updates with the seasons. Not one for the cafe? Join our Discord for a more complete view of our event calendar, including pop-up events or special twists on old favorites!Tired of feeling like the only thing that matters is the Gil you're willing to part with? No need, here! Our VIP program is earned through attendance and support, and our companion services are a flat rate per scene and can be arranged on your own time. Immerse yourself in an adult theme without feeling the weight of expectation, and get to know a variety of characters with their own stories to share, be they employees or guests!Welcome to the Red Lantern - where character development is our kink!

name: Black Amethyst
description: We are an 18+ night club that does everything we can to make your experience here as amazing as possible. Open every other Sunday and every other Wednesday. We have giveaways through out the night. We like to let loose have fun and relax.
Whether you're looking for a night of partying on the dance floor, or for an evening of relaxing while you listen, drink, and vibe, you will find what you're looking for ♥

name: Absolute Zero
description: [RP][18+] Welcome to Absolute Zero, where the drinks are cold and the girls are hot! Come by for dancing, drinks at the bar, giveaways, and of course, the snow on the floor.

name: Bubble Club
description: Bubble Club is an all-in-one adult playground offering live music, drinks, treats, gambling, dancing, and more!

name: The Sleepy Tonberry
description: The Sleepy Tonberry bed and breakfast is a venue that is designed for comfort. This little venue is owned by a Raen and Xaela wishing to share the warmth of their family home and hearth to the weary traveler, with breakfasts, lunch and dinners to be served every plate is created and served with a smile. Rent one of our themed rooms to give your character that lovely vacation they so much deserve. Need something more swift, we also have a small little communal spa room that is free of use for everyone. With a lovely staff of various people ( from students to barbarians ) our main goal is to provide a calm and happy relaxing time!

name: MEEPS
description: ♥ We're naughty and we're nice, and if you'd like a slice, come visit us at MEEPS - an RP Nightclub with much to offer for everyone. From our signature service auctions and game nights, to dance parties, and a host of other services and amenities; all hosted by our very experienced staff. We always aim to provide you with the best experience for you and your companions every single week! It's a place for fun! It's a place for relaxation! It's a place to make memories with healthy doses of spice in between. ♥

name: Lunatics
description: Lunatics is here to make sure you can let your hair down and PARTY HARD!!!

We have everything from Amazing DJ's, who bring you their efforts and mixes to make sure your night is as enjoyable as possible. Gamble Table where you can test your luck and maybe go home with millions. Bar Service that you will never forget with Special Drinks and chat with our Barkeeps. Enjoy watching our Dancers Beautiful Performances, that will leave you mesmerized & Photographers that will help you remember your night.

name: Wanderlust
description: Welcome to the Wanderlust tavern.

Exhausted from your adventure, tired from work, or you just want to escape from your duties?Then you have found the perfect place to let all worries rest for a moment. Come in, make yourself comfortable and let us serve you a drink and have some nice small talk.

name: The Cloaked Cork
description: Sirens best kept secret has opened its door to anyone but law enforcement! **The Cloaked Cork** is a speakeasy tavern nestled into the lush village of Lavender Beds. We welcome all bards and bands, all visitors and residents! Find a seat, bust a move, or pop some fireworks off! We are here for the love of music and friends! We host a 50/50 raffle every Saturday and have giveaways as well! Everyone is a winner at the cork!!

name: Dragonsong Cinema
description: Dragonsong Cinema is a complimentary movie theatre located inside The Forum Shopping Center. We're a RP friendly, SFW environment. Movies range from G to R, so viewer discretion is advised. Twitch Prime is required for attendance.

name: Harvestbell Lesbian Lounge
description: Harvestbell Lesbian Lounge is a sex-positive, NSFW lesbian bar and bathhouse for immersive and erotic RP.

This establishment is for feminine characters to engage with other feminine characters. If you would like to have a masculine character be present to socialize but not participate, this is allowed - but be prepared for any sexual advances to be ignored or criticized. Please note that this does not apply to players, all IRL identities are welcome here. We expect and demand that writers clearly differentiate between IC and OOC, and respect the line drawn in the sand between fantasy and reality.

All characters and players must be, and appear to be, adults. This means no underage players, no underage characters, and no characters that appear to be underage - in other words, no Lalafells or other models shrunk to similar proportions.

This establishment is meant to celebrate sex. As such, we encourage all sexual activity that takes place within the estate in-game be written in public chat channels (/say and /em). Please note that the immediate exterior of the estate is not an acceptable place to write publicly-visible sex.
Also, please note that we do not currently have an in-game estate, but are working to acquire one!

name: The Warden's Garden
description: Flowers are the jewels of the world, reminders that the journey is worth it. Florists at the Warden's Garden defend those ideals while providing a safe for work space for adventurers and peace seekers across the star. Stop by, pick up some flowers, and find peace under the Warden's sun-kissed rose shield. For here, you are loved and of that, you can be certain.

name: GLOW
description: Welcome to GLOW!

A place to belong and recharge. Achieving a better state of mind through music and entertainment. Worry has no place here so treat yourself to one of our many delights. Relax with a tasty cocktail at the bar along with a tasty bite to eat. Discover what the future has in store for you with a reading from one of our fortune tellers then temp fate and put your luck to the test with our gamba games.

name: Silver Retreat
description: Silver Trigger is a café and a venue all in one. We are a small community of people who would like to show off our bard music, dancers to go with the bard music, comedy, fashion and glam contests, with an announcer to show us off. The idea is to have a "American's Got Talent" feel for performers and venue-chasers to feel welcome and excited to see what we come up with next.
Our energy is well meet, calming, welcoming, enjoying, exciting, and above all happy.
The experiences have been great according to my housing book.
Guests should expect to feel welcome and excited to be with us, they can expect to have a beautiful performance in front of them while eating.

name: Cirque
description: A new show every month! EVERY MONTH we play host to a server-wide roleplay event open to the public community of Mateus and beyond. For years now Cirque has put on live stage plays that marvel and amaze with our dedicated troupe of actors. From original tales like the Untold Origins of the Scions, to fan favorites like Frozen, Cirque is a one of a kind theatrical experience you'll not want to miss out on!

name: CRYSTAL CAVE
description: In the blue glow of the crystal, this club regularly hosts party nights. Every two weeks the staff welcomes its guests with hard guitar riffs and a selection of the best rock & metal songs. And between these weeks, the Cave offers a home to different genres: whether pop, Asian or retro - everyone finds a home here! So do it like the crystals do: sparkle and shine through the darkest nights!

name: Starlight Bar
description: This gothic rock Bar situated in The sunny Mist is Our original venue, Complete with  pools and a few private rooms, upstairs dance hall and plenty space to socialize or let loose we cant wait for you to see the place!

name: Tipsy Whispers
description: Hidden behind the books of an unassuming little library lies Tipsy Whispers. Take a peek behind the trick bookcase and find a verdant oasis for you to enjoy. Whether you're looking for a coffee to pair with a good book, a relaxing spot for a date, or some drinks to enjoy with your friends, this little coffee and cocktail lounge is waiting for you.

Tipsy Whispers is a SFW RP venue offering a variety of sweet and savory foods, coffees, teas, cocktails, wines, and beers for our guests. We have an open stage for bards and offer performers a free drink for their talents. Guests are invited to enjoy all areas and amenities inside and outside of the venue. Interested in renting the venue out for a private event or photoshoot? We'd be happy to host you! Whisper owner Liokki Black in-game to schedule.

name: Tilted Casino Club
description: Come get lucky at Tilted Casino Club!!! We have a variety of games with our friendly staff including blackjack, deathrolls, Russian Roulette, Hi/Low, and more!!! We have music, drinks, and a fun vibe. So come get lucky, dance the night away, or both!!

name: Eden's Garden
description: One of Crystal's OG Nightclubs,
Stop by for RP, Real Tarot Readings, Bar & Drink Games, Dancers, Giveaways, RP Fights and Casino!

name: The Seadragon's Cup bar
description: >>>NOTE! The venue will open on thursday too on the 6th of April!<<<
The Sea dragon's Cup is a bed, bar & breakfast establishment that is located in Shirogane who prides themselves in a cozy bar, a beautiful lounge and offer rooms for guests to stay over.
Either come downstairs to the bar where fine drinks and fine food are served or perhaps just relax upstairs in the lounge and for those staying the night can also enjoy a fine breakfast there.
In the middle floor is the counter, where you can inquire about staying overnight for a night or two.

So welcome in to have local hingan food or perhaps some western food that reminds a lot of the grand sea. Same is with the fine drinks and let our bartenders awe you both with selection of hingan spirits and awestriking western drinks.

name: Photon
description: Photon is a hyper modernist inspired designed dance club.  We bring a sleek aesthetic to the club scene with services for dancers, a full service bar, and 2 djs playing per opening night.  Huge giveaways are a stable of opening nights as well as a nice chill atmosphere.  The staff are all friends, and aim to simply create a nice place for people to meet and mingle. We open every other Thursday from 10-1 EST

name: O7Nights Bar & Dance
description: O7Nights Bar & Dance is a roleplay club, with a bar setting within the MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV. It is owned by player Juzo Mohjahro of the Aether Datacenter and Midgardsormr Server. It stands as one of the many venues which players can socialize and find a nightlife without leaving home. This venue prioritizes on spreading a contagiously positive atmosphere, 'Being o7,' by accepting and educating new but brave role-players, while indulging veterans with authentic and thoughtful interactions. While upfront providing a relaxed bar setting, this venue has many moments that escalate the energy, between octet bard performances by Raevyn Koneko, regular appearances from wildly outgoing bar regulars and Juzo making drinks just right from his Specialty Menu. On nights where players both want to rest their feet, or get them moving, Juzo and his patrons are there, Making Midgardsormr a little More o7.

Anecdote left by Karilan Black of Crossroads Conversations of Gilgamesh: "SFW Not your average nightclub; Juzo takes connections and party life to a wholesome level with thrills and chills, depending on what drinks are being mixed upstairs. Fit for literally any level of RP, o7 Nights welcomes you the way adventurers welcome each other at the start of any encounter, and you are sure to find company here who will guide you through every step to learn how to RP effectively and comfortably. Share a drink with a new friend, or dance the night away downstairs. Either way, you'll leave with good vibes."

name: The Oaken Tavern
description: Tired of a long day of adventuring? Looking to sit back, relax, and enjoy some great food and better company? Come visit the Oaken Tavern, a sfw venue and open social space to make new friends and find like minded Warriors of Light to play with. Open and welcoming to players of all backgrounds, we ask that you try to extend that same courtesy to our other guests.

We're glad to have you, our tavern boasts a fully stocked bar, an open Stage for performing bards, and a cozy interior to help melt the weariness away. For More information, please visit our discord server and check out our website!

name: Buns in the Oven Café
description: Come join us for hot drinks, sweet treats, great music and most importantly relaxation! Buns in the Oven Café is a proudly located on the edge of the Goblet, made from the remains of a rundown factory. No gil? No problem! Just sit back and enjoy, having you visit is all the payment we need.

name: Club Milk
description: Club Milk is an LGBT friendly spot situated on Chaos Omega, Empyreum.
With doors opening every other saturday, our ~~cult~~ club welcomes all, and the milk maids are ready to bring you your dairy delights.
Come get your calcium

name: The Moirai
description: The Moirai is an SFW RP nightclub with a great music from live DJs, a fully stocked bar, tarot readings, and friendly dancers. The entire staff is dedicated to ensuring everyone has the best night possible!

name: Way of LIFE Coffee Shop
description: Great place to start or end your day of adventure!

A relaxed spot to visit with friends, plan strategies, listen to or play some music. Need to AFK? Find a comfy spot in our extensive, quiet library on the second floor. Our welcoming staff is always there with a smile as they hand you a cup of joy.
Stop in and...
Experience the Way of LIFE!

name: The Eggstate Eatery
description: The only café that actually serves food! Looking for a place to take cute pictures with your food? Look no further!

name: Silver Lining Cafe
description: Cozy cafe that is friendly to folks who wish to relax. Come and have fun with some RP or just as you are we welcome all!

name: The Hollow Tree Cafe
description: Hollow Tree Cafe is a casual SFW forest-themed cafe where travelers can take a load off, buy themselves a meal, and meet new people! We have an open stage for any traveling bards that would like to play for our customers. We also provide a library on the top floor if you'd like to have a nice reading while sipping your cup of tea/coffee.

name: The Black Dahlia
description: Welcome to the Black Dahlia one and all!

Come and enjoy the sights and sounds of Faerie’s premiere dark garden. We are an upscale gothic style club offering a mix of traditional gothic ambiance and modern atmosphere catered to delight gothic hearts and upbeat club hoppers alike.
We offer a wide array of amenities and services to ensure that a night spent with us is one that you’ll not likely forget.
Our Amenities:
-A full-service bar staffed by charismatic mixologists who serve up our carefully curated drinks and delicious meals.
-A large stage and dance floor to enjoy our elegant dancers and live music from talented Bards and DJ’s alike.
-An exclusive VIP section where drinks, dances and other services come directly to you.
-Specialized rooms for participating in high stakes games of chance and fortune as well as a comfortable lounge to enjoy the delights of intimate dances with our exquisitely graceful entertainers.
-Private rooms to enjoy the services of our highly skilled companions to fulfill your deepest desires.
Our Services:
-Immersive Role Play
-In Game Photography
-Adventurer (Dungeon) Services

name: Fat Cat's Fresh Leaves
description: We are Shirogane's first cat-owned café serving beverages from around the world! Our kind owner bids all welcome to come in and enjoy our relaxing environment and delicious menu items.

name: Purple Suit Casino and Lounge
description: The Purple Suit Casino and Lounge is a brand new entertainment venue opening to all on the Aether Data Center. We do our best to strive and offer a welcoming venue with fantastic services, all to create an open atmosphere to all friends and strangers, to gather and enjoy some drinks, play some games, win some gil, and most importantly—have plenty of fun.

name: The Raven's Nest Bar & Nightclub
description: Though we are known for our Champion of Hydaelyn Tournaments, we have decided to also open our bar to the public!
Enjoy a day away from the grind with music and dancing as well as our fine menu. Keep in mind this is a 21+, roleplay venue!
Please keep battles to our events and please drink responsibly. Do not drink and ride.

name: Limbo
description: Welcome to Limbo, where who you are is up to you.

Limbo is just that - a bar in a state of uncertainty, where your character is whomever you decide they are when you walk in the door. Want to explore a new personality type? Go for it. Want to play with an all new backstory? Absolutely.
Nothing sticks, nothing stays. Freedom and exploration is completely up to you.

name: D3gen's
description: Good vibes only!

name: Cutesy Listic Cafe
description: Do you like cute cafes filled with stuffys, cuddle spots and free snackies? Cutesy Listic Cafe is a sfw place that is fairly new. I open before Maintenance times as well for those who need a place to go :3

name: Spicy Lanterns
description: We are a new Othardian theme fusion restaurant offering our guests the most immersive dining experience as well as the best tasting dishes around! Each dish comes with its own unique tabletop item for that extra immersiveness, and food role play is strongly encouraged here!
We also house an open stage so we welcome all bards to play their tunes for us~

name: Joker's Child
description: Joker's Child is an 18+ casual and light RP venue offering a cozy space for people to come together to listen to an 8-man bard band, chat amongst guests and a growing bar menu. We've recently added a gambling game "Arcana Hearts" and can't wait to bring it to the community! Events and new ideas are always being worked on as Joker's Child grows into a place people remember!

name: Pentacle Night Club
description: Your Destination for Gothic Vampire Industrial vibe all night!  Dancers, Gamba, Auctions, and more

name: Menphina's Grace
description: Within a small little cottage in the highlands of Ishgard lays a den of sultry ecstasy! Come to Mephina's Grace and find the embrace of a warm atmosphere, smiles, and a showcase bar to satiate even the most luxurious of palate. In the basement we have a sultry industrial vibe sure to please. We allow people to express themselves with whatever glams (Or lack thereof) and forms of expression they choose as long as it's safe to those around them. Please keep any NSFW chatter to yourselves and out of public chats, but come, and feel the warmth of Menphina's embrace, only at Menphina's Grace!

name: Lawless Lane
description: Welcome to Lawless Lane, an immersive criminal & back-alley RP venue where villains spend the weekend and justice has no place. This alley courtyard is home to several less-than-reputable businesses ranging from a dive bar, to a drug den across the lane, to even a no-holds-barred fighting arena underground. Criminals and lowlifes of all variety are welcome into the haven of Lawless Lane be it to just relax without the law breathing down your neck or to do business. Just be careful who you speak with, you never know who will put a knife in your back.

name: The Wicked Wolf
description: The Wicked Wolf is a Tavern Located in Empyreum that offers Live Bards with an open stage to all, good food and drinks and a Lively staff. come on by and join us and relax! Rp and LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: Dan's BBQ Shop
description: Welcome to our for-gil locale inspired by Memphis BBQ restaurants and dive bars like The BBQ Shoppe, The Mothlight, Payne's BBQ and concert venues like The Hi-Tone.

Dan's BBQ Shop aims to provide a more low-key atmosphere and southern home cooking to patrons, featuring dishes heavily inspired by dives and diners in the Memphis area, and we hope you'll enjoy the chance to try something out of the ordinary.

name: Serenity
description: Serenity is a vacation-style rental cottage available for wedding nights, romantic rendezvous, and themed photoshoots. A cottage designed with luxury and whimsy in mind, Serenity is the perfect place to spend the evening, or even the weekend, indulging in your Thavnairian dreams.

name: The Frog Pond
description: Established after the Seventh Umbral Calamity, The Frog Pond has since become a place for adventurers to come from far and wide to tell their tales or to simply hear one. From grandiose tales of adventure and daring, to various whispers and rumors, these walls have heard them all. Make yourself at home, grab a drink, and spin a yarn or two! We're happy to have you! Ribbit!

name: Ouran Host Club
description: The pinacle of upper-class host clubs, we treat every client with the upmost respect deserving of a king, and we have a variety of hosts to meet client exceptions! We have a bar with wine, snacks, and non-alcholic sparkling beverages.

name: The HiveMind
description: Welcome to The HiveMind! A nightclub where you are all "One of Us"! Come enjoy the Dancers, Role Players, Bar, DJ, Black Jack, and Giveaways! Step through the void to a world of wonderful debauchery! DJ RE from 10:30-12:30/DJ Ryaru from 12:30-2:30am est! Live mixing every Saturday Night!!!

name: EDGE
description: [Open the Second and Fourth Saturday of every month!] ▵ Sometimes, you're only able to find where the edge is if you risk going over it.

You've heard talk of a premiere nightclub garnering widespread acclaim from audiences within the ice-covered streets of Empyreum, but amongst the praise of their curated music, luxury decor, premium drink menu, and stellar special events have been rumors: murmurings of Voidal sightings, of dark magicks at play, of chaos following in the hours after closing.

With the venue's recent relocation to the tropical beachside setting of the Mist, surely, all of that has been left behind... but the only way to find out for yourself is to take your night to the 𝔼𝔻𝔾𝔼.

name: Carbuncle's Favor Confectionery
description: [3rd Thursdays of the month, 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. Eastern]

"Sweets to eat and treat."—Drop by Carbuncle's Favor Confectionery for cakes, 'shakes, and potables of a different make. Whether you're looking for a treat to enjoy, something more seasonal, or perusing the apothecary branch, there may be something for you! Delivery, catering, and custom order options available. Gil's IC only, but donations are accepted.

name: Broceliande
description: Broceliande is a quiet, immersive RP venue with a blend of Hingan and Gridanian aesthetics and a large menu. We encourage in-character conversation as much as possible. Most visitors come to unwind and have a little light character writing. The intent is to provide a relaxing environment for adult players to interact with other adults, and to facilitate the formation of connections with other immersive RPers so that they can form their own bonds and playgroups.

name: The Purple Flower
description: Come join us for faery magical hospitality in a mystical forest café this evening!Casual RPers and Beginners welcome!

name: Tamasha
description: Tamasha is a heavy RP Thavnairian themed venue. We strive to bring the mystery and culture of Hannish life to Eorzea. We want to engage guests in a relaxed setting full of unique personalities who wish to strip away the day and mesmerize them however they see fit. Tamasha is an 18+ venue offering erp services on site. The story behind the venue allows for criminal undertones with spaces available for such if requested.

name: Frosthaven Tavern
description: In the Middle of La Noscea, one can find a small frozen tavern. Covered in ice and snow, it is a cozy winter hideaway, where some of the coldest drinks in all of Eorzea can be found. Hangout with your friends while enjoying music, rare drinks and food. Come by and check us out !

name: Amaterasu
description: Amaterasu has best selection of live DJ's to dance the night away with. Giveaways, if you're feeling lucky! Entrancing dancers and energetic entertainment! A a full bar for you to chill at and buy that cutie you have your eye on a drink. If you are feeling fancy, we have the VIP experience too, see our website for details.

name: Momma Luca's
description: A LGBTQIA+ friendly café in the cold winter of the Empyreum, our focus is warming you up, body and soul, with warm drinks, sweet desserts, and friendly service. Allow us to become your family away from family, and bring a little joy to a cold winters night. We have raffles on the first and third opening of every month, photography services, crafting services, live entertainment, and giveaways, and are always looking for guest suggestions towards greater expansion!

name: Cloak & Dagger Speakeasy
description: [ Immersive, lore-compliant, heavy RP focus, no OOC gil is expected to participate. ]

The Cloak & Dagger is a speakeasy located on the edge of the Goblet's Brimming Heart. With ties to the Ul'dahn underworld, the speakeasy has served criminal clientele under the table for years—and offered cover in the form of employment to them as well. Owned and operated by an unseen proprietor known only as Crow, esteemed guests from all walks of life are invited to kick back, relax, and speak easy with the Cloak & Dagger for a high-class and luxurious drinking experience.

name: Club Orion
description: *Get lost within the diaphanous masses of the stars as you dance the night away.*
Club Orion is the one stop within the universe to flow with the rhythm, to lose it all to the swells of music. Come join us amongst the stars!

name: Bone Zone Cafe
description: Our staff consists of the chill, fun-loving free company: Skeleton Warriors (BONES).
We pride ourselves on enjoying what the game has to offer whether it be leveling a job, raiding, crafting or simply the company of others.

name: Ricecakes Bakery
description: SFW! Welcome to Ricecakes Bakery, the one and only baked goods café on Exodus where Ricecakes and all things tasty rule! Come visit and relax in our chill café setting, open daily 11am-2pm.

name: Club Resurrection
description: Club Resurrection is a high energy, low drama club! We would love to help make your night one to remember! Come hang out with friends or find someone to have some fun with~

name: Blood Money
description: Upper crust, but underground. The Ruby Sea muddled with white stone. Blood Money is La Noscea's premier den for all those looking to get away from the bug-eyes of the Yellowjackets and their red, pavement-prowling friends. Hunkered down beneath the hollowed-out waterways of Mist, enjoy absolutely no less—and likely much more—than ten fulms of La Noscean masonry between you and the nearest lawman.
Take a left and follow the Tonberry.
[Bi-Weekly - Join discord for dates + password]

name: Descension
description: Welcome to Descension, a dark underground factory converted into an 18+ BDSM club, we offer live DJs, gamba, 18+ services +more.
tonight we're hosting THUD, a party dedicated to loud, stompy music. Get ready to move and groove to the beat, and feel the thud of your boots as they hit the floor! Come dance with us!

name: Neurolink Nightclub
description: Hyperion's premier Bahamut/Coils themed RP Venue. LGBTQ+ friendly with a welcoming staff. We provide live entertainment, and a variety of services. Stop by for some fun conversation, good music, and a fun time!

name: The Echo's Chamber
description: **The Echo's Chamber** is a special events venue for a variety of uses. We host nightclub activities, house various DJ's from across the realm, rent out the space for special events such as birthday celebrations and wedding receptions, other events include performance and theater groups and/or bards of diverse genres. Come visit us for any of our scheduled events or come during normal business hours for a night off from adventuring and maybe even find a companion to keep you company~

name: Gaterio
description: Gaterio is an 18+ plus night club environment meant to allow people to bring out their baddest selves in a positive way. We want to have fun and vibe, bringing good music and company to the scene. Currently we sport a fully stocked bar with live Djs and in the future plan to add a casino element to the night club.

name: The Brawlers' Pit
description: We are an 18+ rp fight venue, very SFW and respectful h2h combat. (no kill blows, no maiming) We don't allow erp services at the venue aswell. Very new rper friendly and chill vibes

name: The Gilded Fox
description: Gilded Fox is a small bar aiming to be a safe warm place for all. Targeted more to the LBGTQ+ community but all are welcome! Also a safe haven for misfits.

name: Entropy Maid Cafe
description: Our story is simple starting with a desire to have a comfortable and welcoming place to go to relax and enjoy a good chat, the name was decided since everything is a disorder, but here we unite the disorder to give some peace to some of our clients.
Entropy Maid Cafe offers a comfortable atmosphere with kind maids and butlers eager to help you relax! Come alone or bring a friend to chat with us!
We are a SFW establishment that strives to put your comfort and relaxation first

name: Coven
description: Coven is a Supernatural Witch based Venue! Open every Tuesday at 6PM ST until 11PM ST! Serving you the best metal and rock alternative music and great drinks and amazing company!

name: Yamaguchi Inc.
description: Welcome to Yamaguchi Inc. !!!

In here you can find many fun activities to try out, as well as our special Adventure system that provided fun and interactive Guided Tours around all of Eorzea and many Adventures and Events to try out so come journey with us!

name: Restorative Therapy
description: Healing starts here
Restorative therapy aims to help warriors of light overcome their struggles to build a better future for themselves and those around them.

name: Club Foxbury
description: Looking for a place to pregame before a night of venue crawling?  Looking to test your glamour abilities with themes voted on by patrons in our weekly glam contest?  Looking just to blow off some steam with a good drink and some dancing?  The Foxbury is your place to go as your early evening destination!

name: Club Dragonstone
description: Carved from only the strongest stones found in the deepest regions of the Dragons' homeland, Club Dragonstone is an eclectic venue designed for those with refined yet exciting tastes. Disguised as a forge, both in honor of the fieriest dragons and to avoid the ever-watching eye of the Ishgardian authorities, Dragonstone is a place for those who just want to cast off their worries and relax. It's a magical rave where the music's bumping and the drinks flow like aether.

name: Rozen Prides
description: For more than a year now we open the doors for you every second Saturday. Our hot bunnies will offer you the most colorful drinks at the bar, our dancers will make you forget the everyday life. You are looking for like-minded people and want to live the way you want to, without prejudices and restrictions? Then you are right : ❤️ ROZEN PRIDES - eorzea's most consistent LGBTQ venue ❤️ 🌈 Be proud of who you are, be a Pride.🌈

name: The Golden Otter
description: A relaxing, Otter-themed tea house, where we serve teas and treats. When our talented reader is available, we have a private room available to have your cards read. If anyone should wish to share their talents, there is a stage on the lower floor that anyone can make use of.

name: Café Leblanc
description: Persona 5 Themed Cosplay Cafe, cozy and calm experience with personal attention.

name: Sera's Cardboard Box
description: A cute cozy "cardboard box" for kitties and all to relax, study or hang out! Snacks, drinks, and an adventurer for hire await! Also... A cat tree!

name: The Degeon
description: Welcome to the Degeon, a small but cozy place residing in Hingashi. We are an open stage and AFK lounge, feel free to stop by and relax!

name: The Lockewood Tavern
description: Adventuring takes a toll, do you need a safe place to doff your heavy armor, and a cold drink? Well good news! The Lockewood Tavern will be open for drinks, supper, music, and quests to help you unwind after a long day of adventuring. Come swing by for a cold pint by the fire, relax, and enjoy some live music, and maybe go on a quest or three, for an immersive in game experience. Join our discord for RP, event nights, giveaways, and some regular updates!

name: Ceruleum
description: Dedicated to bringing you an Eorzean nightlife experience like no other, Ceruleum features exceptional design, an immersive environment, and great music every Friday night.

name: The Hangout
description: We're a bit of a jack of all trades, we run all forms of venue fun from RP Cafe, to a Twitch stream Rave to even some gambling in the fighting ring. our thing makes us stand out is we change the venue decoration based off the theme, and wont have the same theme 2 nights in a row.

name: Dracarys
description: Welcome to Dracarys 🔥 we are a nightclub with a variety of music styles. Bar, dancers and photo services. Come and party with us and let's have an amazing time together!

name: Cafe Sunset
description: A femboy maid cafe with good coffee, sweet treats, and even sweeter men!

name: Club Insanity
description: A Fun Social Night Club Environment you won't soon forget!

name: LalaXIV
description: LXIV is a venue built in mind for those who have an affinity for the luxurious. Here at LXIV, we provide the high life for the high rollers of Crystal. We offer one of, if not THE best VIP package on all of crystal. While being a hub of luxury, we provide some of the most exciting and fun giveaways around. We also have an energetic and extremely motivated staff who are excited to be there and are GREAT company to our patrons. We pride ourselves in LUXURY FOR EORZEA!

name: Bunny Montana's Hideaway
description: The baseline idea is a mod ran club we will have all kinds of music

name: The Silverheart Corner
description: A seaside bar and restaurant with high class food and quality beverages. Food service runs until 10pm ST unless reservations are made.

name: Wanderers Wayrest
description: A place for weary travelers to come at the end of their day-to-day journeys and find that oft-desired culmination of rest and relaxation. To fill their stomachs with delicious foods, to find the open and welcoming arms of the denizens within and to rejuvenate their mind, and body with a much needed massage. The Wayrest is an 18+ RP focused establishment, and we are more than happy to have you as a patron and feel privileged to have the chance to serve you.

name: Rhia Cafe
description: Aether's first lalafell-friendly venue!

name: Keys and Teas Café
description: Come join us at the Keys and Teas Café with our menu from all walks of Eorzea! Its a cozy corner tucked away in the snows of Ishgard. Not only that but our menu offers more then food. At Keys and Teas we offer a rentable dating service! Our boyfriends and girlfriends are sure to leave you with a smile and good memories on any date! Come see us and we'll have a seat for you!

name: Empyrean Apocrypha
description: A library built within an old chapel of Ishgard's Empyreum district, this establishment provides a warm place to sit, read, and enjoy a pastry or cup of tea.

name: The Otterly Amazing Cafe & Lounge
description: Welcome to the Otterly Amazing Cafe! A relaxing, chill, Odder Otter themed cafe. Come sit back and enjoy our selection of teas, coffees, pastries, and atmosphere.
Take a break from the adventuring life with us, meet new friends, and share in our love for music with our open stage!
We offer indoor and outdoor garden seating for those that wish to take their drinks and food outside to enjoy on nice days!
Fridays and Sundays 8:00 PM - 12AM EST
Primal - Leviathan - Lavender Beds - Ward 18 Plot 32

name: Thorn Tavern
description: Come on in and sit by the fire! Thorn welcomes you and invites you to a night of music, good food, fine drinks, and great friends! Our services are always free so come by and relax by one of our hearths, wander through our library, or take a seat at the bar while we take care of you. Large groups are welcome and RP is completely optional. See our carrd for more info on events and our staff!

name: Club Burzum Grotto
description: Join us in the depths of our depravity for a night that’s sure to leave you dripping.

name: Awakening Faewilds
description: A warm and welcoming Club is Awakening Faewilds! We are glad to have you here. We are a friendly group of colleagues who are delighted that you would use our amenities. Enjoy the music, art, and other events while you can!

name: The Chocobo Den
description: The Chocobo Den is a NSFW speakeasy venue located in the Brimming Heart of the Goblet, offering a more cozy and homey atmosphere than your typical nightclub venue. At the Den, every guest matters, and we have something for everyone. Stay beautiful, Eorzea, and kweh on!

name: Royal Blood
description: Royal Blood is a vampire themed cafe / nightclub with an blended east/west gothic aesthetic with a heavy role play lean.
We serve food and drinks all night at any of our bars or from our hosts all night.

After 30-60 minutes of being open, the nightclub opens, allowing our patrons the chance to mingle, dance, acquire company for the evening, or maybe get a "bite" while enjoying one of our house or guest DJs.

name: Cafe De Creme
description: Cafe bakery vide outside and inside too floor with a chic stage and bar downstairs with appropriate seating

name: The Killing Floor
description: The Killing Floor, a non-profit Goth / Metal nigthclub that is centered around the guest experience and 'having a blast' every night that they're open.

name: GUCCI
description: Boutique

name: Kokuryuu
description: An immersive Eastern-themed high-end restaurant and lounge focusing on cuisine from the Near and Far East. We offer light conversation and an elegant atmosphere to meet up with friends or make new ones as adventurers in Eorzea and beyond.

name: The Moogle Lounge
description: The Moogle Lounge is a great place where you can party till you can't no more or sit back and relax a bit. There is a bar full with a diversity of meals and drinks for you to enjoy, also there's the Nighty Night Raffle were you can win cool stuff!! Come join us to have fun, and have a break from those adventures of the day!  We are more than glad to have you here with us KUPO!

name: Golden Lantern
description: A small, relaxing sushi bar, tucked away in the Lavender Beds. RP friendly atmosphere.

name: Bust Casino Club
description: Like the thrill of chasing Lady Luck. The dimness of the lights, the thrill of each win, music to wash away the sorrows. We have the games to get you through the night and the best dealers Aether has to offer. So come take a chance and see how the cards fall

name: The Void
description: When chic and industrial meet to form one of the coolest clubs in Eorzea, here is The Void Nightclub!

name: The Veil
description: The Veil Primal’s premier alternative venue Goth | Industrial | Hardcore | Post Hardcore | Metal | Emo | Pop Punk | 80’s + 90’s

name: The Rose Petal
description: A laid back RP centered nightclub and lounge with a focus on creating a welcoming and social environment. Come and enjoy a night out at the Rose Petal!

name: Arum
description: Arum is a laid back venue which operates on the simple adage of "Less is more" for that good ole' time. Nothing else is needed besides great sounds, chilled atmosphere and a great place to enjoy them in. The venue is stylised around those old bayou vibes with a touch of Aurum Vale. The right side to that particular swamp.

name: Cherry Bomb
description: Cherry Bomb home of few Djs and the place to Vibe! In our Venue at the Goblet we present you every Wednesday and present themed based Music! Our focus is on partying and having a good time together!

name: Fenrir Bar
description: Fenrir Bar a 18+ Bar/Tavern - Norse/Viking Themed venue. A place to kick back after a long fight, or someone to drink to get warm while listening to a skald play us some tunes! Whatever the reason for your visit, do make sure to try our frozen themed drinks, and perhaps a Deadly Sin Challenge or two? Something to really make your night interesting!

name: Tsuki no Onsen
description: As the moon settles for the night, so do you - Tsuki no Onsen welcomes you into a Kugane-themed bathhouse.

name: ~ Lounge~Lavender ~
description: - Lounge-Lavender -
We are a SFW, RP, AFK friendly venue featuring:
~Calming Doman vibes~
~Great handmade food~
~A large chill area to socialize or relax in~
~A calming atmosphere perfect for RP or AFKing~
~A beautiful open stage for music~
~And a gorgeous bathhouse downstairs~
Our Hours of Operation are:
**☀️Sunday: 日曜日 9pm-midnight CST
🔥Tuesday: 火曜日 12pm--3pm CST**
Please come find us at: Adamantoise, Shirogane, Ward 29, Plot 31!
We hope to see you there, and in the discord, soon!
https://lounge-lavender.carrd.co
https://discord.gg/yj3TfxZ7x3

name: Siv’s Sake House
description: 🍶 Siv's Sake House 🍶
Siv's Sake House is a new and upcoming RP venue in the area of Shirogane, Hingashi - Ward 18 Plot 5.

I opened this RP venue with hopes of bringing people from all over Eorzea to bond over a nice glass of sake and food together while giving new people who want to try to RP can do so without being judged by others.
Whether it's your first time RPing or a seasoned veteran that wants to kick back and relax with friends over some sake then Siv's Sake House is the place for your next RP adventure!
Don't forget to sign our welcome book as well \o/

--We do accept reservations up to parties of 6 people. To place a reservation please whisper Sivgard Zvorsyn in-game or join our discord and make reservations in the reservations channel, just select the Sake House Guest role in the role picker channel.

name: Encore
description: Founded in July 2021, Encore nightclub is back again aiming to deliver an immersive nightlife event in Final Fantasy XIV. Bringing you curated line-ups every week, delve into the darkness that is Encore, and leave wanting more.

name: Mortar and Thistle Pharmacy
description: Visit for medical consultations, be it roleplay or IRL. We can help with a basic diagnosis of issues and offer treatment recommendations to help improve your quality of life.
Check Party Finder on the weekends to see if we're open or message Jack Anders @ Cactuar for appointments.

name: The Hideaway Cafe
description: So you've finally made it! Grab a drink! The show starts soon. Welcome to the Hideaway Cafe! A Corner venue meant for all venue workers to come, relax, and kick their feet up. Dueling piano Bards try to outwit each other each night, and drinks served in our Speakeasy set up are cold, and very fairly priced. So fill your cups and empty your heavy coffers after a long day's work, here at The Hideaway! Enjoy your escape.

name: Brewed Dreams
description: Welcome to Brewed Dreams! A SFW cafe where we have relaxing chill vibes where we all just want to have fun with good convo! were afk friendly, open stage and love our coffee and tea! feel free to come by anytime were open or even if were not this is always a safe and relaxing place if you need a spot to chill and get away!

name: Red Lotus Lounge
description: A refined establishment for those looking for a relaxing place to spend their evening.

Due to the nature of its staff, the lounge tends to attract individuals of various different backgrounds... perhaps even worlds. While one could be as welcoming as a fresh adventurer just getting out of their shell, another may have a much more sinister agenda, looking for a subject to host dark deeds..

name: Glitch Leather Night Club
description: We're a premier Leather Night Club that focuses on BDSM Education and Exploration. Discussion Nights are the first and third Thursday of the month (sometimes the fifth) and Play Parties are the third Saturday of the month.  Sometimes we open late night for people to use the dungeon after hitting the clubs, but our doors are always open to members.  We're also the home of DEGEN - Eorzea's Adult Magazine.

name: Carbuncle Cabaret
description: The Carbuncle Cabaret is an 18+ modern rave-like club with an emphasis on... you guessed it... carbuncles! We are a rather high energy club with EDM and TONS of giveaways!

name: The Step Cafe
description: A relaxing pastel themed café with lots comfortable seating and a lovely outdoor patio to enjoy everything this small getaway in the Lavender Beds has to offer.

name: The Glass Pumpkin
description: The Glass Pumpkin is an Aether venue looking to celebrate the XIV community. Our goals are to make new friends, have a great time and keep those serotonin levels riding high! Every month we will announce one "special" event filled with tons of fun and prizes! But we are also open regularly every Friday! We host raffles and give aways so be sure to stop by and sign up for those goodies! We cater to both RP and non-RP communities, don't be shy drop on by!

name: Club Nix
description: Club Nix offers a wide variety of entertainment from Skilled NSFW Role Play Courtesans as well as equally talented SFW Role Play Dances, DJ's to Weekly Themed Contests & Raffles - we even have some of our own IN HOUSE entertainers like:
