🕺 Performances by The Nix Troupe 🕺 Incredible Macro Dancing by a team of trained Dancers who put their all into the art of their performances; offering a wide variety of musical arrangements by Artists we all love! Be sure to tune in at https://cytu.be/r/TheNix

🎼 Live Bard Performances by Kristlyn Brianne & the Twilight Moon Quintet 🎼  Ensemble group of bards supplying you with some of the sickest tunes to bee's knee's to before the night gets wild! They play a wide range of musical styles to suit everyone's music itch! www.twilight-moon.net

name: The Heavenly Hearth
description: Welcome to The Heavenly Hearth Tavern, a quaint and exclusive Eorzean-style establishment situated in the port city of Kugane.
Enjoy the variety of flavors of our signature dishes and drinks. Have a taste of our Fireside Curry, and our specialty mixed drinks, all at affordable prices!
Rest and relax by the hearthside's warmth, and enjoy the ambience with the company of your fellow adventurers. Our doors are open to all, and we look forward to your visit!

name: Viktoria's Secret
description: Lingerie Boutique & Intimates Apparel

name: The Azure Pavilion
description: The Azure Pavilion is a laid back, light on the RP club, hosting house DJ Avaelin! We often host theme nights where attendees are encouraged to dress up, but it is never required. Your minion is always welcome and we look forward to dancing with you!

name: The Honeymilk Inn
description: NSFW Bathhouse venue. We offer drinks and meals in our lounging area and will be served by our finest Host/Hostess. Saturdays we hold a triple triad tournament. Place your bets and test your luck you could win some gil! Sundays we hold a fashion runway where the chatagory could be anything from sheek to bizzar. Will you work the runway? Come with friends, a date, or just chill with yourself. We welcome you 💕

name: The Jade Cat
description: The Jade Cat is a SFW RP café venue catering towards a calm Far Eastern atmosphere with live bards, tarot readings, tea ceremonies and more! We offer a fair variety of snacks and teas for you to taste and enjoy. Owned and operated by Miqo'te sisters, Kyali and Veronna Maru, this cozy little corner of the Mist doesn't need to fear anyone, as this café is home to several members of the underground circuit. Assassins, informants, bodyguards, and secure soundproof locations for 'business deals' all included with our Blue Moon service. All you need do is simply ask one of the servers "The best place to view the blue moon?"

name: Murasaki no Hana
description: Murasaki no Hana is an Asian styled demon café which also allows you to request a doting Oni of your choice, to accompany you for SFW/NSFW cuddles or simply company, either in the venue, or within one of our many themed private rooms.

name: Ishgard Tea & Cafe
description: Tea cafe house ☺️ with music!

name: The Rift
description: The Rift is place for travelers and adventurers to rest when they're not on their latest individual conquests.Here you will find quality food made with best ingredients, open air baths, music and friendly staff waiting to hear what your latest adventure was.

name: Eorzea Fishing Academy
description: Eorzea Fishing Academy is excited to announce that it has finally acquired a license to begin operations. This (soon-to-be) renowned institution will offer visitors the opportunity, to learn how to catch fish in some of Eorzea's greatest fishing locations, in a character-driven RP setting!
Sprouts will be provided with state-of-the-art fishing equipment for free. You don't need any special skills or knowledge to participate - just come along and enjoy yourself!
Some of the things you can expect from us are open world fishing trips, museum visits, classroom lessons, fishing tournaments and much more!
To make things even more interesting, everyone who catches at least one fish during the event enters our Fengshui Lottery! The lucky winner will receive 1.000.000 Gil at the conclusion of the event!
So what are you waiting for? Come join us at the fishing academy!

name: HellRoom
description: Dark themed venue in Primal. Online Dj's and fun. come and meet us on Hell.

name: ESCACY
description: Nestled in the heart of Shirogane, Escacy is a stunning custom 2-story upscale nightclub and bar, catering to a stylish clientele. A century old Sukiya-zukuri style house has been meticulously transformed into a timelessly classy and sophisticated entertainment venue, equipped with world class staff and services.

name: Bookaccino
description: Bookaccino is a place where people can come and enjoy having a relaxing time. A small café with old books or new ones. Enjoy a cup or tea or read a book? Is all up to you.  Whether you just come and enjoy a quiet time or try social with others is entirely up to you.

name: Eclipse Adventuring Guild
description: Welcome to Eclipse, an adventurers guild venue aimed at providing an immersive roleplay experience for adventurer characters, adventuring companies, as well as those that may hire them! DMed events run during biweekly cycle, venue opens every other Friday. Check events in the Eclipse discord to see guild opening dates!

notices.message: This venue is open every OTHER friday, please confirming opening in their discord before arriving.

name: The Snowbell Cafe
description: Cold on the outside, warm on the inside, The Snowbell is a place where all your worries go away.

Come and enjoy a kind, wholesome environment with our lovely Bells. We are a flower themed fully SFW Maid Cafe offering games with prizes, fun performances including small comedy presence, bards, a great company, even a private one if you'd wish to have someone to simply talk to alone - and a menu full of specialized, homemade goods, all prepared with love to you ! We also host tiny giveaways from time to time!

name: WARP NIGHT CLUB
description: For Information Regarding Venues or Residents:
https://corp.crd.co/

name: Club NewD
description: Dance Club • Music Hall • Bar • Casino

name: Pickle Barrel
description: Seeking a place to mellow out and just be yourself? Care to talk away with friends while knocking back a few cold ones with company? Perhaps you just want to drink your troubles away? Either way you go about it, you are more than welcome at the Barrel!

name: TARTARUS
description: TARTARUS is Aethers HOTTEST vampiric/goth night club and safe haven for the vampiric kind but.. if you are one of those mortals who always wanted to see the dark and wild side of our world, why not stop by?
We have a fully loaded bar with that of which you only will see upon entering our little realm. Need a hot night? Maybe a little love from our courts of the night, why not ask one?

Blood Raves, sacrifices? Yes... we have them. Care for some good music while you dance the night or your mortal life away? Leave it to our lord and DJ Redvayne and they will show you the rhythm of the night.
Beware the night or embrace it, the choice is yours.

name: The GATSBY
description: 18+ mansion that merges decadence with futurism. The GATSBY is the flagship nightclub of the Red Dragon Syndicate family from Jenova. A semi-nsfw establishment offering multiple chambers of entertainment and escapism alongside our cyberpunk inspired venue downstairs. Stop by KFC in chamber 14 after the nightclub closes. Jenova - Mist - Ward 28 - Plot 32 (next door to the Iceberg Lounge & across from Lost Woods Cafe)

name: Farmer's Attic
description: Farmer's Attic is a co-op where crafters, gatherers, and customers can meet for casual farmer's market RP and tax-free commerce on Sunday mornings. Each vendor is responsible for bringing their own merchandise and setting their prices — all profits go back to the vendor, with no house fees taken. Low-level crafters and gatherers are welcome and are in fact encouraged to drop by and sell their wares!

While the premise of the venue is commerce, it is a community oriented space that aims to foster camaraderie between disciples of the land and hand. So bring your best farmer's market outfit and get ready to barter at Aether's own locally sourced marketplace.

name: Nophica's Spring
description: Nophica's Spring Marketplace & Center for the Arts is home to six venues (and growing!), featuring something for everyone, from dining to entertainment, shopping, and more! Stop by Nophica's Spring Bistro for a drink, then head down to the Chobo Revue Theater and catch a show! Open every Wednesday!

name: FF14 NIGHTLIGHT MUSEUM
description: FF14 Nightlight Museum -  Relive Your Adventure! A Tribute To History And Our Dead Friends. Rest In Peace. - The Tour Starts From The Frontdoor Right. Continues On The Other Side. Upstairs We Have Some Art Highlights And A Restaurant, Downstairs A Party Location.

name: Zavina's Place
description: A smaller and more intimate club experience where you can dance the night away while throwing snowballs indoors! Throwback Thursdays every week Featuring resident DJ Zavina

name: Original Sin
description: Nestled beneath the green boughs of the Lavender Beds lies a venue that hosts a plethora of opportunities and entertainment. Aptly named, Original Sin, it is renowned for its welcoming hospitality where a patron’s desires are met beyond worldly expectations. Accentuated by it's lavish décor, inside and out, reminiscent of the Old-World style. We host such a bevy of beautiful companions, a deliciously crafted menu and a mix of specialty drinks concocted for guests to indulge in while they watch spectacular stage productions and entertainment.

name: Club Guilty Crown
description: A Cozy Nightclub with an anime themed menu looking to be a support in the community for the FFXIV playerbase!

name: The Apothecafe
description: The Apothecafe is, at first glance, what it says right on the tin: an apothecary fused with a cafe. There's plenty of bright, cozy spots to curl up in and enjoy the our offerings, but as with every light, it has its shadows. Given the nature of its owner, the cafe also serves as a safe space/neutral ground for otherworldly creatures and/or lawbreakers to conduct their business (as long as they behave, of course).

We're a roleplay venue welcoming RPers of all experience levels and styles (though we do tend to lean towards the heavier side of things) and our doors are open for RPing even when we're not staffed. So come drop by, pull up a chair, and wile away the hours with a bubbly potion, a warm meal, or perhaps even something more.

name: Beelzebabes Den
description: Hell's comfiest, yet naughty, establishment available for all to enjoy!

We provide a tonne of extra services to boost the already comfy but lively experience you'll get at Beelzebabes, including live music, dances, photography, courtesans, pillow services (SFW courtesans) and gambling!

name: The Soft Spot
description: We provide a Safe Space at the Soft Spot for people who just want to chill, vibe and dance the night away! We have a plethora of cute beverages and appetizers for those who want to refresh and reenergize your evening along with our very own Services~ But if you want a place to feel at home, we are very much the kind of place that strives to become a comfort zone for others and feel like a second home to them!

name: Haunted House Escape
description: A time limited escape adventure in the haunted house! Some secret virus experiments were executed in the basement of a sugarcoated cafe. You will have to collect clues to help you out while dealing with hidden events, unknown enemies, and jumping puzzles. The situation was getting out of control and we need you to get the anti-virus reagent out there before it's too late! Total 5 areas to explore, time is ticking, will you be the survivor or become part of "them"...?

name: Club Anathema
description: WHAT WE ARE: Club Anathema is an NSFW 18+ gothic-industrial nightclub with a "be free, be yourselves" atmosphere. We encourage breaking out of your shell and giving in to your deepest, darkest desires to the sounds of thumping industrial music.

WHAT WE OFFER: LIVE music spun by our in-house DJ. Dancers, a bar, cages to fight or do naughty things in, whatever your heart desires. All RP is encouraged to be open if you feel comfortable doing so, this means you may see some things that make you feel uncomfortable, and that is the point. Get out of your comfort zone and live a little.

WHAT WE DON'T TOLERATE: While being open and free, that is not a free pass to ruin anyone else's enjoyment. Respect each other's boundaries. Harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Unless stated otherwise in advance, no means no. Trolls and griefers will not be tolerated. We are here to be free of judgment and be comfortable with our true selves. Don't be a jerk and spoil that for others.

name: Kamuy Blossom Cafe
description: We're a cozy, Asian & water-themed cafe with delicious food, drinks, and alcohol while you enjoy some relaxing music. All sales, donations, and items go towards care packages for your fellow sprouts!

name: Crystal Nightclub
description: A fun inclusive place where everyone can feel welcomed in a club atmosphere. Dance to your hearts content on the open dancefloor to our in house DJ while enjoying a variety of roleplay services from our bar keep, entertainers, and casino, as well as gil and minion prize giveaways throughout the evening.

name: Catbar film lounge
description: Catbar Is focused on a quiet, relaxing rp environment for new and old players alike.
You are welcome to afk for along as you like!
Films will be streaming whenever we are open!

name: Wet & Wild Spa Resort
description: Rustic/Oriental themed bath house with full soak tubs (to /doze in), showerbeds, hot tubs to soak in and a watery dance floor and bar. Owner gives out free chocolates to every patron upon entry. Nail salon is available in venue for manicures and pedicures.

name: Undertaking Eorzea
description: Providing top of the line funerary care and services for all that live in Eorzea.  Our mortuary home includes a full service funeral parlor, wake hall with cash bar, and a more relaxed vibe downstairs in our lounge.

name: Lilac Lizard TeaHouse
description: A hyper casual SFW teahouse venue where you can relax after a long day of adventuring, preparing for a journey, or just need to get away from it all.

name: The Raven
description: [18+ NSFW] Nestled in the heart of Ishgard, The Raven is host to a wide menagerie of patrons and staff all eager to entertain, and be entertained. If you are looking for a new dark venue to spend your evenings, then look no further, we are waiting for you. We offer courts, gamba, drinks, music, and more. Come check it out for yourself.

name: Pandemonio
description: https://pandemonio.carrd.co/#about

name: THIRSTY
description: Underground nightclub home to the realest dirt, grime and poorly insulated chill for a good time. Rap, hip hop, and proud to introduce Chicago Footwork to the XIV community.

name: CLUB AQUA
description: Here at "CLUB AQUA "we are a HIGH-ENERGY 18+ night club that does everything we can to make your experience here as fun as possible. We offer services of SFW and NSFW from our courtesans with private rooms available for purchase while at the club, a full bar with a amazing selection and wonderful RP bartender(s). We have give-aways and games thru out the night. We offer VIP PACKAGED for a small fee see Peaches or Akeno, as well we offer a full sauna room for all guest looking to just sit back and enjoy the water. We have newly added Blackjack games held at the bar see bartender for rules. We like to let loose have fun and relax so please leave drama at the entrance doors. If you find you have any questions about what we offer seek any staff member in GOLD attire to further assist you.

name: Twelve's Tavern
description: *Your ale sloshes in its tankard as it makes impact with your teammates’ own drinks. You’ve won the grand prize of the night and the glory of having your face in the Hall of Winners at Twelve’s Tavern!*

Here at Twelve’s, we are dedicated to the passion for spouting random facts that make your friends ask, “Quick question… what the f*ck?” Every Tuesday night we host Tuesday Night Trivia. Patrons can test their knowledge of the realm and win minions, mounts, & more! Our establishment wholly RP based. We encourage engagement and interaction with the staff and other guests!

name: Threshold
description: Threshold is Aether’s local dive bar that houses the BDSM community. People from all experience levels in BDSM are warmly welcomed as we continue to grow as a community and as individuals in knowledge, skills, and experiences. As you step into our venue you’ll find open kink play and a night filled with kink performances. So grab a drink, take in the scenes and explore your wild side.
Open Sundays!
Jenova Mist, W14 P9

name: The Firebird Theatre
description: "The Importance of Being Earnest" by Oscar Wilde coming this spring! Join the discord server for updates.
Watch our previous play "Much Ado About Nothing" on youtube at https://www.youtube.com/@TheFirebirdTheatre
We are passionate performers putting on plays and stage performances in the housing district of the MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV.

name: The Royal Chambers
description: A BDSM-themed playground for the wicked and the sinful. The Royal Chambers is a lounge meant for those in the bdsm and kink community to feel welcome. We are a heavy-rp venue and require patrons and staff to be IC when on the premises. Our /say chat is allowed to be spicy but NSFW roleplay is only allowed in private rooms. We offered BDSM-themed rooms as well as casual-themed rooms, bookable staff, and plenty of RP on the main floor.

name: River's Fall English Tea Room
description: Come get your morning/afternoon/evening tea in this English Tea Room! — With a Study Room in the basement for you to afk and relax in while doing productive work irl, and the rest of our house to explore! 🙂

name: The Sleepy Nomad
description: [2nd Thursdays of the month, 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. Eastern]

"Come in and stay awhile."—Drop by The Sleepy Nomad for comfort food, drinks, and wind down with friends featuring chill music and a relaxing atmosphere.  Feel free to consider RSVPing for you and your friends with staff until 15 minutes to open. Catering, delivery, and private bookings available. Gil's IC only, but donations are accepted.

name: Genie Bottle
description: We are a SFW club that has a calm and cozy atmosphere with fresh made drinks and friendly service.

name: Vaguely Lewd
description: Vaguely Lewd. Vehemently Lazy. Very Loud. VL for short.

We're a hangout first, a venue second. Every small thing about VL is run for fun and with hilarious little qwerks that'll have your belly aching for hours. You can only experience them by visiting, experiencing and paying close attention. ;)

Started and opened by Kai Hitaki as a solo project with support from her second half Akina Crimson, VL was created with relaxation in mind. A place where you can be social and not have to worry about anyone judging you. Come and chill with us. ♥
The venue layout changes every few weeks and you can influence the theme via regular votes in the discord. We also regularly hold contests!
With this hangout, we really recommended to keep those eyes open.

name: The Syndicate
description: Welcome to the Syndicate!

From our fully stocked bar to our gamblers retreat we have something for everyone. Supporting local bard bands and Twitch DJ's we keep the party alive. Looking to have a more intimate night? Our lovely experienced courtesans can give you an experience unlike any other.
Try your hand with any of our services and we promise you'll leave with a smile.

name: The Sleepy Knight
description: Small diner that serves the best priced food you’ll find in Midgardsormr. I created a relaxing atmosphere for my patrons, so come give me a visit. My stage is open to any and all wandering bards you can even use the stage for practice. I also offer norse rune readings for those that are interested.

name: ViVid: Host Club and Bar
description: Come have a good time with the boyfriend, girlfriend, or partner of your choosing. Enjoy a night off of your adventures and let us help you relax for a time before going back out to the grind of saving the world!

We are an LGBTQ+, SFW, and 18+ club. Your safety and well-being is our primary concern. Whether it's just to relax or make new friends, we're here for you! Enjoy some music, pleasant conversation, and have our hosts recommend drinks to you! There's always something and someone here for you at ViVid!

notices.message: Venue is closed for a couple of months while the owner is on vacation!

name: Yuukimura Teahouse
description: A small relaxing traditionally inspired teahouse, nestled in the heart of Limsa. Fresh beverages and sweets along with a serene atmosphere.

name: Moonlights Eclipse
description: ''Moonlights Eclipse is a Primal Venue located at ward 7 plot 35 behemoth goblet

name: Club Cyberia
description: Primal DC’s premiere cybercentric nightclub showcasing live music and media. We aim to infuse our love for FFXIV with our decadently curated lineup of artists & DJs from beyond the Eorzean landscape. Each show caters to a different set of talented DJs and producers that we wholeheartedly admire.
Our events have something special to offer each and every time—raffles, prizes, and in-game merch.

name: Wisteria Brewery
description: The Wisteria Brewery has taken charge of scrolls from a much simpler time in Eorzea to create custom brews for you to enjoy. The Wisteria Brewery or WB also hosts two floors for entertainment. Both floors host their own unique entertainment and venue style.
Come enjoy a brew and a unique venue experience at the WB.

name: The Dark Forest Cafe
description: Join us in our forest themed café every Saturday evening for a RP friendly experience! Become enchanted by our live bards or enjoy a relaxing bath in our downstairs bath house. Our servers and bartenders will be glad to serve you drinks or food if you so desire! So come down and join us on Crystal/Coeurl in The Lavender Beds, Ward 25, Plot 6.

name: The White Pelican
description: Welcome to The White Pelican, a luxury beach rave venue.

The White Pelican encompasses the energy of a late-night party, the intimate conversations gathered around a bar, and the sophistication of a high-end lounge. We aim to create a space that encourages guests to interact with one another openly and experience a memorable night.
Bar chatter, a lit dance floor, electrifying music, private dancers, photo ops, gambling and more: The White Pelican offers something for everyone!

name: Kitsune Haven
description: A Far Eastern-themed club embodying the theme of "abandoned shrine turned nightclub". We strive to deliver a wide variety of Japanese music subcultures and genres through our live DJs. Paired together with a homely ambience and a unique aesthetic, Kitsune Haven aims to be Crystal's hub for all sorts of J-Music and Visual Kei.

name: The Kings Crown
description: a fine place for rogues, reverends, royalty and everything in-between

name: The Kingdom
description: A venue that was made to give DJ’s a place to just cut loose and do whatever they’d like and it was also built and decorated by other DJ’s. Just a fun environment with minimal staff to just focus on music and fun.

name: Love Me A Latte
description: Whether you are alone or have someone to hold, I hope you will join me to help celebrate Valentione's Day! Come in and have a seat or take a coffee to go. The cafe is located in the FC house for the WAYWARD MYSTIC in room #4.
I hope you take a peek at our discord and plan to visit our cozy basement tavern. Can't wait to see you!

name: Reverie Jazz Club and Lounge
description: Whether you're looking for a calm bar to chill at or a place to lounge and listen to music, Reverie's the spot to be. We pride ourselves on a chill atmosphere and excellent service. Every Wednesday we have a host of bards playing their best, most soothing sounds, a lovely lounge area, and a fantastic bar with staff ready to serve you the entire time you're there. And after hours, there's time for a soak in our hot tubs down below!
We also offer VIP rooms if you wanna get away from the crowd. If a particular staff member catches your eye, you can rent them out for some private, SFW conversation in our VIP rooms.

name: Everlight
description: A neon-infused club filled with inspiring rooms and drinks to put the spark back in your night. Enjoy some time at our bar, on the dance floor, or some private time with a muse!

name: The Rabbit Hole
description: Welcome to the Rabbit Hole, a modern basement venue with live DJs, gamba, games and more!

name: Sodalicious
description: The Soda and Dessert lounge with a little bard music. SFW atmosphere with a pop of imagination in roleplay. So come join us by embracing the soda kingdom at its fullest.

name: Club Skywind
description: Heaven or hell? Choose your destiny at Club Skywind. This multi-DJ and Bard venue has so much to offer to the party foes who wanna raise the roof! Come see us, we would love to see what you got.

name: Sinners Sanctum
description: The Sinners Sanctum is an 18+ venue which provides an immersive experience in alternative styling. Here we cater those labeled outcasts by society so we can live as our true selves. On the surface we can blend in but once you dig a little deeper, that's when the beast comes to play.

name: The Jeweled Cypress
description: The Jeweled Cypress is a Hingan and Doman eatery-and-tavern hosted in the Mist of La Noscea on the Mateus server of FFXIV, comprised of signature drinks and hand-crafted entrees. Open every other Sunday evening from 7pm to 10pm EST.

notices.message: This venue is open every OTHER Sunday. Please check their discord to see if this venue is open!

name: The Dark Garden
description: Nestled away from onlookers, the dark garden resides as a safe haven for those that crave a darker companion.

name: Club PINK
description: P.I.N.K. Is an adult-themed, sensual venue. A playground for the hedonist, where we focus fully on servicing our clients with the utmost care and detail. We offer a friendly and engaging staff and a myriad of delectable offerings for any club goer. All are welcome here!

name: Hearth & Home
description: A warm and welcoming atmosphere to hang out and make yourself at home.

name: Roses Cafe
description: Floral cafe

name: Queen of Cups - Fortune Telling Cafe
description: A quaint Fortune Telling Cafe where you can have your fortunes and futures told by one of the Oculists from Tarot, Tea Leaf, Moon Oracle, Runes, and more while listening to the musics and enjoying food and drinks!

name: The Forum Shopping Center
description: The Forum Shopping Center is the **ONLY** full RP shopping mall in Eorzea! We have a wide variety of options available for your shopping experience!
**Level 1 Glamour stores**
**Full class gearset Stores**
**Cafe**
**Toy Store**
**Dye Shop**
**Photo Studio**
**Onsen Spa**
**Movie Theater**
**Tarot Reader **
**Raider's Nutrition Center**
**..and more to come!****

name: Cruxx Venue
description: Cruxx's is a stylish Goth Club in Halicarnassus. Bar, rp/erp, DJ and more. Come check us out!

name: The Comfy Corner
description: A comfy lounge with a relaxing ambience, stargazing balcony, good food, and better conversation.

name: An Dranahm Café
description: A small café tucked away in a cozy corner of Empyreum, serving the best of the old and new of Coerthas, Abalathia, and Dravania

name: Hidden Hotsprings
description: The Hidden Hotsprings is a bathhouse and nightclub located on Seraph. Previously run on Aether, the hideaway has created great friendships and now returns to provide you with a late-night destination.

name: The Last Carrot
description: The Last Carrot is the next level in the dining and bar experience. You won't have to wait long in our lavish seating area for a host to take you to your table. Or you can venture right on up to The Last Carrot bar and indulge yourself in the hoppiest of drinks. Sit back and relax to the in game music or tune in to our DJ rocking those LoFi beats to ease away your day.

name: Very Viera
description: Very Viera is an 18+ heavy RP Viera inspired venue set in a treehouse!  A place for all races to gather and have fun while celebrating all things Viera.

name: Poncho
description: Going on 3 years of weekly Trance music shows with artists throughout the Midwest. Music first venue, in person or on stream staying as faithful to the IRL music set experience as we can. Full Trance sets followed by late night Happy Hardcore, find us IRL from Minnesota to Chicago!

name: Wonderland
description: Wonderland is a nightclub located in the Goblet. We offer live DJ-music, gambling and much more.
Follow us down the rabbit hole for a uniqe clubbing-experience!!!!
-we are all mad here....

name: Lune Cafe
description: ON HIATUS UNTIL SUNDAY, APRIL 9 - Come spend your evening with a Maid or Butler at an Ishgardian Cafe nestled in the newly restored Empyreum! Featuring Maid/Butler RP, fun activities, good eats, music, and art.

name: Unwritten
description: Unwritten adventurer's tavern is the place to relax, grab a drink and something to eat, and share a story.

name: Aquarius
description: a relaxing nightclub with a twist we do bard bands and djs

name: Valkyrie Club
description: Step into the afterlife at Ishgard's finest venue. All are welcome to enjoy drinks, dancers, photography, auctions, and more in our uniquely icy setting.

name: Apollo Night Club
description: Welcome to the Apollo Night Club! We are a Greek God themed night club providing entertainment to the mortal realm. Every night we strive to provide every patron the godliest of experiences. At our venue, we offer a variety of Roleplay Services, Fortune Readings, and even room rental so you and your friends can enjoy one of our themed Deity Dwellings! Our divine entertainment is provided by our fabulous two house DJs! So come on in and experience the wealth and wrath of the gods every Sunday and may the prosperity of the gods shine down upon you!

name: ONI
description: ONI is the sickest place to be on a Friday night because it is so god damn unique! As you take an elevator into the void, the building has 3 stories in which you can either dance on the roof, the dance floor, or even from the basement to tune in to the amazing jams of our DJ for the night. It even has a fantastic hidden bar, for the yakuza business person inside you. Did I say Yakuza? Yes I did! This bar is run by none other than the most dangerous criminals in Eorzea and their ring leader is by far the most ferocious, ME!! So, if you want to get a feel for this action and what the Yakuza lifestyle is like, then come on down to Goblin! You don’t want to miss it!

name: Fire & Ice
description: Fire & Ice! Designed with two contrasting themes under one roof! Each side represents Fire and Ice respectively. Get cozy and warm up amidst our frosty themed Ice side, or relax amongst the comforting flames of our Fire side. Open for all events, including Glamour competitions, Trivia night, Barding performances, and DJ events. We look forward to seeing you at Fire & Ice!

name: The Maneki-Neko
description: The Maneki-Neko is a love letter to those who seek to bask in the modern eastern vibes of a nightclub in cabaret's clothing. We have experienced bartenders, gambling, booming music and enticing courts & hosts that are bound to fill up your night with a mind-blowing experience and leave you with a little taste for more.

name: The Snack Shack
description: Located down the stairs from the hotsprings in Ishgard's Empyreum, The Snack Shack is a sfw bar and grill that offers snacks to the weary traveler visiting the 1st ward and 57th plot of Empyreum on Gilgamesh/Aether.

name: Sweep 'n Suds
description: Is our apartment a mess? Laundry heaping up? In need of some mending? Sweep 'n Suds is your solution! Employment contracts are available or SNS doors are open weekly for walk-ins. Always open for scheduled/contracted RP

name: Pinto's Art Cafe
description: A cozy café with hired artists who draw character portraits live on Twitch during venue hours. The menu is a mix of comfort foods and coffees with some alcoholic options to suit the late-night hours.

name: Moogles After Dark
description: "A Club that gives a whole new meaning to 'Kupo!' - We aim to host Truth or Dare, Auctions (80/20), and Club Nights with Twitch DJs, while offering Drinks, Spa and Dance Services!"

name: Red Lycoris
description: Welcome to Red Lycoris, we offer a plethora of services and a lovely atmosphere. Come join us for a night of thrills and good vibes with friends.

name: Komorebi
description: 𝚔𝚘𝚖𝚘𝚛𝚎𝚋𝚒✤ *Dance Bar & Lounge offers you food & drink, wellness, and company* ✤ Take a seat in our bar & lounge or dance your way into the evening with our beautiful courtesans' ✤ Our upstairs bath house with dedicated healers are ready for you! Hop in freely once you're done downstairs, or fresh out of one of our lovingly decorated rooms. ✤ Our location is open 24/7 outside of operating hours, as we are dedicated to providing you with an immersive location for mature, 18+ roleplaying opportunities.

name: Moon River
description: For the weary wanderers, perhaps naught much else could soothe the soul like sipping on spirits amidst laughter and music under the calm of the stars. Should you find yourself seeking repose, it might prove worthwhile to leap once more, at journey’s end.

name: Honeysuckle Teahouse
description: Honeysuckle is an RP18+ Teahouse offering baths and companionship! We are a group of friends that love to meet new people and hang out. Our venue has been around for over a year, and we would love it if you came by to see us!

name: Black Rose
description: Home of the Ready Check!!! Come on down for a good time!! Auctions, Contests, Collabs, Raffles, & More!!! A little something for Everyone!!!

name: Dark Whispers
description: Dark Whispers is an 18+ LGBTQ + ALL race inclusive venue that is ran by one of the Di'Morte sisters *Xaleia Di'Morte.*
So if your lookin for a place to do your *"dirty"* work with one of our freelance Courtesans or just want to hang  then come join us.

(*We are a neutral territory venue and we ask that you do not come in with any drama. We also encourage all types of Rp so long as there is consent. No one is forced to do anything they do not want to do,  you can go afk for all we care. If you have any further questions please feel free to contact me at Xaleia Di'Morte#8051 or join our discord.*)

name: Cafe Mi-Lanna
description: Reborn from its Ashes on the Beach side view and the sunsets. Mi-Lanna Café thrives to provide a warm and cozy atmosphere.
Open stage up to grab for any Bard that feel like showing off their skills.

name: The Birdbath
description: February promotions page: **embraceofanangel.carrd.co**
Relief comes in many forms, and the Birdbath offers all of them.
• Soak in our Hot Mineral Water baths and sauna
• Enjoy the company of our angels
• Hor d'oeurves and wine provided by the Azure Dove
• Private Massages on demand: 40k / 20 minutes
• Immediate access to Touch of an Angel Services

name: UA Academia Lounge
description: Eorzea's original auction house and premiere dance club, UA Lounge is your destination whether it be to dance the night away, meet new people, buy, or sell, you're sure to have an enjoyable evening. Our staff is eager to help you have the night of your life, and they don't bite, unless you ask them to. With various events being offered, you never know what the night will bring!

name: Celestial Beats
description: "We are taking you on a journey to discover the sick beats of the universe using our trusty Celestial Train named "Starburst" ! "
The train will make different stops and the whole style of the club will change! It will also bring different vibes and new events for you to enjoy!

name: The Noire Phoenix
description: The Noire Phoenix, a place to get away from your daily habits of Eorzea. Here we just focus on a good time! Our 18+ venue offers all sorts of activities from gambling to live DJ's! Stop on in and join the family!

name: The Lion's Maw
description: The Lion's Maw is a Somnus Den and Fighting Arena. Located in the Goblet, it aims to offer a unique gladiatorial experience to those brave enough to enter.

name: Ink Nightclub
description: Our exclusive nightclub experience offers some of the top live DJs on Aether, stacked VIP packages, giveaways, theme nights galore, and a full casino floor.
High roller and learning nights are available for Blackjack on the regular. Customize your experience with our entertainers, photography, and tarot readings.
Think of something you want and don't see it? Ask and we'll see what we can do to fulfill your wildest dreams.

name: Asmodeus
description: Aether's premier 18+ metal club, offering a high-end atmosphere with all the perks metalheads have come to love and expect. Our Hell's Belles are always willing to entertain, be it SFW or NSFW. Our bar offers a variety of selections, including our house brewed IPA. We have blackjack dealers at the ready and a private gambling room for those more interested in high-stakes. Our VIP services cater to nightly crowds looking to spice things up to our lifetime VIP package for the hardcore metalheads. And while you gamble and mosh the night away, our very own DJ DemonKtn is here to provide the perfect soundtrack for your night. Whatever your desires, Asmodeus is here to satisfy!

name: OMNIA Nightclub
description: Enjoy an interactive nightlife experience with a variety of musical talent, friendly staff and beautiful party people. Omnia means "everything" and we're here to give you all that your heart desires.

name: The Twisted Blossom
description: Tiny Goth Speakeasy and Au Ra Sanctuary, We Have Kumis! Come in for a time to relax, hangout, and enjoy the antics of the Auri!

name: The Underground!
description: Beneath the Index of Hyper knowledge lies the hyper warehouse where our DJ's run wild at the Underground. Find your way through the house to the secret entrance to party below. Amongst the remains of Hyper themes past stands a bar with a skilled bartender, and a booth for our DJ's to go crazy with new and experimental vibes for your listening pleasure!

name: XV
description: XV is a void* bathhouse that we built together to share the same cozy and relaxing atmosphere that we enjoy with you all. We currently offer seven baths spread across in three different sections of the venue as well as calm and soothing music from our bard(s) and orchestrion. There is also a bar in which menu items are all completely free which is tended by our lovely barkeeps that would love to talk and interact with you. On top of that, we offer several hosts that you may spend time with at no fee. We just want a comfortable, safe, and relaxing place for you all to enjoy, so please stop on by.
*Note: It being a void build, you must walk fully into the elevator which will be directly in front of you once you enter the premises. Once inside, jump to reach the main floor of the venue.

name: Eri's Baking Company
description: At Eri's we offer a small café experience with the calmness of a weekday night, and the comedy/unpredictability that is life itself, so when you walk into Eri's expect a relaxing atmosphere but don't be alarmed if suddenly people raid the venue and take the pastries, its just life 😁

name: The Canvas
description: The Canvas is an art studio/lounge focused on doing live art commissions! Come by to commission artists, or enter our weekly art raffle done by one of our artists!

name: Ancient Ram Tavern
description: Welcome oh welcome my friends!~
Come all those who lurk in the shadows, who hide behind masks and those otherworldly or undead, for you have arrived at your place of respite from this wretched world
This is an rp venue for supernatural and darker themed characters who wish to explore dark stories and plot including, but not limited to vampires, werewolves, witches and others shrouded in mystery!

name: Bad Boys Bar
description: A bar exclusively for men and/or those identifying as men. Basically, a relaxing "safe place" for men who seek the company of other men. A fun and erotic environment to cater to the aspirations of gay men. The utopia where they will be welcomed to get together, express, interact and make strong connections...in more ways than one. Sweet n' spicy under one roof; a combination of delicious drinks and a team of handsomely adoring men willing to offer all forms of companionship. However, despite our true focus, all are welcome to visit and partake in what the BBB has to offer.

name: Dreaming Demon Cafe
description: A calm, relaxing cafe where you can come and ease your mind and body~ With Tea, Coffee, Breakfast, and deserts abound there is very little we don't do to make sure you feel at peace before you leave here!

name: VLVT DRMS
description: VLVT DRMS is a safe for work dance venue and bar lounge, lavishly decorated with a cozy and warm atmosphere to both entice and relax even the weariest of wanderers. We strive to bring a safe, calming space into our wonderful community, hoping that each visit will leave you in the clouds! Whether you're looking to grab a few drinks, make pleasant conversation or dance the night away, there is a member of staff that is eager to spend their time dreaming with you. Come dream with us tonight!
To enter the venue use /doze next to the desk. To exit the venue jump on the floor lamp.

name: The Eclipse
description: dance Music Fun meeting new players
Our Venue is based on Friends who love to spend time together and Giving new dj’s a love to play

name: The Shepherd's Rest
description: The Shepherd's Rest is a place to relax and unwind from the sun's adventures. A little rustic tavern/inn where locals and travelers alike can find a bit of comfort. Enjoy traditional Coerthan cuisine with an old Eastern Highland family recipe with the house special, the Shepherd's Pie, or the savory and slow simmered melt-in-your-mouth beef potage.
Enjoy Ishgardian and Coerthan drinks in front of a cozy fire or with friends both new and old. Find rest for a night in the small inn upstairs, with comfortable beds and clean and crisp linens.

name: Vermillion
description: Designed with a sultry burlesque theme and inspired by the speakeasys of the 1920's, Vermillion is truly a place to relax and unwind with a drink in hand and a classic beauty by your side. Come along and join us for an experience you won't soon forget.

name: Kashmir Club
description: Come dance the night to the hits of the 80's, 90's, classic and hard rock by DJ Velannah twitch.tv/velannah

name: The Light's Chosen
description: An RP venue where people can relax and enjoy themselves. New to RP? No problem! We are here to help! LGBTQ+ 18+ friendly
Famfrit-Shiro-Ward 26/Plot 43

name: The Red String
description: The Red String is a bar and lounge situated within the boughs of the Lavender Beds.
Owned and operated by an active pirate captain, people can expect patrons from all walks of life to come in and share a fine drink. The first sip will have one feel the rhythm of life in a glass.

name: Copycat Records Cafe
description: A small café on Adamantoise with live vinyl records streamed as entertainment. The Cafe is music oriented, with a relaxing and laid back atmosphere. The venue is RP and AFK friendly, whether people want to come in and meet new friends, or if they wanna come in just vibe out to music, all is welcome!

name: Club Ignition
description: A night club with live djs and giveaways!

name: Azalea's Comfy Cafe
description: A comfy, relaxing corner of Eorzea that's open to anyone who is looking to wind down after raiding, pregame for a big night out, or just to relax for the evening!

name: Sip & Brew
description: Our little café is here to provide high quality product, in a relaxed environment. Please take your time and enjoy a refreshment and unwind in our dining area, library lounge or gardens. Close to the Lavender Southwest aetheryte, or straight down the docks to the left!

name: The Wanderer's Respite Inn and Tavern
description: SFW RP- A place where folks can rest their heads after a long day. Drinks specials, snacks, an open stage for bards, poets and other stage performances. Relaxed vibes.

name: The Crimson Lotus
description: Hingan themes, black and red, hot music, hot ramen, and hot geishas. The Crimson Lotus' goal as a venue is to be somewhere that you can come to relax and be more than another face in the crowd.

Looking for some excitement? The Crimson Lotus offers live music from a diverse collection of Live DJ's every Thursday night. Bust out your glowsticks, turn on a stream, and dance the night away with dozens of other people while vibing to some of Eorzea's top performers!

For all of our high rollers out there, The CrimLo also offers an assortment of casino games for you to try your hand at. Our dealers have all been trained to offer you lightning fast rounds, and we offer all of the features you expect from your favorite games like splits and double downs. Our games are even tax free for our VIP patrons!
Not your cup of Doman tea? Come hangout at our bar and enjoy some of our eastern themed food and cocktails, delivered to you by one of our immersive roleplay bartenders.

No matter where you go in the Crimson Lotus you'll also have access to our talented array of Geishas. They're sure to dazzle and amaze you with their dancing, or offer you an indulging conversation to pass your time.
Come stop by and find out why this is one of the fastest growing venues on Aether. You're sure to remember the Crimson Lotus and they're sure to remember you when you come back in for a second visit!

name: Marigold
description: ♥ The Marigold is a restaurant and flower shop in one ♥
It's the best place for high-qaulity popoto based food!
Plus, all those beautiful flowers and corsages ♥

name: The Bookend Lounge
description: The Bookend Lounge is a speakeasy bar fronting as a bookstore. We have an open stage, blackjack, and drinks aplenty. It's a great place to hang out and mingle with friends new and old. So come, take a look behind the shelves.

name: The Lost Factory
description: Welcome to The Lost Factory ! Take a drink and have fun 😉

name: Tiamat's Tavern
description: Come on in and take a load off! At Tiamat's Tavern we strive to give everyone a fun rustic (SFW) RP experience! Our barkeeps can mix you up a drink or you can try our tavern swill on tap! If you head on downstairs we've got a live music stage and some card tables if you'd like to test your luck! If you're tired of the crowded club life and just want a casual place to play blackjack or hang out, consider stopping by for a tankard or two!

name: Abbiocco Fine Dining
description: Abbiocco Fine Dining offers an unforgettable evening of attentive staff, excellent food, and live entertainment. A perfect place to come with a special someone, a group of friends or family, or even solo. **Note:** We are not open on the first Monday of the month.

name: Insomnia
description: Insomnia. Where the party doesn’t rest until you do. Come on down, because we’ve got something for everyone. Fancy a dance? Take a spin on our dance floor to live music. Dancing got you thirsty? Grab a drink at the bar. Take a soak in a hot tub or soak in the sights of our vivacious dancers for your viewing pleasure. Who knew late nights could be this fun?

name: The Rebel Underground
description: Drink your night away at this grunge speakeasy hidden in the basement of your ordinary Hingashi bathhouse. The Rebel Underground is a place for free spirits and bad behaviour, and promises to keep you entertained with an immersive roleplaying experience.
A night at this shady establishment includes a stocked bar, triple triad matches, gambling, live guitarist(s) and more!

name: Alie's Wanderful Maid Cafe
description: Adorable maids are here to serve you in this East-West fusion cafe. Come sit and enjoy either cute and sweet or calming and relaxing decor.

name: Salt + Sanctuary
description: We offer a unique atmosphere with food, drinks, music, and dancing. All services come with extra salt, attitude, and sarcasm. We encourage people to cut loose and have fun; newcomers need to understand the service is meant to be bad, rude, and above all SALTY. We urge people to join in the fun!

name: Shizen Nightclub
description: Shizen is a Japanese Mature Themed Club with a modern touch in the basement,
which can be found inside the protective walls of Ul'dah The Goblet.
Come join us on the dancefloor
have a drink or dance untill morning!

name: The Underground
description: Beneath the surface of Uldah lays Eorzea's best hidden night life gem. With only one event per month, The Underground was designed for those who just like to kick back and listen to some great talent while enjoying the company of friends. The only prerequisite for a night at the Underground is the love of a good dance party! Owner and designer, Gilae, handpicks the DJs to perform and along with her bestie and Manager, Forgiven, plan each event at this clandestine club to be a fun, interactive, experience. If you're a DJ and you'd like the opportunity to perform at Underground, reach out to us! Event dates are posted on the Underground's discord so please come by and check us out!

name: The BirdHouse
description: We are a (SFW) Lala focused nightclub! All races Welcome!!
Are you a LALA and looking for a place to have fun?
Then come out to The Bird House!!
We have drinks, DJ, and cool friends to make!
All races welcome!

name: The Moonvessel
description: “We are a ragtag group of individuals who want nothing more than to bridge the gap between The Source and the Stars beyond.” - New AppleSeed Adventurers

We at The Moonvessel have three principles: Creativity, Individuality, and Uniqueness. We call everyone a “Star”, because each person has their own identity and no matter who or what they are, they are as beautiful as one. Here at The Moonvessel, you are encouraged to think outside the box and be yourself, free from all judgment. Think of this place as your own personal safe haven.

name: Poisoned Pestle
description: Poisoned Pestle is an apothecary that specializes in high quality, rare, and experimental potions. We strive to meet the needs of our customers, and if you don't see what you're looking for among our shelves, there is a possibility it can be created and/or procured for you (via RP). Feel free to browse our wares and tomes, or sit down and rest your weary feet. If you're feeling adventurous, perhaps you would be interested in trying our experimental potions?

name: Seanchai's Lamp: All your Storying Needs
description: The Seanchai's Lamp is an RP Venue for all those who have a story to tell but never seem to find the right time to tell it. A place for persons to develop their stories, share their stories, and hear the stories of others who want to forget the regrettable and write the unforgettable!

name: Sundragon Tavern
description: The Sundragon Tavern is an RP venue based in Ishgard's Firmament. Here, we serve Ishgardian food and drinks in a warm and comforting setting. Some nights we will have live barding or our tavern's "radio" music will be provided. OPEN TWO FRIDAYS A MONTH! Please, follow us on discord for announcements 🙂

name: Cheshire Cat
description: A charming and cosy place that us purrfect to unwind after a hard day. Meet new likeminded people as you relax by our fireplace or have a drink from our lovely bartendster.
If you're feeling particularly curious, you might just find yourself falling down a rabbit hole and discovering all sorts of surprises.
So, come on over and let's see where the night takes you...

name: Iced Out
description: We're obsessed with music above all!

name: The Juice Saloon
description: A rootin’ and tootin’ cowboy experience in Aether’s very own Faerie! Join for an authentic saloon styled bar with country music, barmaids, gambling, and a selection of cowgirls and cowboys ready to line dance the night away! Come in your best western gear and immerse yourself in the finest Wild West night Eorzea has to offer!

name: Good Room
description: If you’re looking for an underground club experience, look no further. Come vibe with us.

name: Atlas
description: Welcome to Atlas, Ishgard's premire seafood restaurant! Come warm up with us below deck in our cozy, nautical-themed dining hall. Whether you're here for a three-course meal, or simply here for a drink at our bar, our lovely staff will be sure to take care of you!

Atlas is the passion project of Sylvas and Farah Vex, two Viera that share a love for all the fine dining establishments around Eorzea. Our goal at Atlas is to provide the best dining experience possible for our customers and ensure they always leave looking forward to their next visit.

name: Lufeena's Haven
description: We are a Temple devoted to a pantheon of Goddesses of our own design and we are an adult venue that offers private services to paying customers OVER 18 as well as a free to interact SFW Temple environment for private worship. We have a calming atmosphere and a Chapel we hope to hold Player weddings in so that cross world couples may get married.

name: The Colosseum Cabaret and Casino
description: In a class all its own, we present The Colosseum Cabaret and Casino, a relaxing Roman themed environment with quality entertainment. Come for the diverse music in our unique dance hall, and stay for the thrill of our exciting casino games and shows. Stop by our Eorzean Essence Award winning bar, and enjoy our fine collection of themed drinks from around the continent. Enjoy the performance of our gladiators as they fight for honor and recognition in our cage suspended above the venue. Our one of a kind Kupo Race is sure to impress as you cheer-on the dancers racing across the colorful tracks. Treat yourself right and join us for our unrivaled Colosseum experience.

name: Sector 7
description: **Open every second Friday. Join our Discord for our schedule.**

Step into a fully immersive roleplay nightclub, complete with DJ's to help you dance the night away and dancers to entertain! Featuring full SFW and NSFW services as well as beautiful decorated private rooms, this is the place for both private parties and big nights out!
Please note: We do not allow OOC interactions of any kind (within reason). This includes shouts and yells along with any typical Twitch DJ spam.

name: Greystone Cellar and Tavern
description: It's Saturday night, and you just finished a shift at your local bar or your a patron looking for a night cap before you head back to the inn or your home for the evening. Maybe for you, the night is just getting started! Whatever your reason, Greystone Tavern is there for you.

Greystone Tavern is a casual in-character late night tavern focused to give you a chance to breathe and decompress from the evening's events or a way to get a late night fix if you had to start your roleplay night late. Let our music and our bartenders give you the opportunity to make your feel at home.

name: The Night Shift Cafe
description: A cozy cafe for the hard workers of the night to our night owls all can come together to take a break till the next shift! Offering food and drink for crystals or shards, this is the perfect place to lounge around or finish that book you're writing~

name: Kitty Twister
description: Meowdy partner! Come on down to Kitty Twister! We're a little bar dedicated to serving up ice-cold beer and playing the best Country, Blues, and Classic Rock. So if you're looking for a change of pace from from EDM and fancy nightclubs, throw on those cowboy boots and come on down!

name: The Nightingale's Song Café
description: The Nightingale’s Song Café is a rustic ishgardian establishment that is located in the Firmament that aim to provide a comfortable place for both local and far traveled guests. The café always have something sweet, light meals and a varied menu of drinks, both hot and cold. The menu is a fine combination from local dishes and far eastern dishes, so guests could choose something familiar or perhaps try something exotic.

Guests do get tended by our friendly staff and there is always many fine places to sit at. A favorite is the middle floor if the guest would wish to chatter with the staff, as there is not many dull moments at the Nightingale’s Song. Downstairs we have our lovely bar and further more seating and our stage where bards can play if they so wish to.

name: The Tranquil Fowl Inn & Bath
description: A bath house that has an attached onsen and private garden bath outside. Free entry into the baths inside with calming waters and soothing teas. Come relax the night away and lounge to your hearts content. Mayhaps book a room with your significant other and woo the night away ❤️

name: The Whispering Masquerade
description: The Whispering Masquerade is a hostess venue focused on providing the perfect companion to entertain you for the evening. Are you looking to discuss the intricacies of the fall of the Allagan Empire? A drinking partner? Quiet conversation in a themed room? A good luck charm at the roulette table? Whatever your desires, we will provide an accommodating Whisper for the evening. Our Whispers are well trained in a variety of arts, skills, and topics of knowledge to ensure your experience brings intellectual, emotional and cultural fulfillment.
Whatever your heart desires, all it takes is a Whisper.

name: The Shoe
description: A cozy cafe, library, and lounge in a little corner of Ishgard.

name: Garden of Madness
description: Hidden deep on Etheirys, there is a book written by the most knowledgeable of Ancients . A book so sacred that when opened will spread love and happiness throughout the star, removing its dark past. The book has been found. We who found it invite one and all to this magical journey as we prepare to write a new chapter in Etheirys' story. Welcome to the Garden Of Madness

name: Ember
description: We are a Dark Themed Nightclub focused into Music Metal , Rock , Industrial , Dark Techno  etc.. who try to take care all their customers with our amazing Staff. and trying to improve every week. is a place where whitout an doubt you should visit.

name: A Bookstore
description: Welcome to a bookstore! You appear to have stumbled into a random bookstore, with quiet librarians in a dark, warm cozy setting. Shelves line the wall, littered with books from different ages, varying in genres. Throughout your exploration of the small library, small noises can be heard faintly from beneath the floor but the librarians pay no attention to them. Suspiciously, an old window panel lays near the entrance, almost out of place as the librarians can be caught glancing at them every now and then.

name: Clepsydra
description: Tucked away amongst the ruins of the abandoned Sharlayan colony in the Dravanian Hinterlands, Clepsydra is a home turned place of healing for the body, mind and soul. From the sights, sounds and smells, relaxation is sure to come to those that seek a moment away from the world to rest and heal or simply regale the owner or friends with tales of exploration and exploits and woes. Owned and lived in by Usynthuv Adlais, any that visit would be greeted by the wayward Sharlayan and offered whatever she can provide that they desire; knowledge, tea, tinctures, wound care, general healing, massage, and anything else that visitors may need. Except food. There is only soup and it is not a good soup. Good for you, but beyond bland.

name: Ukiyo
description: Immersive RP

name: **Elemental Estate**
description: Sfw bar / lounge

name: Seven Circles
description: (+18) (LGBTQ+) Seven Circles nightclub prides itself on being a friendly and safe space for all walks of life. We feature a full selection of lovely dancers, live music, half priced special drinks, SFW and NSFW services for all your desires. Special additions include an in house photographer and artist! Come join us and sin the night away!

name: Pluto's Kiss
description: Pluto's//Kiss is a dotHack inspired after-hours night club. Home of DJ Claire Ai and a rotating cast of her talented DJ friends, it is a must-see destination to see some of the best hardcore and rave DJs in the scene!

name: Phantasia
description: The number one cyberpunk club in Eorzea! [18+ | LGBTQIA+ Positive] We offer dancing, music, drinks, V.I.P., gambling, and companions. Offering an immersive RP experience, Phantasia will augment your desires.

name: Wisteria Tea House
description: Wisteria tea house is a relaxing spot where anyone can feel free to stop and visit. you may feel free to order a cup of tea or enjoy our relaxing outdoor bath. Come check out our discord if you would like to chat with us some more or would like updates on our seasonal menus

name: Sinner's Sanctum
description: We've got courts, we've got dancers, we've got gamba and we've got drinks! We might even have a live DJ! What more could you need?!

name: SpringRolls
description: A Comfy, Cozy, Safe Space for people to just chill and eat some sweet treats. We want to make the world a better place, one Cookie at a time. We hope to see you soon! 💙

name: Exo Aeterna
description: Exo Aeterna is Primal's premiere night club destination, home to an incredible, talented set of resident DJs including Swage, The A'leycat, XOVR, Astromancy and KitKat. Open two nights a week, Exo is known for their amazing parties, stunning location and nightly open auction of some of the most beautiful and talented people in Eorzea!

name: Lali-ho Maid Cafe
description: The first Aether Lalafell Maid Cafe is like an adorable slice of cake~! It's sweet, bright and filled with goodies.
We have an extensive Menu with all the Maid Cafe perks! Moe Moe Dances, Janken and many other fun games to play.
We offer Talks and Custom Polaroids with our smol maids for you to enjoy with a Cuteness Sensory Overload~!
Our cute venue is bright and always cheery with lala maids sitting in only spots lalas could fit! Soft couches and sweet ambiance awaits with lots of cheek pinching lala laughs!

name: ENVY
description: ENVY is a new 18+ SFW Casino and Bar! Come enjoy a hand of blackjack, a fully stocked bar and Aether's finest entertainment as you dance the night away! As patrons of many venues, we wanted to open our own that specialized in what we loved most - gambling and good vibes!

name: Applebottom's
description: Applebottom's is an LGTBQ+ (21+) Dive bar that specializes in interactive RP that immerses people into their wild side! The main goal is to be a space for people that feel like they have none. Many have found it a peaceful oasis to have some fun and be themselves. No judgments as everyone is welcome. Sex positive and loving, Applebottom's is an adults only venue focused on interactions with mature adults.

name: Club Hades
description: Club Hades is one of Excalibur's premiere nightclubs with the most affordable drinks and entertainment on the data center! A venue casually ran by friends every Friday evening, providing a place for anyone and everyone (18+) to come and hang out, vibe, listen to tunes, socialize or RP. Club Hades offers a multitude of role-playing experiences via our staff. We employ bartenders at our large double bar, security throughout the venue, dancers(some of which provide private services if asked) all over our many stages and live playlists via our DJs Twitch stream. Come start your weekend off right with Club Hades and hang out, socialize, RP, drink, dance or just vibe and listen to the tunes!

name: The Crystal Wind
description: The Crystal Wind is a small café that acts as a haven for wanderers. Here time stops so that you might rest your weary souls. Come by and have a chat with the owner, commission something, or just relax in the comforting aura of the space.

name: Moonlit Fang
description: *Over the hill and through the woods.*
*You’ll be in for a big surprise.*
*Through the tall trees, on a cold moonlit night.*
*A warm light shines so bright.*
Welcome, weary traveler, to the Moonlit Fang. We ain’t the spiffiest of taverns, but the drinks are good, foods decent, and it’s a warm enough to chase away the chill in yer bones.
Best you wait till the mornin' before headin' out. Otherwise, you may be in for a big surprise…
*AWWWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!*

name: The Scene
description: The Scene, your favorite place once a month to get your Emo on! A emonite Themed venue.

name: Hearth & Snow
description: As the cold Ishgardian climate bites at your weary bones when you are travelling, we at the Hearth & Snow bring a warm, joyous experience to those wanting a hot meal with some quiet atmosphere and perhaps a bard to strum a song or two.
We are a venue that had two menus for our upstairs café and downstairs pub! We hold raffles on the last Wednesday of the month.

name: Moka Pot Cafe
description: Take in the friendly and welcoming atmosphere of Moka Pot Café which is open every day, serving a delicious range of drinks and snacks.

name: Sykurjima's Weapons
description: Weapon and Armor Shop with cheaper prices than the MB! Lvl 90 crafters for all crafts. Can even meld materia for you! Leave orders in book on desk ^_^

name: Cozy Forest Fae Club
description: We took the forest and the fae and placed em indoors to party with us!

name: Aberrant Lounge
description: The Aberrant Lounge is a roleplay focused multi-bar venue located on Crystal. Visit our beautiful upstairs cigar bar for a quiet and relaxed setting. Prefer dancing? We also have a lively Nightclub located on our lower floor with live in house DJs. Or if you prefer to spice things up, you can always rent time in one of our private rooms with a dancer of your choice.

name: The Tipsy Coin
description: We are an oriented D&D medieval tavern. Stock up your supplies or plan your next adventure with your friends. Also take a look at our headhunter-board for requests or just enjoy the atmosphere. We offer guest rooms and tavern music aswell.

name: The Viper Lounge and Bathhouse
description: An immersive roleplay venue offering Far Eastern delicacies, complimentary tea and wine, VIP services and more.

name: Arclight
description: We are pink and we love music! We love to entertain and we love to spend quality time with all guests who visit our club. We offer several exciting Services and we give our best so everyone feels entertained and comfy. Come and socialize with us. Listen to good music, have a drink at the Bar, book one of our Cherries, enjoy the Show of our Mascotsm try your luck at gambling or just chat to one of our Fairies. See you at Arclight!

name: Hotel Sierra
description: Hotel Sierra is run by a small welcoming fc complete with bar, music hall and baths you're sure to find a way to unwind after a long day. Luxury chambers are available to hire, with more being added over time.

name: Evergarden Café
description: Welcome to **The Evergarden Café**, we are a Japanese Maid Café based in Chaos with the idea to bring Anime inspired comfy and cute (Kawaii) services to our guests! <:kanaheart:1010404609187127306>

At our Café we try our upmost in serving the best Japanese/Anime food and drink such as Ramune, Boba Tea, Jelly-filled donuts, Taiyaki and so much more. We have a wide selection of items to choose from so be sure to check out our menu before your visit! <:venilove:955095205894291486>

We also offer extra special services to complete the Japanese Maid Café experience including; Special RP menu items, Performances, Photos and even the option to have Private experiences with our Maids! To find out more please check out services before your visit! <:kanaheart:1010404609187127306>

name: The Vanguard
description: A new LGBTQ+ Immersive RP venue, offers a rich and enticing Nightclub vibe, with the RP to keep you intrigued throughout the night. We offer not 1, not 2, but 3 special rooms to make the RP experience more organic - a bathhouse, a lounge, and a private showroom. Our bar, is fully stocked, our music is poppin', and you will feel like the only one who matters, but only here at The Vanguard.

name: The Sins Factory
description: The Sins Factory is an industrial themed nightclub, roleplay, bar, photographers, DJ area and more for the plasure of our guests !

name: Nightraid Bounty Call
description: 💰 Bring back your trophies and collect your rewards! 💰

NightRaid's office is open for those in search of bounties, odd jobs, and general work. Those with many different professions such as; hunters, mercenaries, exorcists, crafters, gatherers, healers, and so on are usually welcome to browse our job board located in the lobby. Our HQ also acts as a lounge & kitchen downstairs if visitors are looking to relax and socialize.
🏮NightRaid's Services: Hunting, Tracking, Info-Gathering, Exorcism, Healing, Escorting, Guarding, Entertainment, etc.
🏮Traditional eastern guestrooms are open for hunters to stay after. Healers are on standby if any hunter returns injured!

notices.message: This venue opens biweekly at this time, please check the venue's discord to see if the're open first!

name: Playboy Mansion
description: Welcome to PBM! The place where all of your appetites will be sated every Wednesday and Saturday night. The Playboy Mansion is a night-club with a fully-stocked bar, casino upstairs, and a host to a number of live twitch-DJ's and bands for your enjoyment. Looking for something more? Our extremely talented and beautiful staff are always available and eager to please! Don't miss out on an unforgettable experience and come join us for our next opening!

name: The Tipsy Cat
description: On the beaches of the Mist the Elakha clan discovered a drafty old forge. The siblings claimed it as their own and over the years they brought countless strays in to learn to thrive. Now that the nest is empty once more, the Elakha's have turned their lovely forge into a tavern. Here the fire is warm and bright, and the company is as hearty as the food.
Welcome to the Tipsy Cat, we hope you enjoy your visit.
RP Tavern

name: Makoto's Gamba Hall
description: Makoto's is a gamba hall that offers exciting games for guests to try and play to win lots of gil...even tho Blackjack is the game of choice! We also have 3 different sake's for you to try and we offer them in a traditional style for you to enjoy! Sometimes we also host bards and DJ's at the venue for the guests enjoyment!  Solo bard performance is preformed by our very own Lil'Draven who mostly plays traditional oriental music for everyone to relax to while they chill or play gamba! Come and lounge and relax with us!

name: The Cafe Fortemps - Zalera
description: The Cafe Fortemps is a causal in-character focused Roleplay Cafe. We welcome all role players of all experience levels to come in and join us for a cup of Ishgardian Tea (Or Whiskey) and chat with your friends or our hosts. Looking for a great place for a first date? Got you! Want to meet up with friends before or after a static raid? We got plenty of space for all your crew. Looking to make plans for economic domination of the marketplace or the salvation of the void? We’re here to help and fuel those ideas. Join us at The Cafe Fortemps and make roleplay stories happen.

name: Lost Aether Night Club
description: We are an 18+ LGBTQ-friendly night club offering dancers, bartenders and a diverse bar menu, personal and group RP, tarot readings, casino, spa, and other services!

name: The BakeryBar
description: A quiet place to relax and have some freshly baked bread and a small meal during the day when the bakery closes the bar opens up a couple of hours later for a relaxing time to have a drink, chat, meet new people, and have social events: like bar room trivia night and a comedy night. Food services and Tavern

name: Le Tea Cosy
description: Le Tea Cosy is a family-owned and oriented hybrid tavern, lounge & eatery. It's purpose is none other than to serve as a comforting establishment where weary travelers may rest their heads and indulge in lavish food, drink, and curated performance art.
The owners, Peach and Hazel, sought to appeal to the lovers of authenticity, as all musical performances are manual, and come straight from the heart.
Whether it be for a chat, a drink, or to stay for a show, all are welcome in our home!

name: The Twilight Moon
description: Fae inspired venue with live music from the Twilight Moon Quintet, and featuring an array of talent including DJs, bards, bands and macro-dancers! The Twilight Moon is the home of the Twilight Moon Quintet.

name: The Sundrop Cafe
description: ***Open the 1st and 3rd saturday of the month.***
Your local Male Maid Cafe! Relax and cozy up with a cup of tea or coffee, chat with one of our lovely maids and enjoy the warm comforting atmosphere the Sundrop cafe has to offer.

name: The Crescent's Keep Tavern
description: Newly Relocated to Shirogane, the once cozy and comfortable tavern has been transformed! Please enjoy our signature drinks while you relax in our herbal baths with some of our choice herbs.
Our private rooms contain our many amenities for the mercenaries who pass through.
Located on Mateus Shirogane Ward 26 Plot 46

name: The Haven
description: Chill Saturday nightclub with music ranging from techno to edm to metal, transforming to romantic baths with soothing music on Wednesday nights to soothe weary adult partygoers.

name: Prelude in Violet
description: Welcome to Prelude in Violet! We have an open stage for bards along with various food and drink. SFW/AFK friendly.

name: Seventh Heaven
description: Do you like FFVII? Do you want to drink some beverages with our lovely Aerith and Tifa? You are at the good place for it ! Come enjoy FF7 vibes with us !

name: Wayward Rose Casino & Lounge
description: Casino with a variety of games available & a high rollers table! Live DJs. Also for those who need either a friend to lean on or more touchy services available.

name: Reverie Restaurant & Lounge
description: A full-time in-character roleplay venue featuring a classy restaurant and lounge, often featuring live bardic music and boasting a large bar, loft seating and cushioned booths. We offer a variety of food and drink, and have private rooms available for large parties. Despite the atmosphere, prices and food are all reasonably-priced! (RP gil only)

name: The Cat's Meow
description: A small cafe where the food is made with love! We offer a place to RP for anyone of any skill level.

name: The Phoenix Flame Tavern
description: The Phoenix Flame Tavern is a warm, relaxing tavern nestled next to the bathhouses of Empyreum. Come inside and sit by the warm fire or take a spot at the bar. With our unique drink menu and comfort food you're sure to feel relaxed and right at home!

name: Le Chat Noir
description: Le Chat Noir is a member's only BDSM lounge and social club. The lounge features heavy RP, a bar to tend your thirsts, as well as staff to sate your other desires. If you are a kinkster or BDSM enthusiast, you've found your home away from home. With munches, public play parties, private scenes, even aftercare, we strive to bring you the feel of a real kink group in FFXIV. If this sounds like the safe haven you've been looking for, apply for membership today! Curious if we're the right fit for you? Come visit us on one of our open house nights when we are open to the public!

name: Tentacle Lounge
description: Tentacle Lounge is a lounge-meets-love hotel on Aether|Jenova. Your favorite new Degen hang out complete with fixed-rate Courts, Tarot reading, Gamba, Immersive RP services, Giveaways, Live DJs, and Raffles.

name: ILLUSION
description: ILLUSION is an 18+ venue who's core principles are to protect and uplift both the LGBTQIA+ and the BIPOC communities. We provide live dj's, a gambling experience, adult roleplay services, and an atmosphere where people feel welcomed with open arms.

name: Café Echo's Respite
description: A simple cafe with cozy and chill vibes. We sell food, drinks, and pastries for anyone who wants to take a break and relax from their daily life.

name: Serai's Shelves
description: A bookstore carrying a little bit of everything, from Academic texts, tomes, & escoterica to Fiction and flights of fancy from adventure to romance.

name: Flora and Fana
description: Greetings and welcome to the Flora & Fana Cafe. Glad to have you with us! Please feel free to take your ease in our lovely hot tub, sit with friends and grab a bite, play Triple triad, or even perform on our open stage. Enjoy your stay!

name: By the Riverbend
description: A tea parlor and souvenir shop that features roleplay-friendly artparties, themed nights, and live bard performances. We offer an interactive souvenir system unique to By the Riverbend, and table service or kitchen counter interactions.

name: The Oblivion Chapel
description: The Oblivion Chapel is an all inclusive sanctuary which caters to those who seek a peaceful respite from the madness of a chaotic realm. Soothe your soul in either a baptism of light or darkness and discover inner peace balance of the two forces. We welcome roleplayers or those who wish to take photos for glamour. All are welcome in the Oblivion Chapel, with Breaker Copius as the leading minister.

name: Rolanberry Den
description: It is a small cafe where all ingredients are either made or gathered by the owner Nicole Phonhra. We have a nice fireplace for you to sit by and each table can hold up to four so bring your friends.

name: Ichi Nightclub
description: Pulling inspiration from the high end Vegas nightclubs, Ichi strives to be a classy, yet chill place where people from all over can get together in a friendly, inclusive atmosphere.
Whether you're looking for a night of partying on the dance floor, or for an evening of relaxing while you listen, drink, and vibe, you will find what you're looking for at Ichi!

name: Mandragore Café | Bar | Concert Hall
description: Mandragore is a café, bar and concert hall. This is where the magic happens, see for yourself...NSFW/DEGEN friendly +18

name: The Addendum
description: The Addendum, Library of Antiquity- offers knowledge and expertise lost to time. From Magics to fictions, recipes and otherwise, The Addendum stores them upon their shelves for those seeking to further themselves. Step inside, have a look around...though mind the books, some bite.

name: Zenith
description: Welcome to Zenith Nightclub, the ultimate Friday night destination for party-goers! Our exclusive events offer an unbeatable combination of live music, high-stakes gambling,  dancers, and an exceptional selection of drinks at our fully stocked bar.  Don't miss out on the fun - come and join the party!

name: Steel Rose
description: You never know what to expect each week for the Deepest Club on Crystal. Just know everytime is insane from the music, atmosphere, to our dancers, we bring it all and throw it at your face! One night with us and you'll be left counting down the days till STEEL ROSE is back at it again.

name: DV8
description: An upscale, dark, and sexy club for everyone. Queer owned and Operated with the goal of uniting our community - even if just for a few hours once a week. We strive to bring you a...pleasurable experience - pun intended. We leave our problems at the door and ask you do the same and come see what mysteries and fantasies await you within our walls, and behind our many doors. Deviate from the usual path you've trekked via Party Finder and you'll find yourself at DV8

name: Klub Kush
