description: Klub Kush is the place to vibe and thrive on a Monday night! Klub Kush is a family owned club run by siblings Yazmin, Yuyu, and their brother Zanthar. We are a fun RP club that offers a full service bar complete with drinks and kush! We are excited to welcome you to our family as we dance the Monday blues away.

name: Delfina Maid/Butler Cafe
description: Have a Sweet treat with your own maid and enjoy cute fun maid dance shows!

name: Paradise City
description: 🎕Welcome to The Paradise City! 🎕
If you like to party to some great music in a club where day and night meet, you're just right here. Our venue will greet you with a rusty rough ambience touched by the floral beauty of roses.
›You can find us on Raiden, Light, Lavender beds, Ward 10 - Plot 33. ‹
Paradise City is an 18+ rock and metal styled nightclub that will show you the raw power of our charming roses, our talented cocktail slashers and a welcoming atmosphere in the middle of Gridania.
☆All of us will let you dive into a world of a reckless life, even if it's just for one night. ☆

name: Heartlily Lounge
description: Heartlily Lounge is a speakeasy-styled lounge. We're a LGBTQ+ friendly SFW venue, and work to create a welcoming and comforting environment for all. If you're looking to relax, roleplay, or just spend time to yourself with some excellent music, come join us for the evening with a cold drink.

name: Nymph's Springs
description: The Nymph's Springs is a garden/cave like Bath-house/Brothel type venue that is located on Diabolos. Come join us for a night of relaxation and passion with a nice warm drink that will warm you up as it slides down your tongue as you relax in one of our many hot-tubs!! We also also offer services of the more intimate kind here as well.

name: The Crimson Door
description: Hushed voices speak of a hidden place nestled away in the back alley of a theatre, where one can indulge their most hedonistic fantasies…
The Crimson Door is a sanctuary for art and intoxication of all kinds. Luxurious, indulgent pleasures one can lose themselves in. Come experience it for yourself…

At the Crimson Door we offer more than erotic RP booking services. Instead, the focus is on building connections between characters and bringing people together. We offer a heavy RP, immersive experience in a LGBT+ friendly environment.

name: Carbuncle Cottage
description: An enchanting carbuncle themed cafe. Relaxing atmosphere with live music.
Interact with our adorable carbuncles while enjoying yummy treats.

name: Honey Honey
description: "Maids with Extra Spice"

name: Inveritas. A place far and near.
description: We all have our perspectives caused by different backgrounds, environments, and events in our life. Inveritas, so the "The untruth" or "the lying things" symbolize a place where the "truth" is nothing than a lie to the another. A Tavern for adventurers for their stories to tell, sit down, relax, and show their perspective. As truth is subjective, so is home. So come and feel at home on this long life journey.

name: The Britannia
description: A British pub hidden away in the heart of Faerie. The Britannia is made by Brits, run by Brits and is for Everyone. Come enjoy some classic pub food and drinks along side pleasant company and live music, we have an open stage for bards along with pleasant staff to chat with.

name: VA-11 HALL-A
description: CYBER PUNK themed venue with nsfw and sfw services bringing you cyber themed drinks EDM, trance and night core and metal all in one place, hosted by the Yagami’s every Saturday!

name: Luminous
description: Bright lights, flashy glams, and bouncing music! With a wide variety of live DJs and in-venue events, Luminous is a premier venue in the night life of Eorzea. Shine on you crazy diamond!

name: SideArm
description: A Soldiers hang out, A bounty hunters waystation from mark to mark and A brawlers get away from the normal everyday life that only wants them to bleed. A place for Brother an sisters at arms to come and rest. To have a drink and maybe throw a punch or two.

name: Story Circle
description: Request a hot chocolate, grab a plushie, and find your comfortable spot. Relax as Eorzea's wordsmiths weave astonishing tales to thrill and amaze you.

name: Quinntessential Cafe
description: A cute Miqo owned cafe in the Mist, come on by and have a cup of tea!

name: Duskrose Hotel
description: Duskrose Hotel is a themed classic-style luxury hotel. We strive for an atmosphere that's comforting and relaxing to either wind down for the night, or spend time with others in a calm environment. Listen to talented bards on our open stage, relax in our buffet, library and bar, or spend some quality time in one of our three themed rooms! (Mostly SFW but NSFW allowed)

name: Lizzur Lounge Nightclub
description: The Lizzur Lounge Nightclub is one part of a double venue dedicated to providing an outlet for the late-night club goers! We're located in the heart of the Mist - and looking to serve you the night of your life.
We've got a fully stocked bar and lovely staff dedicated to making your time at the Lounge a night to remember. Upon entering, the door to the basement will be down the hall and to your left.
SFW Staff: LFP Symbol
NSFW Staff: LFM Symbol
+ Drinks provided by our lovely bartender!
+ Now featuring a live Twitch stream! Tune in during venue hours for some EDM!
+ LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: The Fungeon
description: 18+ NSFW Goth style dance club with cages, a coffin, dancers, courts, a bar, hot tubs, semi-private rooms, and a dance floor

name: Lucky Namazu Casino
description: __**Blackjack tournament!**__
Buy In: 2 million + 500k entry fee.
Prize: 90% of total buy-ins!
* Venue receives 10% rake on total prize pool and entry fees.
** Max of 15 participants
Rules:
-Players will be given 100 'chips', these will be the only accepted betting currency during the event.
-The cost per hand will start at 2 chip and increase by 2 per hand!
-Tables will reset every so often to the minimum bet at the highest rate table.
-Leaving the venue will result in a forfeit, if you should DC a staff will be outside to ensure you re-enter once logged in again
-Players who bust may remain in venue to watch, or gamble gil at a designated table.
Don't want to join the tournament? Play at a normal table instead with 25k-1m bet limits!

name: Emerald Lynx
description: We offer Maid service and barding music during the Lounge openings.
For clubbing we offer exotic dancer, awesome music with live Dj's, good drinks and also a gambler corner with Blackjack

name: Temple (Toriigatan)
description: Temple is the flagship venue of the venerated Toriigatan empire. Every week we bring you one of our resident DJ's, a beloved Hatamoto, to help you close out the weekend with strength, spirit, wit and heart! The name Toriigatan was chosen for our family, because it means "three-pillar gate". Of the original three pillars, Steel Rose represents our strength, Oni our spirit, and Temple our mind. Our fourth pillar, Ichi, is our heart.

name: For Pet's Sake Café
description: Our venue is a minion- friendly adoption center and café. We have lots of minions looking for their fur-ever home... Will it be your home? Just ask one of our staff behind the counter for a pamphlet and check out our selection of available friends to adopt!

It is important to us that everyone feels welcome and accepted for who they are at our venue. We have zero tolerance for hateful and/or inappropriate behavior. Common sense and Final Fantasy XIV TOS apply. While in our venue, content is SFW.

All food and drink transactions are in-character and do not require out-of-character gil payment, though we do greatly appreciate tips. Adoption fees are in-character and require gil. This gil goes towards more minions and staff salaries.
We're open every 2nd and 4th Saturday of the month from 9pm-1am EST! Hope to see ya there!

name: The Eiderdown
description: Established by a sharlayan noble's daughter during her travails and search for more knowledge, where the stresses of individual reality melt away and decisions hang in suspension before they are made.

The Eiderdown is a quaint coffeehouse with a coziness that strays from the concept of time, set in the heart of ishgard's residential district. Whether you're here to acquire the latest news and rumors, sharing your tales over coffee, or creating new friendships The Eiderdown has seen patrons and travellers seeking calm from the toils of daily life, and a hearth for those seeking warmth in the blistering cold of Coerthas.
With comfortable sofa booths and loft seating, so long as you are here with a respectful attitude, rest back and put up your feet —we'll turn the kettle on just for you.
Perhaps you'll even catch some rumors. and if you've enjoyed your stay, we hope to see you again!

name: Arwiras' Bar & Lounge
description: Come have a refreshing drink at our bar or relax with your friends in our exclusive Lounge, open 24/7!

name: The Anti
description: Welcome lovelies to Aether’s Exclusive Dueling Ring and Lounge!

The Anti Guild is an authentic roleplay-encouraged adventurer guild-like lounge filled with quality interactions and libations. Our charming staff and atmosphere will have you entertained deep into the night with a wide selection of activities.

Try your hand at our dueling ring and work off some steam— if only just to flex those muscles! Perhaps try your luck at one of our raffles, enjoy the melodies from our live bard and musical guests, or have one of our delectable escorts keep you company for the evening.
If chatting is not to your liking, anyone is welcome to simply kick back and enjoy the night in our carefully planned out layout.
The choice is yours at The Anti.

name: ALC: Amity Lounge and Casino
description: __**ALC: Amity Lounge and Casino**__
**Owner**
> Solani Vale (Adira Isha)
**Address**
> Aether, Jenova, Lavender Beds
> Ward 24 Plot 52, Wildflower Stalls Subdivision
**Open Hours**
> Lounge: Sundays 11 AM to 2 PM CST.
> Casino: Mondays 8 PM to 11 PM CST.
**About**

> Amity Lounge is located in the quiet neighborhood of Jenova's Lavender Beds. Within the ETERNAL Free Company home you'll find the Lounge, your new favorite spot for live music featuring weekly performances from our resident bards, Lora and the Sappy bards. Downstairs, you'll find our Casino where you can gamble, spend time with friends, and jam out with our visiting Twitch DJ's!
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/hNqqeE3Jaj
Visit our Website: https://alc.crd.co

name: Club Phoenix
description: Club Phoenix is actually split into two clubs. First is Club Phoenix: Risen, which is upstairs at our venue, and will feature mostly EDM and club hits kind of music. Then there's Club Phoenix: Inferno, which sits in the basement of Club Phoenix, and features heavier, harder music, mostly metal. We switch between the two clubs week to week, with one week being a Risen week, and the next being an Inferno night, etc. Each club features a fully stocked bar, with great bartenders who will RP with guests and serve drinks, and raised seating that is situated above the dance floor, for those who want to just relax and listen to the great tunes.

name: Velius Club
description: A new and diverse Aquarium-themed Nightclub featuring Dancers, Bartenders, Hosts, and more! We strive to give our members an experience to remember. Whether you're looking for some private sessions with our Dancers, or to socialize with our Hosts, we'll make sure it's a night that you'll never forget.

name: Eorzean Coven bar
description: Relaxing environment/club

name: The Underworld
description: ***"Getting there is the easy part - all you have to do is step through the door. Getting back... that takes work."***

*It doesn't matter where you are - denizen of the First, the Fourth, the Source, or another world altogether - rumors persist of a place where any vice can be indulged, any wish fulfilled... for a price. The methods of finding it differ from place to place - from one age to the next - but the path can always be found.*

The Underworld is a post-Endwalker 18+ RP Venue blending style, vice, and sophistication at a speakeasy in the ultimate liminal space - what's left of the realms that once saw to the care of the dead.  We welcome both OC and NPC RPers alike, and are excited to provide a space where everyone's characters can interact with each other no matter how different their own personal worlds happen to be.

name: The Treehouse Theatre
description: In the cold climes of Ishgard lies a little patch of green. Inside you will find a grand treehouse from which you may relax while chatting with friends and listening to music.

name: The Flower's Petal
description: We have comfortable drinks, hot and cold, even some alcoholic ones! We offer belly filling pastries and snacks, on top of that we have Spa Rooms open to rent! Come down to our evening cafe and enjoy a quiet atmosphere with wonderful music.

name: The Underdark
description: SFW Tavern and Sauna with an Open stage and a Dark Ambient Atmosphere. AFK Friendly, Stay as long as you'd like.
Meals and Readings do not have a set price and are offered to be paid as you wish.
All foods are sourced locally and prepared by hand in front of you.

name: Candy Cane Lane Bakery
description: We are a bakery that makes delicious and yummy food. We are located in the goblet in a yummy and cute gingerbread house. Haurchefant will meet you at the gate to welcome you and our maids will feed you and have amazing conversations. We welcome all adventures to our humble little bakery.

name: Café Earl Gray
description: Café Earl Gray is an immersive RP venue for both new and experienced roleplayers alike, as well as a place to relax and chill with an open bard stage! A cafe with plenty of Ishgardian influence in decor, guests can expect HQ drinks and food (made by Earl Gray), conversation, and a warm space to relax. Additional info: 18+, SFW, LGBTQ+ owned. Some adult topics are fine to discuss, but please keep any explicit NSFW activities in private tells or party chat.AFKers welcome.

name: The Cherry Blossom
description: The Cherry Blossom is Chaos's finest adult nightclub and hotspot for 18+ entertainment.
We offer a wide selection of NSFW talent as well as drinks, chill vibes, and some of the most unique gambling on Chaos!
Come on by and say hello, we promise you'll love it!

name: Skalds Hall
description: A Norse / Viking themed Hall. Our goal is to bring a place for Travelers to come relax and unwind. Come tell us a story and drink until the gods call you home.

name: Fat Friend Cafe
description: Eorzea's finest fat cat themed cafe | Come chill with our fat cats, in house bards, maids and butlers and even potentially borrow them for some content!

name: Sirens' Aquapolis
description: A relaxing aquatic-themed venue focused on gambling & dancing in a magical aquatic setting! Our house DJ, photographer, game master and sirens will sure provide you with entertainment for the entire night! Grab our fantastically themed drinks to start the night off and see where the waves take you...
Here upon the waves’ break, happy hear and joy we make.
With glistening treasure of gold, all manner of stories are told.
In our tender song you’ll stay, all night like long to eb and sway.
Surrounded in splendor so marvelous, keep desire alive in our Sirens’ Aquapolis

name: Yiazmat's Casino
description: Yiazmat's Casino has gamba drinks, fully stocked bar and constantly adding new gambling games. We have DJs every time we open and occasionally do auctions! It's a dragon themed venue but it's subtle! We have escorts to sit on your lap and give you that luck! Come by, have a drink, play a few games. All at Yiazmat's Casino!

name: The Officer's Lounge
description: Welcome to ye who venture cross the seas. The Officer's Lounge is a Maelstrom funded izakaya run by the former crew of The Treasure Cruise and their associates. What is an izakaya? We operate as a late night bar with snacks and cheap filling dishes to go along side our drinks.
Come on in and enjoy the libations!

name: Solstice Lounge
description: Solstice Lounge was created with music as our main priority. We believe that music creates the right environment. Our DJ’s are extraordinary people, who fell in love with music, creating a distinctive ambience and unique feelings. Generally we prefer smooth and fluid dance music like Deep House, Melodic Techno, Liquid DnB and Trance. The styles can change, but the general direction of our club will remain the same - Chill Vibes all around.

name: The Blood Pearl
description: An RP Pirate Bar/Club, 18+, NSFW, LGBTQ+ All inclusive and open to all. An FC house designed from the ground up to encourage whatever you wanna get up to. Our motto is "Come Get In Trouble!" We at The Blood Pearl want to welcome RPers of all expierences to come and have fun in a place where you needn't worry about having gil to afford anything.

name: Grimm King's
description: For a night of upper class taste with fresh food and drinks we invite you to experience all the Grimm King's Hollow has to offer, if your tastes are more of the flesh variety our lovely courtesans will fulfill your desires.

name: The Nexus
description: The Nexus. A seldomly heard word that's literal definition is a connection. A link. The Nexus is the bond between people, between our community, between Eorzea. The Nexus is only as strong as those people who nurture its strength, its power. We do this every day without realizing it. Spending time with our friends and loved ones, going that extra mile to put a smile on somebody’s face, or even just simply cracking a joke. The Nexus is the connection that has brought people together for generations and will continue to do so for generations to come.

The Nexus between our community, within Eorzea has been manifested. This sanctuary to those who are looking to nurture its strength and grow that bond between each other to create a closer community, a closer Eorzea. Here in this Abode, friendships will become stronger, relationships will become more stable, and our community will once again show why it is the greatest in all the lands.

name: Miqo'fe Cafe
description: Miqo'fé is an LGBT+ owned café run by a tight knit staff. Our goal is to provide a comfortable, chill atmosphere for anyone to come in and hangout with some warm food and drinks.

name: Siren's Lament
description: The Siren’s Lament is an 18+ nightclub of the vibrant Eorzean underground. We host regular parties and foster a place for us to forget our troubles. We are a safe haven for the rejected, for demi-humans, and for the monstrous. Come dance with us in the fountain of desires and partake in the forbidden. This is a neutral ground for all of the strange and wonderful critters of Eorzea. All are welcome in the Lament and we are a safe place to celebrate the beauty of difference.

name: Trionfi
description: Eorzeans look for a solace. Their own little spot in the corner of the world to just get away from it all. Sometimes a regular club just won't do it for them. Some folk need a bit more intimacy. That's what Trionfi is for. With a cozy atmosphere, the jazz lounge and bar is one of the few spaces in Eorzea where one can vent to a stranger, relax a bit and chill out with close friends in a smaller setting.

name: The Kitty (Cafe and Lounge)
description: The Kitty Cafe and Lounge is a SFW venue located in the heart of the Mist on Jenova.  Sporting a cozy cafe upstairs, with fine dining and a water garden downstairs, our establishment offers cuisine, commodore and conversation!

The owners Sava and Azerith met one fateful day outside of Sava's Apt building in Shiro.  As it turns out, we were neighbors!  We kept bumping into each other, and became friends.  Sava had dreams of owning a cafe, and when she told Azerith this, on a whim Azerith said "Well, why don't we start one together?"  Thus began this fun little project!

name: Ambrosia
description: Welcome to Ambrosia, your new favorite nightclub, gambling, and special time hotspot. Located on the beautiful beaches of Shirogane, the club welcomes you and your friends to spend the night with us as you watch the sunset

name: The Nest
description: The Nest is a long running venue that is part Tavern, part Bordello, and part Adventurer's Guild! We have a full bar, live music, tarot readings, courtesans, and you can even rent out the venue for an event!

name: Crossroads Conversations
description: When you're lost and don't know where to turn next, you arrive at the Crossroads.  Take your time to rest your feet, have a bite to eat, and enjoy in the fellow company of travelers.   Find a friend and then pick up where you left off, ready to discover where you're meant to explore next.

This diner is designed for the first time RP'ers. Engaging you in 60-90 minute immersive RP dinner parties encouraging character development, introducing new people, and building friendships before discovering new venues to experience!

name: Bar Minstrel
description: Inspired by the Tokyo bar scene, this small but ambient back alley venue is sure to delight couples, wanderers, and bar-crawlers! Our drinks are inspired from izakayas from Omoide Yokochō, Roppongi, and Shinjuku. We boast one of the few Lalafell accessible bars in Jenova so you'll find yourself delighting in appropriately sized furnishings!

name: The Painted Rose
description: The Painted Rose is an Alice in Wonderland themed brothel! We invite you to celebrate your night and week with us and enjoy a range of fun and wonky little cocktails! Not to mention the wonderful host of company our courtesans may provide for you!

name: Affluence
description: Tell me, have you been to Affluence? The fabled golden bungirls? The sacred Viera of the luxury club scene? Do you know aught of its present state of affairs? ...I thought not. Even of your little Eorzea, you know precious little. All of which is to say: expand your horizons. Go forth and seek discovery. As the bearer of Azem's crystal, you may consider your duty to see at least that much.

name: Golden Age
description: Escape from the drama of daily life, and immerse yourself in a golden age of luxury. Enjoy the thrill of gambling in our dealer room, or explore our legendary club downstairs. Golden Age offers a wide variety of services for the discerning patron.

name: The Golden Kettle
description: Come relax at the Golden Kettle and enjoy teas from all over Hydaelyn!

name: SubZero
description: SubZero is Zero Management's latest venue and Crystal's premier Hip Hop venue.

name: The Cozy Treehouse
description: We are a cozy little library cafe now located in Shiro! We welcome you to come curl up with a book, do a puzzle, or just relax with a cup of tea and a snack!

name: Violet's Repose Lounge
description: Violet's Repose is a late night lounge open every Friday night from 6:00 to 9:00 P.M PST. Our primary goal is to forge strong RP connections and we are therefore a RP heavy venue, however, we are always happy to welcome people of all skill levels and help people develop their characters and their story. We offer barded music, drinks, food and from time to time hold special events.

name: Lieu
description: A holiday venue with birthday and wedding packages on aether faerie

name: Fairy Cove
description: A cozy little cove for all, with Fantasy music! https://www.twitch.tv/lexialune

name: MAIDens-of-Eorzea Cafe
description: A SFW venue for all Eorzeans, we offer private dining courses with our precious maids! Come unwind with us in our garden-style venue; we offer many amenities, not just a cafe! Sit down with a maid, order a drink at the bar, visit our bakery, play a round of games if you're feeling lucky, or join us for a polaroid!

name: Serenity Lounge & Bathhouse
description: Looking to enjoy a relaxing evening by yourself, with friends or your special someone? We've got you covered! Our Lounge features a full bar and dining experience often with streamed music. Our connected Bathhouse features 7 public and 2 private baths to enjoy a relaxing soak in. We also have inn rooms that you can rent if you'd like a private evening.  Services like tarot readings and photography also available.  We've got a little of everything for everyone and are RP friendly.
Our schedule varies, but we mostly open alternating Sundays and Mondays (see our discord for official opening announcements). We offer an open stage to any bards.

name: Pogazu Pizza
description: Pogazu is the most unhinged (and longest running) pizza-related venue on Aether. Casual? pizza atmosphere where you can order quite literally anything on a pizza! Just don't ask for Namazu. The staff may serve you with a smile one moment, then threaten you with a flamethrower the next. It's the venue where everything's made up and the points don't matter!

name: Club Ley Lines
description: We're here to have fun through dancing, drinks, and gambling! Our vibe harkens back to the 80's in Miami when the club scene was king! Enjoy a care-free night with us hanging with friends or looking to meet someone special!

name: Curated Cozy Museum & Café
description: Curated Cozy aims to provide a relaxing environment to those looking to decompress after a long week or a night of clubbing amongst Eorzean's diverse social topography. Nestled amongst the swirling flurries of The Foundation's Empyreum, our museum is open 24/7 for anyone to visit, while the café opens late Friday night with bard performances and full kitchen service.  All are welcome to come explore and relax in our softly lit halls.

name: The Dungeon
description: {18+}Welcome to The Dungeon! Please make yourself comfy wherever you like! Relax, dance, or soak. As well as Open Stage for Barding!

name: The Rainbow Room
description: The Rainbow Room is the friendly neighborhood bar with a rainbow twist! We are an inclusive, immersive role play venue which offers our patrons light-hearted role play and a variety of different entertainments. Tavern Nights the first Sunday, Club Nights the second and fourth Sundays, and On Stage Nights on the third Sunday feature a range of different levels of role play immersion and styles. We do not offer adult entertainment. Our dancers are here to have fun and bring a smile to everyone's faces! Be sure to join us on raffle or contest nights for some fun prizes! And don't be shy about getting up and dancing on Club Nights! You could be captured on camera!

name: Narnes & Boble
description: A cozy, immersive bookstore and cafe.

name: Horizon
description: Ahoy! Welcome to our luxury yacht: Horizon! We're open every Wednesday and have a variety of DJ's who play different genres of music. Experience clubbing on a yacht, enjoy our themed drinks drinks, try your luck at gambling or even get your picture taken by one of our amazing crew members! Our yacht is prepared to sail the horizon with you on any occasion.

name: The KAY
description: Enjoy your stay at The Kay! Sit back, relax and grab some snacks,, because we're here for a fun time, not a long time. Here to please your ears with gentle and kind conversation. (Brashness may apply)

name: The Breakroom
description: Proudly sponsored by Garlond Ironworks. After a long day of adventuring, you deserve to take a break and kick your feet up. Look no further than the Breakroom. We offer a place to kick back and relax, have a hot home-cooked meal, and let the weight of the world fall off your shoulders. Open stage and AFK friendly!

name: Parea Nightclub
description: Welcome to the Parea Nightclub! Free Company by day & club by night!
What exactly is "Parea"?
Parea in Greek culture is a group of friends who regularly gather together to share their experiences about life, their philosophies, values & ideas.
We hope to provide you & your friends a place to unwind & just enjoy the night while even possibly making new friends!

name: Celestial Alehouse
description: We are an adult RP tavern that has ancient greek gods/goddesses as a theme. We offer a wider variety of food, drink and rp services.

name: Dark Crimson Tavern
description: A gritty underground fighting pit and tavern serving excellent drinks, as well as putting on extremely entertaining fights!

name: Wayward Mystic
description: A SFW light RP venue tucked away in the Lavender Beds. Players new and old are welcome to join us for a night of drinks, dining, music & more!

name: Elysian
description: Hello welcome to "Elysian" We are mostly a sfw cafe type venue but anyway come on over to hangout,chill & make friends. We're at Midgardsormr Goblet Ward 15/Plot 13 Hope you enjoy your stay at Elysian!^^

name: Cenote Wyvern
description: Cenote Wyvern is an SFW RP and social venue/community focused on encouraging genuine connections between players and/or characters. At are venue we offer a free bar, a wide variety of music between our Lofi bot, house bot, and house DJ, and we have community specialists always looking to engage with our guests to ensure they have the best social experience and encourage them to escape their comfort zone and interact with another guest. For all intents and purposes, we are a non-profit venue outside of our small-scale gambling options for RP in amounts no greater than 50k. We do NOT do Raffles, Giveaways, or large-scale gambling, as we believe these opportunities detract from social experiences between guests.

name: Warm Hearth Tea
description: Warm Hearth Tea is the place where great cooking and fantastic vibes meet. Our food is nutritious, delicious, and affordable, and is always accompanied by great music. We welcome adventurers young and old. Try it yourself— stop by today!

name: Elysium
description: We are an 18+ LGBTQ+ Friendly Gamba Bar and Club, offering a wonderful array of tasty drinks, excellent company if your up for it, along with of course our gamba and Auctions.

name: Solace Cafe
description: Our elegant, and modern apartment reprieve invites guests into a relaxing environment with open seating, and adequate sectioning for individuals, couples, and groups. Our menu is always complimentary and our staff happy to be of service.

name: Vampire’s Lair
description: Hello and welcome to the Vampires Lair! Are you looking for somewhere to relax, drink, listen to music, or perhaps meet a vampire? You’ve come to the right place! We have drinks from the fires of hell to the lovely kiss of a vampire. Or perhaps you’d like to rest in the VIP loft with a nice hottub just talk to me or my lovely assistant Seikka. So come and stay for bite❤️

name: Echo's End Arena
description: Every Friday night starting at 8:00pm Eastern, fighters gather at Echo's End Arena to test their might and magic and win the hearts of the crowd. Entry into the fights is open to the public and sign-ups are first come, first serve.

These spectacles have no limitations, encouraging shows of impressive prowess within the arena ring, which has been fitted with a dampening field to prevent damage to the facility or audience. Echo's End seeks to provide comfortable seating and an entertaining show for its guests.

Each session culminates in a prize fight against one of the house champions, with the audience selecting their own champion from the night's volunteer fighters. Winning against a house champion awards a gil reward of 100k gil and their name on our hall of heroes.

name: The Bubbly Garden Maid Cafe
description: [RP-nonRP welcome]. Sfw bubbly garden cafe is heartwarming and welcoming, with a relaxing and comforting vibe, if you simply wish to rp, relax, or afk, we would be happy to welcome our services to you

name: Forgotten Paradise
description: A cocktail lounge located in the Mist, that provides a calming atmosphere, a chatty bartender, and amazing bardic performances to all of it's guests.

name: Club Tormenta
description: Come party where the storm ⛈️ is at follow the sound of thunder! Majorly open Sundays at 9pm Est special days announced on discord.

name: Kanmiya Hibana
description: Please enjoy this quaint sweets bar and don’t be afraid to talk story with everyone. All shapes and sizes are welcome, even spirit and yokai! Drop by for a drink, laugh, and relax and enjoy our homemade Eastern sweets and assortment of tea and alcohol!

name: Pink Miqo
description: A nightclub featuring live music, 100/0 auctions, Glam contests, and giveaways!

name: Spice & Miqo'te - Tavern & Bath House
description: A relaxed and warm Tavern for travelers to come to rest their feet, share stories, and wet their throats. We provide tasty food, strong drink, and good company. We also offer public baths, and rooms to rest in if you're looking for a place to spend the night. Come share your tales of adventure, unwind from the day, and enjoy a relaxing night with us. Private rooms for groups, private baths, and private beds can be rented hourly.
Saturday Openings are generally smaller and have some kind of event linked to them, such as Gambling, Fight Club, Drinking Competitions, Cosplay Events, and so on.
This is a Gil-Free Establishment, as in none of the items cost any Gil to order, nor do any services. We just wanna RP!
We are very strict on NO PUBLIC ERP within the Baths, and conduct like that will result in bans from the venue.
18+ SFW Tavern/Bath House RP

name: The Hole
description: A completely normal dining experience.

name: “O” AfkCafe
description: Our cafe is located in  Crystal, Zalera, The Lavender Beds W22 P14.  It was created with the purpose of providing a place for people to wind down or relax at their leisure.  We serve a selection of food and drinks, all within a cafe/library atmosphere.

Our opening hours can be variable, but we’re usually open on the weekends with the earliest opening time starting at 7pm PST.  Even after our counter service has ended, or even if we’re not open on the weekdays, everyone is always more than welcome to visit and stay for as long as they like.
Our party finder is always advertised starting with the auto-translate symbol for a ⭕️ .

name: Enigma
description: Welcome to Enigma! Eorzea's happy shelter for night owls to gather and collaborate.
We open on Monday through Thursday from 10pm ST until last call*
*a last call is an announcement made shortly before the bar closes for the night.
Enjoy your stay and please follow the guidelines:

Enigma is considered a SFW bar, but everyone's sense of what is still considered SFW differs from person to person. So use your own judgement of that, but we also want everyone attending to feel comfortable. Should anything bother you, don't hesitate to message the staff and they will help where they can.

name: Ink and Sip
description: Ink and Sip is a book shop and cafe ran by the Elakha siblings from the Black Shroud. After rescuing countless tomes from the Great Gubal Library, the staff have found themselves overwhelmed with books of all sorts. They have decided to ply the public with good food, drinks and company as they try to offload the gods-blasted things onto their loving customers! Come check us out, all are welcome! (newbies and veterans alike!)

name: Carbuncle & The Frog
description: A long time ago deep in the beds made of lavender lived a tiny tiny frog. The frog had no friends and decided to make a friend, he found a book and from the book summoned a carbuncle friend! Carbuncle & the Frog, established in 2021 is a café and nightclub rolled into one large venue. Thursday our lounge is open for bards and patrons to talk relax and enjoy themselves. Friday nights we let loose and dance the night away with DJs lose it all from our gamba dealers or see what the future holds for you with our tarot carbuncle. Come for the music, Stay for the stories.

name: The Chicken's Roost
description: A cozy tavern run by a tiny chicken! We've got ales, ciders, meads, and loads of food to fill that empty belly of yours after even the busiest day of adventuring!
Guests can expect equal parts relaxation and silly shenanigans, all in a SFW environment. We're also super casual, so don't worry all that much about RP etiquette!

name: The Bel Canto Winery
description: [OPEN EVERY 2nd & 4TH SUNDAY] A refurbished opera house, turned winery. Playing host to formal & casual evenings alike, we are a low-stakes environment meant for a casual and comfortable social experience. ♪

name: The Hibiscus Ryokan
description: The Hibiscus is a immersive RP venue, themed around the culture and lore of the Othard continent, with a focus on the Azim Steppe and its many Xaela tribes.

name: The Stowaway Cafe
description: A chill cafe that aims to give clarity and sociability for all friends and venue goers. We offer an array of Coffee and Currys, for those who want a sweet blend of comforting foods.

name: Club Burzum Crypt
description: We are ready to see your darkest desires unchained, bound...flogged; whatever your preference.

name: Ethereal Nights
description: The best nightclub you'll ever visit! We have the hottest live music, friendly and interactive staff, the sexiest courtesans, stocked bar with a wide variety menu, and ViP service! Auctions every week and endless shenanigans make for the most fun you'll have at a venue!

name: Hero's Rest
description: We're a friendly venue with an RP focus in the heart of the Empyreum. Whether you're looking for a warm drink or pastry, a place to rest your weary bones, or simply to chat with other like-minded adventurers, the door is open to you! We got in-house artists, a storytelling bard, blackjack nights, and more!

name: MYSTIQUE
description: MYSTIQUE is a privately owned LGBTQ+ bathhouse and eatery dedicated to rejuvenate your mind, body and spirit.

name: Above/Beyond
description: Crystal ♥ Goblin ♥ Empyreum ♥️ Ward 20 ♥ Plot 37
Open Wednesday Nights 10pm EST - 2am EST

Above / Beyond is here to take your Wednesday nights to the next level. Come for some amazing live music Eorzea has to offer! While you're here ... join us in our community giveaways, play a few rounds at the tables, grab a drink with your friends at the bar, enjoy some time with our SFW dancers, check out our club photographers, relax in our spa, play some discord games with our family or maybe even find a date? The night is young and here, nothing is beyond your horizon.

name: The Twelve Teacups
description: The Twelve Teacups is a little old fashioned jewels in the picturesque neighbourhood of Empyreum, in Ishgard. Our goal is to let you make a travel back in time, letting our butlers take care of you as a true noble. We decorated our manor thinking at XIX century, adding a little personal touch. Our menu is rich, and we are sure that you will find something that you will like! But our pride are our butlers, trusted people chosen cause their goal is make you feel like royalty.

name: The Diamond Bar
description: The end of the road bar, lost souls looking for their last drinks.

name: Izakaya Ongaku
description: Izakaya Ongaku in Japanese translates "Japanese style bar Music". A unique venue where people can Role Play to their hearts content and Bards can shine on stage !! For more information and opening times join the discord and make sure to get notified once we are open 🫰.

name: Shinhra Cafeteria
description: THE SHINHRA CAFETERIA is based on the floor 64 of the Shinra Building from Final Fantasy 7 REMAKE. It has a small food court on the lower level and hosts occasionally characters based on FF7. It's an RP heavy space but welcomes all - even those not acquainted to FF7RE.

name: Infernal Tides
description: The waves whisper to you with their song; will you listen? A deep-sea and sunken ship themed nightclub with its fair share of lore, gorgeous sirens and dedicated staff, we aim to make your night unforgettable whether you are here to RP or enjoy the music.

name: Final Gambit
description: Located in an industrial incinerator, Crystal's most violent deathmatch arena is admitting participants for bombast and bloodshed once again! Leave your weapons and your magic at the door to fight for blood and glory, or stand aside and gamble on who's walking out of the bloodbath in one piece. There's no injury too bleak, and no hold too oppressive - the fight only ends when someone stops moving. Put everything on the line at Final Gambit - win big, or die trying. For all the intensity of the in-character setting, OOCly the venue's an incredibly comfortable location to spend an evening - the backdrop is violence, but half the fun is the chatter with the other guests and cheering over good or bad rolls.

name: Tea-A-Holic
description: Walk into a cozy bubble tea cafe and jump through the secret bookshelf portal to enter our hidden bar paradise! Sip your tea and relax or join us on the dance floor while listening to live Twitch DJs every other Saturday! Join our discord as well for our weekly raffles and giveaways! We hope to see you soon!

name: The Azure Oasis
description: The unrelenting Thanalan heat and fast paced Ul'dahn city life can wear down any adventurer whether they're local or from afar. Nestled on the rim of the Goblet, the Azure Oasis is a shining beacon to all who need a break and cool off a while. Our bar is stocked with our prized exotic waters from across the globe blended and brewed with equally as exotic herbs to give each drink a life and personality of it's own. Many local delicacies and a large selection of incense also graces our menu. If you're looking for a place to drift away and relax a while (aside from occasional staff hijinks) there's none better.

name: The Nocturnal Wonderland
description: Welcome to The Nocturnal Wonderland! A cybernetic dreamscape forged through the integration of ancient tech and futuristic advancements! Hold tight as you're transported to a world of neon lights, heart-pumping beats, and an overflowing fountain of inebriation!! We feature a DJ booth, a Bard Stage area, a large dance floor and an upstairs lounge area for those looking to calm down after a long night.

name: The Marble Rabbit
description: An 18+ bar with uniquely magical drinks to guarantee a good time.

name: Eikōri
description: A very… chill… place to hang out and grab some drinks, meet new people.

name: Bards & Brews Lounge
description: Bards and Brews is an SFW RP venue geared towards hosting and promoting the various bards and bard bands that grace Eorzea with their talents. Our stage is booked weekly with multiple performers for your enjoyment and relaxation, so stop by to hear the wonderful bards and show support for all their hard work while relaxing with a drink from our bar! If you are a bard and would like to perform, please speak with the proprietress for bookings.

name: Club Glo
description: A 90s inspired club with live DJ's and a unique bar menu. Come and party the night away with us!

name: The Hairy Beaver
description: The Hairy Beaver, a Tantalus Theatre Troupe experience, is a fun, campy, and inclusive venue for the citizens of Eorzea. Gaudy and a little bit naughty, The Beaver offers a wide selection of food and beverage options, as well as world-class entertainment and events.

name: The Wishing Well
description: *The sign on the door reads "open," but the inside is dim. Despite that, the faint scent of ale and the sound of clinking glasses makes its way into the entry, coming from... The bookcase? This merits investigation.*
The Wishing Well is an atmospheric tavern/lounge hidden in and under a Gridanian Curiosities shoppe. Stop in for food, drink, conversation, and relaxation. Maybe a little mischief?
We look forward to seeing you!

name: Eternal Beach Club
description: HOUSEPARTY ETERNAL BEACHCLUB AT SERAPH SHIROGANE WARD 2 PLOT 38!!!!!!!!! MY PARENTS NOT AT HOME BUT PLS DONT DESTROY ANYTHING OWO

name: Roses XIV
description: We welcome you to the comforts of botanicals and luxuries at Roses XIV. We aim to provide all that you need and more for an evening at our lounge. Bartenders, dancers, courtesans, tarot, blackjack entertainment... - and a secretary to help guide you, should you ever feel lost in the flurry of the moment.

name: Plushie's Tea Party Cafe
description: Welcome to the Plushies Domain: Tea Party Cafe! We have a variety of baked good and drinks such as Rolanberry cheesecake and Ishgardian Tea! All food items are gathered and crafted by hand

name: Energy (NRG) Club & Casino
description: Try your hand at one of our exhilarating games tables or head over to the dance floor and get energized with live Twitch DJ music! If that's not enough, try a refreshing drink from our attentive bartenders.
Just want to chill with some company? Relax in the trance of our mesmerizing Neon Nymphs!
Mingle with other V.I.P. Guests at the owner's table! All this and more inside the doors of ENERGY (NRG) CLUB AND CASINO!

name: Shadow's Repose
description: A small quiet venue for relaxing and a comforting ambience.

name: The Moogle's Paw Speakeasy
description: The Moogle's Paw Speakeasy appears to be an innocent flower shop on the outside, but the inside is rather... questionable. The interior of the building reveals itself to be a not-so-legal speakeasy that is run by Ian and his lackey, Valentine. TMP offers a bar, a mini free-for-use stage lovingly referred to as "The Dog House", and tarot readings. TMP encourages everyone to have fun and enjoy all kinds of music.

name: The Wallflower
description: A humble cafe run by its community, for its community, and only made possible through its community.

name: Tsukiakari Onsen
description: Tsukiakari Onsen is a Japanese-style bath house that was founded to create a sanctuary for sapphic women of all kinds to bathe, relax, socialize, find companionship, and do whatever else they might desire. [Male player characters are NOT allowed in the venue.]

name: Lohcho’s Lounge
description: Cozy tavern feel, friendly conversations and an open stage

notices.message: This venue is often open in the evenings (Eastern Time). Check Party Finder.

name: Eorzean aquarium
description: The Eorzean Aquarium is a not-for-profit institution dedicated to bringing the fish (and fish-like marine-dwellers) of Eorzea and beyond right to your backyard! We have every aquarium fish that has been released in the wild (as of patch 6.1) on display for your viewing edification, arranged in rooms by their native habitat. But wait, there's more(a)! Along with all of these amazing aquatic animals, we also have a lovely café, a gift shop, a touch tank, new exhibits coming all the time, and fun and exciting upcoming community events! You definitely don't want to miss out! Come sea us today!

name: Dark Divinity
description: ᴛᴏɴɪɢʜᴛ, ꜰʀɪᴅᴀʏ ꜱᴇᴘᴛᴇᴍʙᴇʀ 16ᴛʜ
ʙᴇɢɪɴɴɪɴɢ ᴀᴛ 9ᴘᴍ ᴇꜱᴛ, ᴛʜᴇ ʜᴏᴜꜱᴇ
ᴏꜰ ᴛʜᴇ ᴜɴʜᴏʟʏ ᴏᴘᴇɴꜱ ɪᴛ'ꜱ ᴅᴏᴏʀꜱ
ᴡɪᴛʜ ᴏᴜʀ ʜᴏᴜꜱᴇ ᴅᴊꜱ. ʏᴏᴜʀᴏɴᴇᴛʀᴜᴇᴋɪɴɢ,
ᴅᴊ ᴋᴀᴇɴ ᴀɴᴅ ᴛꜱᴜɢʀᴀ ʏᴀɴɢ!!!!!
ᴄᴏᴍᴇ ᴅᴀɴᴄᴇ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴀʀᴋɴᴇꜱꜱ ᴡɪᴛʜ
ᴜꜱ ᴀꜱ ᴡᴇ ᴄʟᴏꜱᴇ ᴏᴜᴛ ᴛʜᴇ ᴡᴇᴇᴋ!!

name: The Bronze Cask
description: Into the Glamorverse! Comic Book Glam Contest! Entry period ends at 7pm EST!

name: Club Bloom
description: Come Join us at Club Bloom! Adamantoise best Night Club! If your Heart desires it we can provide it!

name: Akai Yuwaku
description: Dark Themed Nightclub in Far Eastern Style with a Sensual Taste of Erotic. We're giving you a place to live out your darkest & deepest Desires. We're also offering you sensual Photosets from yourself or with your partner.

name: Roemance
description: This is a 18+ venue. Your one stop shop for drinks, dancing, and good vibes! We have an excellent bartender, a live open stage (come show us your Bardic knowledge), and wonderful dancers for you to ogle! Come let your worries out, and hang out with a diverse group of friends!

name: Octavium Concert Hall
description: A concert hall specializing in monthly themed performances from various games, anime or musical genres

name: Onion Knight's Tavern
description: Onion Knight themed Tavern. SFW RP Tavern with Open Stage for Bards. Show up with an Onion helm and eat for free! - Closed for Renovations -

name: Amethyst Ablaze
description: Need to take a load off from a long day of adventuring? Want the company of a cute dancer? Or do you want a fun place to dance the night away? Then come relax and vibe at a place that offers awesome music, wonderful dancers, great company and an overall fun time!

name: PLANET NOVA
description: I am Miss Romy, FC / Nightclub Owner of PLANET NOVA. We have the most stellar staff and they will fulfill any needs ! We also have the best Bartender! We have gposers who will also take pics of ppl for them. Our whole vibe is futuristic clean cut Space Age fun ! We provide Gamba drink with big munniesss if won. Our website is theplanetnova.carrd.co/

name: The Siren's Song
description: Allow our Sirens to cater to any and all needs, fantasies and lusts. We do it all, from the erotic to companionship, crafting and gathering assistance, and everything in between. Join us, and let my Sirens make your evening more delightful.

name: The Honeycomb
description: ♡Crystal's Bee-Themed 18+ Club♡ will be Open Monday Nights. Join us for a fun and LGBTQ+ friendly environment that welcomes RPers of all skill levels! Drinks! Live Music! Dance, meet new friends, have fun~! Sprouts, and Travelers Welcomed~

name: Chewy's Cafe
description: A little slice of heaven in a home! Your very own cat cafe without bounds!
RP welcome, safe space, and bring your fat cat minions!

name: Greenery Oasis
description: Forest-like feel to relax and recharge! Friendly conversations, AFK friendly, an an open stage to perform your favourite tunes or listen to others

name: Log Cabin Lounge
description: A quaint spot admist the blustering snows for any travel to find a moment of solace while they warm by the fire or enjoy a lovely meal.

name: Club ETRNL
description: https://club-etrnl.carrd.co/

name: MisFits
description: (づ￣ 3￣)づ 🎵 Venue for Outsiders, for those trying to fit in. We are a group of mixed race, mixed personalities into one venue, one team, We are MisFits.
Enjoy your Drinks and Food while soaked and listening to music... [Rp/non-Rp/AFK]
Instagram link: https://www.instagram.com/misfitsff14/

name: The Warden's Grace
description: Goldsmithing and Jewelry Shop, owned and operated by one Chee Angharad. Located in the heart of the Mist, The Warden’s Grace has a wide array of fine jewelry, tools and trinkets, magical focuses and other Goldsmithing services. Ask about Private Consultations, Special Commissions, and Repairs and Restorations!

name: The Sandsea Oasis
description: The bright, glaring sun beating down on your back; the sweat falling from your brow. You continue to walk until you feel the cooling presence of shade blotting out the offending star. Looking up you shake your head in disbelief, but worry not friend for this is no mirage.....
Welcome too the Sand Sea Oasis!

We offer fine spirits to quench your *thirst*, snacks if you get peckish, and various oils and additions for your bath and spa experience to relax your sore muscles. Take the time to enjoy yourself and leave the worries of adventuring, crafting, and working behind for a short while.

name: The Longstop
description: Welcome to the premiere brothel in Dynamis~ We have ladies and gents ready to make your evening magical! Not wanting to slip away to a private room just yet? Come relax and have some fun! We have live DJs, Blackjack, Bar, VIP, and a fun rp environment! We hope you come by and let us fulfill ALL of your dreams~

name: Plan B
description: The Morning After is Eorzea's first live-streamed variety show with a live studio audience, featuring Swage, Djay Yams and Salty Biskit! Immediately after the show, head downstairs to Plan B night club, where we let the Moon Pie Promotions DJs run wild, bringing you an eclectic mix of incredible music each and every week!

name: Pupuya's Garden Cafe
description: The Garden Cafe is a place to gather with friends, loved ones, or even to come alone and have a chat with us!

name: The Eventide
description: The Eventide isn't anything. It's also everything. It's a tavern. It's a lounge. It's a bubble separate from reality and common sense. We have liquor in portals. We have coffee from the sky. Sometimes there's an alligator. We have fun, we don't ask questions and we embrace the absurd.

name: Lucifer's Angels
description: SFW/NSFW nightclub. DJ lady Oni, VIP, Drinks, & Dancers. We are just here for a good time and to make friendships along the way.

name: Club Gjallarhorn
description: We are a RP focused venue with a Norse metal club feel. Full bar gamba and nightly challenges to be had.

name: VOiD
description: we won't ask anything of you, so leave your home and come to ours. coupled with rhythmic beats or thrashing guitar, your cares will melt as you dance the night away with us. VOiD is an 18+, LGBTQ+, mental health & neurodivergency inclusive space for venue-goers & roleplayers alike.

name: The Crusades
description: The Crusades is not your usual dance/night club. It is a drive bar found at the end of an alley with low lighting and industrial construction. Here you will find metal, rock and sometimes dark country for its guests to promote other brands of music and give something different then the norm. We want to provide a immersive RP experience to our guests, giving this a social environment that friends can come together chat and dance, or meet new people and make friends.

name: The Melting Moon Inn & Cafe
description: "The warm evening winds are winding down, and the Moon melted under its heated waves. Beneath the moon sits a place of comfort and a place to set your worries aside."
- The Melting Moon inn is always open for those nightly souls seeking a hearty meal and a reassuring atmosphere

name: Rainbow Rave Room
description: Offering EDM in the Rave Room every Thursday! Nothing but good vibes, color poisoning and dancing the last of the week off!

name: Tsuki Bathhouse
description: A quiet bathhouse where you can escape the bustle of Kugane for a cup of tea or a warm bath.

name: Lux night club
description: Lux night club is a 18+ place has a lot to offer great place to roleplay we have dancers escorts great team and a lot of fun great place to visit

name: Phoenix Rising
description: From the ashes of the old, we rise anew! In a fiery blaze of glory, Phoenix Rising has burst from the embers of the past and has come to Seraph. A full service dance club and bar, with live DJ’s and enticing hosts and hostesses, come to Rising Phenix to experience an immersive and interactive RP experience!

name: Kodama
description: Third Try's award-winning FC house functions as a dance club & bar, rentable venue space, therapist office, and dentist if you're into that.
Our FC is a fun group of experienced and new players alike who enjoy the full range of content in FFXIV. There is something for everybody, and everybody is helpful!
And hot!

name: Fury's Fall
description: Nightclub featuring themed nights such as emo night, jazz night, with gambling, dancing, drinks and food

name: House of Seoul
description: ♥ Chill vibes, live bards and drinks a plenty. ♥
We are a music themed sfw venue focused on relaxation, chill vibes and good memories. Make yourselves at home!

name: The White Hare Art Cafe
description: The White Hare Art Cafe is a long existing cafe, bringing you an atmosphere and community unlike any other. Find yourself sitting in limsa all day? Perhaps your an artist and you want a cozy place to go and vibe out while you draw WoL's around you? Maybe you're someone who likes taking photo's and want to find more people to take photo's of, but not really sure how to approach people in a main city? Maybe you're even a Roleplayer and want to find a good social hub to go to in order to interact with the right crowd? TWH is a built community for all to enjoy, relax and be entertained by our amazing staff members! Whether you know how to RP or not- they will make you feel right at home.
We hope this establishment becomes a home to you just as it has for us. We provide the following services:
• Food and drinks - Provided by our waiters, bartenders and chefs
• Photography services - 50k for 5 photos!
• In house artists - Not taken upon request but if you’re there regularly, they will end up drawing you at some point!
• Live music provided by our bards
• Entertainment - weekly themes and giveaways...

name: Revelation
description: Revelation is a Nightclub base in the heart of the goblet.
Bringing the best trance music to a sunday night.
Sit back and relax with a few beers and shots, party away on the dancefloor, or enjoy the company of one of our lovely dancers. Whatever you desire, you are sure to find it at revelation

name: Dead Space
description: Dead Space offers an upscale clubbing and gambling experience with adult entertainment, live DJs, a busy bar, and experience courtesans for all tastes. We are LGBTQ+ friendly. Special events held regularly, so check the discord for what’s coming up!

name: The Blood Drop
description: Located in the depth of the Goblet's Districts, this Gothic Nightlife venue has a lot to offer. Come check us out if gothic style is to your liking. The Venues theme is Gothic/Demons and we will open hopefully every week atleast once a week!

name: Dragon's Spine Tavern
description: A SFW High Fantasy Tavern set within the deep woods of The Black Shroud that has a little something for everyone, such as gambling, Gpose services, or just a place to Roleplay. We also offer live unmodded bard performances as well as an open stage for anyone to take part in!

It is entirely safe for work as we offer no court services or anything beyond that. We wish to bring a safe space for people to roleplay at and be themselves in a scenario not often seen among other venues. We even offer raffles and sometimes invite regulars into roleplay campaigns.

name: The Wild Peony
description: The Wild Peony is an 18+ Thavnairian Themed Brothel Venue focused on good vibes! RP is encouraged, but not required. Let our staff keep you company in whatever way you like, or even hang out and afk! Come join us for giggles and debauchery, and maybe see someone die at the bar.

name: Shinkirou Cinema Café
description: This is a dine-in movie theater experience. Come enjoy a movie relax have some food.  Meet new people and experience new things. We are a SFW movie RP venue. Please be respectful of others when here, keep clothes on and if you want to ERP keep it to whispers or party chat

name: The Scrapyard
description: The Scrapyard is an in character 18+ immersive roleplay venue with a playful atmosphere centered around big event style cage match fights, betting, drinking at the bar, and purchasable roleplay services. Both dancers and fighters can be hired for their time in the back rooms, but otherwise it's free for all roleplay on the floor! Fighters who enter the cage are treated to custom introductions, help from the announcer and winners come home with fabulous mystery prizes. With some IC safety in place for fighters, it's a little less blood and guts here and a bit more professional wrestling in tone!

name: Secret Pixie Comedy Club
description: Secret Pixie Comedy Club is the home of Bad jokes, open mic nights, Speed dating, and cryptids. Join us Monday, Wednesday, and Sunday nights. You never know what you'll get !

name: The Hidden Oasis
description: The Hidden Oasis is a large bathhouse featuring a full bar and lounge! We aim to provide guests with a place to relax, unwind, vibe, and converse.

name: The Floral Fount
description: Nestled within the Twelveswood, the Floral Fount is a bath house and lounge with a focus on chill vibes. Soak in our baths, perform on our open stage, play Triple Triad in the lounge, or just hang out! Feel free to drop by any time, even when we're not open!

name: Crystal Academy of Musical Arts
description: The Crystal of Academy Musical Arts is a no-drama establishment intended as a place where bards/musicians/bands can relax, hangout, and share their musical passions with other fellow bards/musicians/bands and music lovers. Our regular events are also a place to showcase talent to any interested venue owners seeking to hire talent for their venue. We are also dedicated to teaching inspiring musicians and providing for the future for musical entertainment for venues. We offer 1 on 1 lessons, classrooms, and advise on unlocking the mysteries of the FFXIV performance system. We also help mediate venues finding a bard/band if such services are required.

name: High Spirits Bath & Lounge
description: High Spirits Bath & Lounge is a relaxing place to unwind at the end of a long day.  High Spirits features a wide variety of accommodations to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable time for all of our guests. Our lounge features amazing drinks and snacks, served up by our hostesses, Emma & Tala.

We feature large and comfortable seating arrangements, with several different environments to relax and chat with friends and other guests. High Spirits features live musical performances at the lounge.

Our spa facilities are some of the best in all of Eorzea. We feature a luxury changing room where you can shower and store your belonging and private spa rooms that can be rented on request. Please see a hostess for details.
We invite you to visit High Spirits and learn what makes us the perfect place to relax and unwind.

name: Platinum Rose
description: A cozy place tucked away into the corners of the Firmament, the Platinum Rose is a place for winning hearts, winning gil, or wining and dining.

name: Club Lucky Stars
description: Club Lucky Stars is a Regency themed club aimed to make you a Star! We offer various activities including themed parties, giveaways, blackjack, and lotteries! We also offer dancers, courts, and bartenders who will give you the best experience!

name: Fox Trot Tea and Bathhouse
description: A visit to Fox Trot Tea and Bathhouse will paw your troubles away with our high-quality tea and tubs filled with fresh waters right from the Steppe. Our menu features classic matcha green tea, and several specialty teas like The Vixen, Fox’s Respite, and Kitsune’s Kiss.

Here at our resort, the kitsune spirits are free to roam. They do enjoy playing harmless tricks on staff and customers, so keep your wits about you. There have been times when the spirits try to knock over tea that’s been prepared for the guests, or even try to steal from them! It's all in good fun though, and nothing is ever permanent.
Come in, enjoy your favorite cup of tea, relax and unwind for an experience unlike any other.

name: Odyssey
description: Here at Odyssey we support all of Eorzeas creative ventures and night owls. We do our best to provide as much as possible without alienating another group. What ever you enjoy let us be your entertainment and artistic hotspot. We, host a first class Bar & grill, Amazing Casino, the luxurious Stardust stage, and several private rooms.
Odyssey...
Your adventure begins here...
• Address: Crystal DC | Zalera | Mist | Ward 16 - Plot 02

name: The Elysian Springs
description: The Spa A venue for those looking to relax, rejuvenate, and above all, roleplay, Elysian Springs Spa is self-care socialization supreme... All without costing a single gil. All Elysian Springs Spa facilities are free of charge! All we ask in return is that you RP your heart out while visiting, and be sure to read through the Spa Rules. They're important! Baths The Spa's bread and butter -- relax in the steamy caress of our eight bubbling baths, complete with refreshments! Clothing is optional; comfort is compulsory. Sauna Seeking something more steamy? Crank up the cleanse in the closeness of our sauna, its own separate room with steam galore, located to the south-east of the Spa. Sitting Parlor Sometimes, a little calm is all you need. Take five with a friend in the tranquility of our reading room refuge, an ideal spot for quieter conversations in peace, located on the west side of the spa. VIP Services We do have additional VIP services including tarot, massage and lodgings as well as private baths for those seeking a more intimate space. It is important to note, however, that Elysian Springs is not a brothel. We cater to the fantasy with lovely and gracious staff, but are not courtesans and do not sell ERP at the spa.

name: Rose Dragon Cafe
description: A cozy spot to enjoy a bit of coffee, tea, or a little spirits pick-me-up along with general café cuisine.
We believe simplicity is best and the quality of our food and service will speak bounds.
HQ Food and warm conversations are to be had in this space.

name: Bunboi Insurance Co.
description: Need adventuring insurance? Stuck getting through a fight, dungeon, or map? Hurt from adventuring? A bun could be what your party needs! Let us help you (in character and out) in dungeons, fights, etc; or visit our clinic to get patched up and ready for your next adventure. New roleplayer friendly, SFW venue. No gil needed but tips are welcomed.

name: Golden Lotus
description: Newest Nightclub to Aether, Faerie. At Golden Lotus you will find amazing staff, great DJs, and an amazing environment and decor. With a gorgeous Far Eastern feel to the whole venue and amazing themed drinks you will love what you find here!

name: Huxian Syndicate
description: The Huxian Syndicate is a criminal organization seeking a foothold in Eorzea. While well established in Kugane, it's emerging presence in Ul'Dah has the Syndicate seeking to outsource some work.
A Heavy RP venue that's 18+ due to the potentially darker themes. We offer work to Villain and Neutral characters. Speak to the right person, and you'll be able to pick up a job.

Further your character's story by having a real crime organization and players to back up it up. Are you a thief needing to sell stolen goods but can put it on the market? Sell it to our Fence for gil and gain reputation for it! Perhaps, you're a mercenary just looking for your next job, there's a rumor the Syndicate needs some goods moved discreetly!
We open every four Fridays. Our next opening will be February 10th from 8pm EST to 11pm EST. Join our Discord to keep track of our events!

name: The Sanctuary
description: The Sanctuary is a gorgeous light roleplay and music venue for everyone on North American data centers to enjoy! We host live DJs and positive vibes. Thank you for visiting!

name: The Velarium Cafe & Bathhouse
description: A Cafe and Bathhouse to relax and immerse yourself in! Come kick back and enjoy some company in a comfortable environment. AFK and RP friendly! Lala's welcome for SFW activities!

name: The Aurora
description: We're an icey, vividly bright, burlesque inspired bar and lounge. We're always welcoming new RPers and we would love to have you spend a night under the Northern Lights!

name: The Roasted Dragon Cafe
description: Layed back, and kind staff, with a relaxing venue where you may order foods and drinks.

name: Belladonna's Banquet
description: Belladonna's Banquet is an immersive speakeasy venue with a fully functional flower shop as the staging area. Come in to browse our flower inventory and order a custom arrangement in our shop above or ask one of our shopkeepers for the special flower of the day and gain access to the tavern below. We have themed rooms for special events which include a fighting cage, bath house, and patio seating available for reserve to private parties.

name: Kirlala Nightclub
description: Welcome to the Kirlala Nightclub ! Take a drink and have fun !

name: Kitty's Play Palace
description: We are a Open LGBTQ+ RP open maid café with something for everyone. We offer Courts, Dancing , A full sized kitchen, A bakery for sweet tooth lovers. We also have a Vip section available. We have Bard playing music and very soon a DJ.

name: Delirium
description: High end, mainstream EDM venue - where the venue owner's only request of the DJs and guest is so always "Go hard!"
Offering 90/10 auctions, gamba, raffles, immersive bar, high class VIP with bottle services, shot girl for more RP immersion - come for the features and stay for the vibes!

name: Glamour
description: An immersive nightclub experience at Glamour with top-tier service including live DJs, dancers, courtesans, full service bar with one-of-a-kind cocktails, blackjack, raffles, and a first class VIP experience in the largest VIP section on Aether.

name: Black Coffin
description: Welcome to the Crypt, Where All of your nightmares can come true!

Black Coffin is a place where you can relax, or can you? Come have a drink! If you have the brass for it, try the Nightmare, embrace your darkest fears! Be it a drink, relaxation, or just embracing your inner Demons....Need some stress release? Our Escorts can take very good care of you, will fulfill your wildest fantasies and make you want one! Saturday comes but once a week why not spend it with as The Black Coffin welcomes you!

name: Aetherlife
description: Tucked away in the exotic eastern lands of Shirogane, right off the beach, the Aetherlife nightclub brings life to the night. Providing the dark, throbbing, underground night life that Ethyris needs. Aetherlife offers live music and DJs, exotic dancers, alluring courtesans, professional artists, and a fully stocked bar for all your partying needs. Home of Jenovas only designer cocai- I mean bathroom!

name: Sandglass Cafe
description: The Sandglass Cafe is a small back-alley shop where adventurers, book enthusiasts, and lovers of romance novels of all kinds to hang their hats, enjoy some treats and company in a relaxing environment. This venue is SFW and beginner-friendly for RP learning.
We also run Sketch Night on the first opening of every month where the venue owner (Meia) will be sketching guests who visit the establishment and stream the process on Twitch.

name: Clowder Club
description: Our singular goal is to chill and vibe while having fun. Be sure to head down to Clowder Club to celebrate the coming of the weekend in style! Clowder Club has always been about friendship community and having a good time and it continues to be such a place. We have VIP Services, Photography service, a Sketch Artist and more ♥.

name: The Kupo Cafe
description: The Kupo Cafe is a cozy venue run within the Kupo Arts & Cafe <<CAFE>> Free Company House, and is currently hosted by Renai Sance.

Whether you're looking to have art done of your character, a cozy spot to AFK, friendly company with a healthy bit of banter, or a place to practice barding on a small stage, our goal is to make you feel right at home.

name: Space Camp
description: Space Camp is home to the largest collection of player-created jump puzzles in FFXIV! Our private chambers house a variety of challenges suitable for beginners and parkour masters alike. New puzzles are added regularly. You can follow @SpaceCampFC on Twitter for updates, or visit our website for more information such as a beginner's jump guide and a timeline of FFXIV's major housing milestones. We are also open 24/7 so feel free to visit us anytime!

name: The HiveMind
description: Open plan interior in the void with no tax gambling, full bar with staff, DJ, Glam contests and giveaways.

name: Interlude
description: Amongst the squalls of snow that dance in the air of Empyreum stands a new and improved Ishgardian Noir Lounge- Interlude. A venue that is steeped in rich historical significance, and mahogany walls. There is *always* something happening inside of its walls? Will those things speak to you- There is only one way to find out!
Interlude is open on the 1st/2nd/ and 4th Friday and Saturdays at 11pm est to 2am.
*Months of Feb and March are different: 1st, 2nd and 3rd*
Come rest your body and be transported to a respite meant to restore and revive your adventurous spirit!

name: Crimson Underground
description: Welcome to Crimson Underground!! We are a night club with live twitch DJs, fully stocked bar, beautiful aesthetics, and of course a dance floor 😉 come through to have a good time and dance the night away 😉

name: Purple Orchid - Spa Resort
description: Purple Orchid is a *SFW only* spa resort that focuses on roleplaying, housing luscious baths, a well-stocked bar, and a cozy area to sit down with a snack. We offer a variety of services like massages and photography, and do our best to help you have a good and relaxing time!

name: The Sunless Sea
description: 18+ Late night Venue featuring Blackjack, Live Music and Great atmosphere. RP friendly

name: Slaughter House
description: Ｇｅｍ  Ｂｌｏｏｄｓｔｏｎｅ  Presents: ｢ＳＬＡＵＧＨＴＥＲ  ＨＯＵＳＥ｣
A Gothic Light RP Social Club
Open Now!!!
Where:Dynamis | Seraph | Mist | Ward 4 | Plot 44
Time: Sundays 5:00PM - 10:00PM PST
Raffle - Drinks - Gamble - Feat. Bard Performances by Yari Ishtar & the Stray Meownstrels Come peer into the dark at https://slaughterhouseffxiv.carrd.co/

name: The Night Owl
description: A safe for work RP venue that caters to those who are around a bit later in the evening. True to Bryna's Limsa roots, The Night Owl has a very Nautical feel to it though it offers a variety of worldly fare.

name: Shroudrose Teahouse & Tavern
description: Nestled within the Lavender Beds of the Twelveswood with a cliffside at its back and a flowing stream beneath a short bridge at its entrance is a large mansion known as Shroudrose Teahouse & Tavern. Once housing a rowdy free company of adventurers summers ago, it now serves as the site of a teahouse and upscale bar serving everything from specialty tea blends, to a wide array of spirits, to light meals and snacks both sweet and savory.

We are a SFW, fully immersive heavy RP venue. The house is a public role-play space where anyone is welcome to come role-play at any time, and can be used as a venue for events with some prior discussion. To stop by when there is a crowd and the place is staffed by player characters, please come during our public event times. If you wish to role-play in the teahouse outside of our event hours, you can assume NPC staff take care of your characters, or you can contact us and we will have a character come assist you if possible

name: Hotbody Haven
description: The hottest new club on Crystal DC. Open select Saturdays each month. Hot bodies. Hot staff. Hot menu. Hot drinks. Hot bears. We all HOT AF.

name: The Hidden Grotto
description: A SFW speakeasy style bar

name: The Angel's Loft
description: Welcome to the Angel's Loft, the calmest pleasure spot in the skies! Enjoy our wonderful snacks above, and our calming baths below. We offer a high tier raid and crafter food with no mb tax and a chill place to hang out and afk. We also offer a wonderful bathhouse experience and plenty of role play interactions.

name: The Wanderer's Okiya
description: The Wanderer's Okiya is an establishment aiming to bring a flavor of the Far East unto the Eorzea, taking a sampling of Kugane's hospitality culture, we offer a comfortable venue for people to meet, socialize, or just relax it. Should one be alone, or just seeking companionship, we allow the hiring of our Geisha to accompany our patrons. This includes an array of tea ceremonies, traditional tales, music, and even games. Should the patron be in the mood, they may speak to their hired companion and discuss more intimate matters, for which we provide a diverse range of comfortable settings for which to occur.

name: Euphoria
description: Euphoria is a weekend nightclub and event space located in the heart of Shirogane. Featuring a fully stocked bar, hot tub, dance floor and casino, we’re sure to offer a night to remember. With both SFW and NSFW services offered, there's something to satisfy everyone! Stop by for an unforgettable evening and enter a state of euphoria.

name: The Ruby Lights District
description: The Ruby Lights District is an LGBTQ+ friendly hostclub offering a place to hang out, meet new people and to have a laugh at the staff's shenanigans.
We have hrothgar hosts, games and a relaxing asmosphere
We hope to see you there!

name: The Red-Ink Spirits
description: 𝓣𝓱𝓮 𝓡𝓮𝓭-𝓘𝓷𝓴 𝓢𝓹𝓲𝓻𝓲𝓽𝓼
- FC Tag: 🆃🆁🅸🆂
- What: Hingan Brewery with Underground themes
- When: Every Monday 7-10 PM CST
- Where: Plot 49, 23rd Ward, UPSTAIRS
Goblet Medium, Mateus- Crystal
IC Details

Enjoy a Hingan atmosphere with authentic Eastern drinks and a slight underground theme, dabble in whispers of political scandal or criminal activity over a matcha tea or sake bomb! We also have games such as dice, high&low, karaoke and so much more!
https://redinksyndicate.crd.co/#barnights

name: Rikka's Cafe & Bar
description: Welcome to Rikka's. A unique experience where everyone is treated like family. We have tastes to meet everyone's needs. We hope you'll consider us for your next dining experience.

name: S'teamy Kitten Bathhouse
description: Welcome to the Purrfect Bathhouse!
Baths are good for the soul. The therapeutic waters ease the body and the mind, and they have been used for centuries as places of social gathering or healing around the world.

Many cultures have their own wellness traditions, almost all of them have this in common: People love to soak and sweat. Come enjoy a stay within a modern bathhouse that melds ancient practices with modern-day sensibilities.

name: Sea Glass Lounge
description: Feel the music, soften your mood, and have a drink or two with friends in a safe space. Diverse menu with food available, tailored to a relaxing underwater theme. We are a small, intimate and immersive venue. LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: The Crystal Comfort Cafe
description: Looking for a nice relaxing and cozy place to have a late night drink and maybe a snack?
How about relaxing in our soothing baths after the long day you've just had?
Come see us at The Crystal Comfort Cafe and Bath, let us pamper you and melt all that tension away in a warm and welcoming environment full of immersive RP.

name: The Ninth Twilight Restaurant Lalafellin
description: Come on down to The Ninth Twilight Restaurant Lalafellin. Have a seat and enjoy everything Lalafell sized. Yes, you too can reach the counters. From quality service to a smol cuisine of artisan mastery. Live your extra Lalafellin life!
Feel free to seat yourself at an empty table(with a book) or at the bar.
✧ Jump upon entry/load when you get into the restaurant. Then walk forward.
✧ To get the most out of your visit, we highly recommend coming in as a Lalafell.
✧Reservations are available. Inquire with Discord Twine Twilight#0684

name: Fairy Tale Lounge
description: My venue is located on Crystal \ Malboro. We are a fairy tale themed nightclub that welcomes both IC and OOC interactions. We host a myriad of events that target both audiences, keeping the atmosphere of both in mind. Our staff creates a friendly, interactive, and immersive chat throughout the night with varying styles and levels of roleplaying to encourage both veterans and newcomers. We, additionally, offer the usual services typical of a nightclub whilst allowing our staff to meddle into their own special concoctions and mini-events: you're curious as to what they are? Come see us and find out!

Every opening we have a theme night that is encouraged each person participate in, but it is not required. Just a chance for you to turn out those old boots that you love so much but can't wear anywhere. Or that dusty old cape that has that small stain on it... you get the point!
We've been open about two to three years and have created a nice relaxing climate -- a nice change in pace to the usual bustling feel of a usual nightclub. I love the place and I hope you will too!
Fairy Tale Lounge

name: Alta Strata
