description: Alta Strata is located within an abandoned imperial trains station, meet our staff in the old ticket booth and take a quick /doze at the elevator to be transported to the best secret club in Garlemald. You'll soon find our DJ, bar, and large dancefloor underground in the void.

name: TheDrunkenApe
description: Need a break from all the adventures? Come to TheDrunkenApe, and wash away all your ales. Our pirate-inspired tavern is sure to help you take the heat off the day. Come on down and give us a visit.

name: The Bottom Line
description: The Bottom Line is a lively jazz bar recently relocated to Ishgard from their humble beginnings as a dive in Ul'dah.
Come by for lighthearted, fast-paced RP in a cozy bar environment with a host of charming characters. Live bards & excellent vibes.
Roleplayers of all experiences welcome!

name: The Red Palace
description: the new big location for previous small venue 'Red Hideout'

name: The Sylphic Teahouse
description: The Sylphic Teahouse is a small library-cafe venue, situated in a house in Lavender Beds near Gridania. With Ozwin's personal collection of books at your finger tips, feel free to say stay and hang out a while without spending a single gil. A small stage is open for any who feel particularly musical, and the small bakery is kept stocked with food and drink by Alune and Misuzai. From the library on the main floor with its reading nooks, to the dining tables and plethora of seating downstairs, there is room for all to make themselves at home.

name: Seaside Café & Lounge
description: Come be our guest at Seaside! We provide a SFW environment, providing Maid & Butler cafe services, and if that ain't for you, we also have our Lounge area! We provide various activities, entertainment, dishes, and more!
Please, let us seat you!

name: The Drunken Moogle
description: Need a place to chill and relax after a long day of grinding? Want a hot supper, or a stiff drink? Look no further than the Drunken Moogle! Food, Drinks, Music, Events, & Much More!

name: Midnight Manor
description: Crystal Pageant and Club at Midnight Manor Grand Opening will have guest appearance with Twitch DJ Tim3_Signatur3 downstairs in the club and bar with a Cosplay Glamour Contest (no rules!) in the upstairs lounge! Don't forget to stop by the Market Stalls for RNG Giveaways!

name: Amore Musicale
description: A bard venue set in the time of Prohibition. Come listen to good music and chill with friends while you enjoy a menu of "Perfectly legally procured items". All types welcome and light RP may occur.

name: Hellfire Rose Lounge
description: Are you sweet as a rose? Come get hot with us every Wednesday night at HellFire Rose Lounge! Four fun packed hours listening to our lovely bard as you share some top quality food with our stunning host team, or a dance on our dance floor. With three fully stocked bar run by an exceptional mixologist team, we are more than like to have something for you! Come, join us for a time!

name: House Catboi
description: We're a community of male-loving-male focused LGBTQ+ gamers serving the gay community of Eorzea both through this Discord community and our venue! Of course everyone is welcome! While we are primarily a community of male-loving-male identifying folks, everyone is welcome to take part in what we have to offer and to join the party!

name: Club Phoenix Down
description: Enkindle the flame in your heart at Phoenix Down! Whether you're looking for parties, great drinks or just to dance the night away, we got you covered!
*We're open every other Thursday*

name: The Azure Dove Cafe
description: CLOSED FOR RESTRUCTURING AND RENOVATION
The Azure Dove Cafe is committed to giving you the perfect midday retreat. Coffee, Tea, Pastries, Breakfast, and a scenic view!

name: The Huntsman's Tavern
description: A cozy Eorzean tavern, serving fine, Coerthan-style cuisine. Here one can enjoy excellent food, and exquisite company. Partake in the wonderful tradition of the Huntsman: First time visit? Your first drink is on the house.
Come, stay awhile, and listen.

name: Voidbound Lounge
description: Welcome Traveller. Come, take a minute and rest, at the Voidbound Lounge. A safe place for voidsent and those associated with voidsent can mingle and be entertained by each other and staff. But take heed of the sin of greed. Voidbound Lounge welcomes all who wish to sample our decandent delight. Enjoy, relax, and partake.

name: 28-28 Bar & Grille
description: Enjoy a laid back low light tavern atmosphere
Open Bi-weekly
live music by our in house bard team!
Serving drinks & food at our bar and kitchen, come relax & enjoy time with friends, cozy time alone, a good chat with our staff and anything in between! hope to see you there!

name: The Delirium
description: We are a nightclub that wants to be different from the other nightclubs.

Accordingly, we are not a "basement" nightclub but our parties are on the 2nd floor of the house. We offer you a large house that is freely accessible at any time. In the entrance hall we offer you a nice reception and the way to the VIP rooms is also there.
On the second floor you will find the dance floor and the bar as well as a generously furnished "chill" lounge.
At our large bar you can strengthen yourself with drinks and also with one or the other snack.
In the chill lounge you can rest from dancing and possibly spend some time as a couple or with friends, we have made sure of that with plenty of seating.
You'll also find a few seats on the dance floor, but they do not reduce the space on the dance floor.
But, why don't you convince yourself? If you haven't visited us yet, just drop by and take a look for yourself

name: The Study Hall
description: Looking for somewhere to unwind with good coffee, good company, and enough books to last a lifetime? Kick back at The Study Hall and take a break from classes or the rush of life with a cozy atmosphere and Rhiko's realm-famous coffee biscuits. No matter if you're here to discuss the latest from Sharlayan or if you're here for some caffeine, there's always a seat for you!

name: Reefside Cafe and Pub
description: A small cafe by the seaside with warm summer vibes. Relax in our cafe upstairs with a hearty meal or head downstairs to the bar for a drink.

name: The Coerthan Rose
description: A small slice of Kugane nestled in a corner of Ishgard. Come relax and enjoy a fresh cup of tea or some of our freshly baked treats!

name: Milk Nightclub
description: Milk Nightclub, Home of the Champagne Call
An 18+ Aether staple since 2021, Milk exists to bring you a great evening full of toasts, drinks, music, and fun!
Stop by to see our resident DJ, AWP go hard on the beats or just chill with us in our large house on the beach!
Our staff is full of energy and friendly, and the vibes are immaculate. We wanna have a good time with you!
Dancers, gambling, and theme nights/events await! VIP available, raffles/giveaways nightly.

name: The Ravel
description: The Ravel Cabaret and Speakeasy, is a small tavern run by local Cult, I mean, Church dedicated to the worship of The Great Serpent of Ronka. All of the drinks have some reference to The Rak'tika Greatwoods, if not all of FFXIV at large. Our venue has a large selection of drinks, even opening up to other venues with signature drinks, breweries, and wineries that would like to feature on our menu. We mix RP-Gil and Real Gil prices for our menu, and do our best to have everyone feel relaxed as they drink to the past, all while reminding them that they were never here.

name: Diamond Dust
description: Please check us out every Friday on Crystal! LFG!

name: The Wasted Wizards Tavern
description: The Wasted Wizard's Tavern is a casual RP Tavern with a magical twist. All of our drinks are made with magic, some of which have some desirable or not so desirable effects. Our tavern houses a library of tomes gathered through the ages with spirits that protect them. We do not encourage reading any of them aloud, but if you do so, it is done at your own risk.

We encourage all rp and love to hear people tell a story. We offer many services, including tarot readings or tavern related services. We are a safe space for all levels of rp, including beginners who are new to the scene.

name: Allure Lounge
description: A staple in the Primal nightlife scene for over 5 years, Allure Lounge is open (almost) every Friday night and the last Saturday of every month. When you visit the Allure Lounge, you will experience an immersive nightclub experience with top-tier service, perks, music, and special dance troupe performances. Whether you'd like to come for the party, the drinks, or the live performances, we hope to make your weekends alluring!

name: Blackrose Tavern
description: Blackrose Tavern is recruiting for all positions, especially hosts.  We are a 18+ SFW immersive RP venue for those who crave a more classic goth feel. We cater to all sorts of spooks and spirits, but mortals are more than welcome to apply as well!  Please join our discord or shoot me a DM if you're interested, or if you just want to check us out, we're open 8-10PM EST Tuesdays and Saturdays @ Balmung, Lavender Beds, Ward 16 Plot 60.
Discord: https://discord.gg/vNVWTV6BaQ
Carrd: https://blackrosetavern.carrd.co/

name: Big Boys Sushi Bar
description: Derived from our Big Brother Goobbue's spirit of warmth & goofiness to coexist with plant life on them, the Big Boys Sushi Bar aims to create a symbiotic relationship with their patrons, much like the relationship with the moss and lichen growing atop a goobbue's head! We're a SFW cozy place with a splash of chaos to chill, get your fill, meet friends, and have fun! There's a wide selection of food and drinks available, friendly staff, relaxing bathhouse and a wild gambling master always ready for a death roll.

notices.message: This venue is open every OTHER Saturday night. Please check the venue's Discord for opening.

name: Wild Dreams Host Club
description: We want to make some wild dreams and also make you experience these. There are a variety of ways to do it and you can decide yourself how you want to approach your evening with us. Here is a list from where you can choose how your wild dream will come alive.

name: The Room
description: We are just a small bar, with the goal of giving a relaxing atmosphere for adventurers in need for it.

name: The Azeyma Tavern
description: Its been a busy week, and before you go club hoping and indulging in your RP fantasies I'm sure you'd like a place to relax. Unwind. Maybe even pregame before hitting the more popular spots that open from 8pm-3am (est). If that sounds idea but you haven't found that ideal spot, then you haven't heard of The Azeyma Tavern. A small humble social space where you can enjoy both outdoor and indoor dining options, listen to the relaxing sounds of our orchestrion or the performances of our bards. Great food and even better drinks, provided you can hold your intake. And a location fit for any possible collaboration events, sitting only a few steps above the public swimming area in the Goblet. If you and your fc/friends/static or whomever needs a place to eat high quality, stat boosting food then look no further. Our menu holds food and drinks to give you the boost you need to get through those extreme trials and savage raids. All that's missing is you. Come through, take a load off, and enjoy all that Azeyma has to offer.

name: ANTHOLOGY
description: Augment your Reality at ANTHOLOGY. A First of its kind Gaming themed Venue, with unique and exciting services and entertainment.

name: Moondancer Inn
description: The Moondancer Inn is a medieval pub located on Zodiark, Empyreum W1/P38. If you like listening to medieval music, rock, metal & folk, then this is the place you want to visit after a long and adventurous day in Eorzea. We'd love to have a pint with you!

name: The Foxglove Speakeasy
description: The Foxglove an LGBTQ+ SFW performance focused venue themed after high end lounges and is hidden away within the mansion of FC. Be it to listen to performances, drink 'till you're hearts content, or snuggle with a loved one, we welcome all- just keep it on the downlow, alright?

name: The Desert Jewel
description: Located in the bustling streets of Ul'Dah, The Desert Jewel offers a place for respite, good company, and immersive RP in the heart of the city.

name: Riverside Company
description: A florist cafe that offers the same souvenir services as our larger venue 'By the Riverbend'. Exclusive to this venue is our Cake Companions service that gives the opportunity to meet new characters through beginner-friendly, spoiler-free, and accessible interactions. We also open themed eateries in place of our main cafe.

name: KINGS Music Club
description: KINGS is a SFW/RP Classical and Jazz venue, with music of these genres being played live by the in-house band. KINGS was conceptualized with an emphasis on bringing people together, musicians and non musicians alike, and the club is mostly music focused. All refreshments are free of charge!

name: The House of Honey
description: The House of Honey is an 18+ nightclub that offers sweet nectars,
bee-autiful honeybees, and a buzzing atmosphere.
We hope you will enjoy your time at the hive! 🐝

name: Li'l Leblanc
description: It's early on a weekend morning. You want a place to chill with a piping hot breakfast of curry and coffee. Then you'll probably be headed to Li'l Leblanc. Come on by! We can talk phantom thieves or just general events or you can just relax at one of the tables. Whatever suits you! Adding more than coffee to the menu as well, stay tuned for hot cocoa and chai!

name: Senshur family Speakeasy Cafe
description: "The senshur family speakeasy is a small cafe based out of the Lily Hills sub division appartment that allows anyone and everyone to eat, drink and sometimes even rest here overnight/during the day should they ask! We have no bias as the owner is a Fae-touched with multiple pacts among them and even some staff are not completely human! Stop on by and have a drink, just don't start a fight and we will get along great!"

name: Sakura Sunrise
description: An early morning 18+ Eastern Tea Shop & Bath House for you to relax and enjoy your mornings in.

name: Shinkou Rentsuki Lounge
description: A relaxed, laid-back Doman RP establishment with a twist on traditional refreshments, food, and entertainment. We are bringing a lavish, high style of the East to the Grey of Ishgard with our welcoming staff, creative menu, a casino for both low and high stakes, and reaching out to connect with the community for entertainment. Let us be your hosts and welcome you with hospitality.

name: Lounge 33
description: Lounge 33 is a relaxed bar & lounge for people of all backgrounds to rest and enjoy themselves in. From zoning out in the corner, playing up on stage or jumping into a challenge, we welcome everyone to stop by, throw away your worries and just get lost in the moment.

name: Horn-E Bathhouse
description: The premiere meme bathhouse of your dreams! Come get ya juice ya'll!

name: Club Burzum Canopy
description: High atop the trees of the jungle is a haven the likes of which you've never seen. A hideaway nestled in the boughs of the canopy, with a plethora of male-folk intent on catering to your every desire.

name: The DREAM SEEKER Cafe
description: Leisurely Cafe / Pleasantly Snack Bar / Relaxing Music Lounge   [RP / nonRP / AFK / Gpose]

name: Witch's Brew
description: Be aware of your surroundings for these halls are filled with magic. Step into Primal's first fully stocked shopping center: The Witch's Brew!
Visit our always ready-to-serve Café Manager Arabella Bancroft on the ground floor of the Witch's Brew, where our Café is located on the right.

Located on the top floor to the right is our very own potion brewer and metaphysical shop! This is where our famous Lavender Witch brews all of our potions...and for a discounted price she can even sell you a stone that is known to bring its keepers gil.
Behind the potion shop is our brand new boutique where you can catch up on all the latest glam the game has to offer! Hand-crafted by our team in-house.
"Let the Magical Witches of the Witch's Brew Serve You"

name: Starling's Escape
description: Starling's Escape was made for people to relax and feel safe in our cafe and spa! Seeing our guests happy is the main purpose for being here!

name: Dazzling Lightz!
description: Dazzling Lightz is an LGBTQ+ venue for all walks of Eorzea! We specialize in a fun and welcoming Roleplay environment. Experienced or Novice to writing does not exist in our space. We want to see everyone, experience fun, and most important write together!~ So groove on by for some funky disco fun.

name: Seraphim
description: **Seraphim** is a new nightclub joining the scene. Come enjoy the music, drinks, or maybe even some company, if you dare.

name: Cafe Carbuncle
description: A cute Carbuncle Themed Cafe! We offer breakfast foods, amazing service, and a cute place to relax!

name: Wild Peony
description: A role-play encouraged Thavnairian pillow-house!
Join us and taste the delights we have to offer: Courts, Gamba, Giveaways and more!
NSFW services are not offered to Lalafell players, and you must be 18+ to enter and participate.

name: Cat Nipps
description: ###### A purrfect place for you and your friends to waste the hours away.Come and make new friends and hang out with our lovely staff while listening to club music on our Discord.We're here to make your night a fun one.

name: Unicorn & Toad
description: A Go-Go Bar Dance Hall where music and audience are the focus.

name: The Kitty's Catfish Cafe
description: A warm and cozy cafe run by the family and friends of spouses S'oun Pinh and Kasandri Shai'moltal. Hot drinks, sweets, savories, take your pick! Staff barding most weeks, but the stage is open to all!

name: The Fortune's Bloom Cafe
description: Come on in and rest your weary feet. Enjoy a tasty treat or refreshing beverage and share tales of your fortune, and foibles, with friends from near and far. Here at Fortune's Bloom we hope you find comfort and relaxation amidst good food, great music, and even better companions!

name: Ivy cafe
description: Family Friendly Venue, The Ivy Cafe takes inspiration from nature and the fey world to bring you a great and relaxing location to sit back and relax after a long day of working in the mines or fields,

name: Dream Nightclub
description: We're a super colourful and sugary Nightclub, aiming to spread the love and provide a beautiful atmosphere by offering you great music, great gambling services and a great time! Come on down and spread the love
